I don't know maybe it was just me but I just felt that was a bit steep for a few hours of sleep.You could say it was the combination of the lack of and quality of sleep, the pain in my joints while laying in bed and after waking up in the a.m. and feeling like I was 35 yrs. pay my age and that the pain would continue into my day, that said I thought this bed is winning the battle against me and I should just try again to check out and hopefully get a better bed.I did say better, I didn't say more expensive. As I seem to find with all reviews, it doesn't matter what product a laptop etc. some people seem like they don't like anything, that's their right and they have the right to their opinion. Now to finally get to the point of this. I ordered the king size bed and the mattress cover. Go figure, by adding the mattress cover it brought the price down an extra 80 dollars below the cost of the bed alone without the cover but including the cover.I dunno...It made the decision even easier to buy it. I found the price unbelievable and bought it. Once delivered, I rolled it out let it sit for day and a half made the bed and was anxious to see what would happen latter that night.All I could tell say is soon as I got under the to cover as I didn't get under the sheet. I zonked out and slept for 10 hours straight, without waking that night.I'm not lying, I swear to God.I love the heck out of this bed,man the price is unreal and it's just an awesome bed at least for me. So all I can tell you is if you go to bed sore wake up worse feeling like you're 110 and wake up during the night because of pain, toss and turn wake up frequently and you want all that to end try this bed.I did and it's the best money I've ever spent honestly, I'd sign a sworn affidavit. Also much of the pain at night and carrying over into the day ( what a vicious cycle) was due to having such a pathetic bed that I paid so much more for. Please don't start charging more for the bed. Not much support to this mattress…will need a new one VERY soon', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States October 29, 2023', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Serta lives up to the name', 'author': 'D. Anderson', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'Years ago I slept on a Serta mattress while on vacation with my family. It was by far the most comfortable that I had ever slept on, and I have not forgotten how amazing it was even being 15 years later. I had always bought cheap mattresses to last me for a few years before I replaced it with another, but decided to finally splurge and get real quality sleep every night. The bed is firm yet feels extremely soft, like floating on a cloud. I’m a light man, only being 135lbs, so I have no issues sinking into the mattress like many memory foam brands. I primarily sleep on my side but will often roll to my back or stomach in my sleep. No matter what way I contort my body in my sleep, I still get far better results then all my past mattress’s.Thoroughly satisfied with my purchase, I often look forward to laying in bed vs. before when I just wanted to get sleep! Finally getting real quality sleep every night!', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States December 16, 2023', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '3.0 out of 5 stars great sleep but some issues', 'author': 'Omar Siddique', 'rating': 3, 'content': 'Some excellent sleep after 4 weeks on this 15" pillowtop.But the queen size is 2", even 2.5-inches, less wide than the advertised, standard, queen size. I\'ve never seen so obvious defective width before, in the 2 dozen mattresses I\'ve owned in my life. Besides shrinking a size that\'s borderline big enough for two full-sized aduilts, it leaves an unsightly gap at the edge of the fitted frame.And then there\'s the foam smell- it had a STRONG, pervasive, wafting scent when I lifted the covers for the first 2 weeks, even just walking into the room. Though I left it uncovered and with a window fan venting the room for its first day. Even now (4.5 weeks later in warm weather), the sheets smell distinctly of foam, there\'s a mild waft of synthetic smell when I lift the the covers. Not what I expected in 2023.Note I don\'t even have a sensitive nose, but I DO have sensitive skin... and the heavy dosing of VOCs seemed to give me hives (not normal for me) sporadically in the first couple of weeks. Serta should be insisting on low-VOC foam, or figuring out how to air the product before packaging. The extra-strong smell and the wrong size implies they\'re packaging up the mattress at the factory without even enough of a pause to inspect the product.The last issue is more generic: in just a month, the side of the bed I sleep on (200lbs) already has the pillowtop squashed, but the other side is not. Possibly it\'ll squash evenly, but depending on how you sleep and if your sleep partner is a different size than you, you likely will end up with a "trench" where you sleep.It\'s still a pretty firm mattress under the pillowtop (it\'s not super cushy), so I think I would skip the pillowtop. Reducing that type of foam might help the smell also.I would have given 3.5 stars because the sleep is GOOD. But at this price range, even if everything is outsourced by brands that have shrunken down to mere marketing organizations, Serta should still be making sure of quality control at the factory, and dealing with issues like foam off-gassing of VOCs, so I rounded down.I\'m going to try the 14-inch (non-pillowtop) and hope its accurately sized. If you\'re buying, make sure to check the width, which might be apparent at a glance. And have a plan to let the foam air out- don\'t sleep on it the first day, or even first week.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States August 9, 2023', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '4.0 out of 5 stars Unfortunate', 'author': 'Peggy huff-johnson', 'rating': 4, 'content': "The mattress is very nice and beautiful product. However, my side doesn't sink when I get into bed, but when I turn over, I roll into his sink hole, if you will, In order to compensate for the two different balances, we have to place a king size pillow to prevent me from sinking into the hole. Therefore, after much contemplation, and two weeks of tossing and turning, we decided to return the mattress for a much firmer one. Also, the mattress did not fit our bed as a California King because the width was too short, thereby showing the distortedness of the mattress size. title: Lechepus Queen Mattress, 14Inch Plush Soft Memory Foam Hybrid Mattress, Queen Size Memory Foam with Pocket Spring Mattresses, Supportive Mattress in Box for Pressure Relief, CertiPUR-US
reviews: [{'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars very THICK and SOFT - We love it.', 'author': 'mrsdwb', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'This is a PLUSH, super soft mattress that sleep like a dream. Between the two if us we had not problems moving it around as needed.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States March 4, 2024', 'is_verified': False}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Pleasantly surprised', 'author': 'Eric', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'We’ve had the same memory foam mattress for over 10 years and were searching for a new mattress as it had sagged and became misshapen over the years.This mattress arrived in great shape in a very heavy box as it comes compacted and vacuum sealed.We set it out early in the day on top of our other bed to let it expand, then slept on it that night.We were pleasantly surprised by the balance of firmness and contouring support.We had both been having body pain, back ache, etc and after just one night on our new mattress and no more aches and pains!It is a heavy bed, but has handles in multiple places around to more easily move/adjust it. Will update should issues arise.Great value.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States February 7, 2024', 'is_verified': False}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars No need for an additional topper', 'author': 'Cynna Ael', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'Lay it flat as you can before you open it! You need to invest in a good product to get the results you want, and this mattress delivers. Great find!', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States February 17, 2024', 'is_verified': False}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Love this mattress', 'author': 'sasha larson', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'My husband and I needed an upgrade from our 8 years old queen size mattress. I noticed my joints are not hurting anymore if I am sleeping on my side.It was very heavy when it came all packaged in a box. The box was all torn up from handling, but mattress inside was packaged very well. title: Queen Mattress, 10 Inch Gel Memory Foam Mattress, Gel Infused for Comfort and Pressure Relief, CertiPUR-US Certified, Bed-in-a-Box, Medium Firm, Blue, Queen Size
reviews: [{'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Get this bed. What are you waiting for? Quality, affordability and comfort', 'author': 'M. Johnson', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'EDIT: 20 month post purchase update (original review below)-So far so good. I felt like this mattress has a little more “give” where I sleep. I’m not the kind of person who sleeps all over the bed. I sleep in one spot. So, when I moved to my new home, I turned it around and it has solved the problem. The area where I slept before shows no signs of the “give.” I sleep alone, so I don’t know how it affects couples. I’m 5’3”, 165lbs (160cm, 75Kg).I do recommend a mattress protector only because of the porous fabric. I learned this on the night of the pukies from my three-year-old daughter.In other news, I recommended this mattress to a friend and she bought it. She sleeps more soundly than she did on her innerspring mattress. I have added the photos from when we unzipped and let the mattress decompress. SHE LOVES IT. She says she read the conflicting reviews, but decided it was worth it because I wouldn’t shut up about it. If she only gets a few years out of it, she still thinks it’s a worthwhile investment because her sleep is so much better and her aches and pains are about gone. Her FitBit has shown a much better sleep pattern.Almost two years later and I’m still in love with this mattress and the frame I bought to go with it.I waited to write this review after having this mattress for about six months. I like to have a product a while before writing a review. When this bed arrives, it comes in a box that is about 18"x 18"x 48". That\'s an estimated size by memory. You pull the bed out and lay it out. It comes compressed and folded in half. Then, check for the zipper on the bed. Make sure that is on the bottom and open the plastic. The bed begins to decompress. Let it decompress for 24-48 hours. I let it decompress for 48 hours because I was moving into a new apartment and I had the time to do it. I put it on the Home Life Cloth Light Beige Cream Linen 51" Tall Headboard Platform Bed with Slats Queen - Complete Bed 5 Year Warranty Included 008 Home Life Cloth Light Beige Cream Linen 51" Tall Headboard Platform Bed with Slats Queen Bed and it looks amazing.Pros: Comfort! It does NOT sleep hot. I don\'t feel myself tossing and turning at night. I lay there, and I sink in, but not too much. It doesn\'t take too much effort to move like some lower density mattresses. Sheets do not slip off and they hold really well, so that\'s a big plus. The soft fabric covering the mattress holds sheets well and the stitched in pattern does not bleed through on white sheets. When I sit on the edge to play my guitar, it\'s the perfect height and my back feels great- better than any chair.Cons: I see a lot of reviews about the smell. I have a hyper sense of smell. The chemical smell dissipated in a few hours. I did not detect it at all after about six hours. Get the plastic the mattress came in out of your house if you don\'t want the smell lingering. The mattress is heavy, but that just indicates the quality of the product. Besides, all mattresses are heavy unless they are full of air. When it\'s cold, the bed becomes harder. When its hot, the bed is softer. Keep that in mind when adjusting the temp of the room. And when I say cold, I\'m talking 35 degrees F. I left the heat off when I went out of town and the bed was denser than usual when I got back. I warmed up the room and it went quickly back to normal. On hot nights it is softer. I doubt you\'re sleeping in freezing temps, so this isn\'t a big deal.All in all, this thing is a great buy. I\'m glad that Amazon has made it as a recommended product. It\'s comfortable and priced well. The queen sized one works well with a slat bed and after six months has continued to provide a restful night sleep. I\'ll try to remember to give it another review at the one year mark.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States January 11, 2018', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': "5.0 out of 5 stars So soft but firm enough that you don't sink in", 'author': 'gummybear26', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'I was afraid this would be a gamble. With the price and some reviews. But this was a great purchase. I bought this for my daughter but it was able to hold my weight just fine. There was no sinking into the bed or anything.Pros:*Comfort-This is so soft to lye down on and yet you don\'t sink into the mattress which would make it uncomfortable. If feels like it cradles your body and at 10" I was worried it was not thick enough but I was wrong. It was a perfect size. The full size is perfect for a teenager but it was a good fit for me (an adult) as well. I love it and want one for myself now. My spring mattress is hard now in comparison to this soft foam mattress. I was thinking about a hybrid since I was afraid this wouldn\'t have enough support but this had a mix of support for your back and a cradling so side sleepers (like me) don\'t feel pain on their hips. The quality it is amazing and the price is unbeatable. I did find others that were a bit cheaper but I wanted to pay a bit more for this one since it had better reviews. **Pat on the back. I did good,lol.*Soft-The material is soft and by this I mean the cover. I have yet to be able to remove it but will be wearing gloves when I do (as others have said it has fiberglass since it is flame retardant). It is used with sheets but the designs are not felt beneath it or anything.*Filled out-I left it the 72 hours as it suggested to fully fill out before she used it but it actually mostly filled out instantly. It did have a weird smell that I couldn\'t put my finger on but it wasn\'t strong. I want to say chemical smell maybe the foam or foam glue they use but I was literally face to mattress smelling it (as another reviewer did the same and smelled nothing) my nose it sensitive and I did smell something luckly it went away by the end of the day while waiting for it to puff out. So I am not going to remove stars but you should be aware. It doesn\'t smell like anything now and there was a corner that did completely fill out until the second day. It kind of dipped downward and I thought I would stay like that but it fixed itself. So I would say (if you can) leave it the 3 days. It actually took a pounding as I left it in the living room to air out (against a couch) and my kids decided to use it to lye on and try and roll down (inbetween my scolding I thought it would bend it too much). It actually didn\'t bend or anything and held their weight. I was pleasantly surprised.Weight-This thing is heavy. I had to drag the box inside and when opened I found a Grey material that was wrapped around it protecting it I believe. Once I opened it was hard to carry but it is a good thing to me as it meant it was made of quality material.Cons:*can\'t reach the zipper-So there is a tiny pencil sized pocket that holds the zipper and I couldn\'t pull it out. I was waiting to be sure there was nothing wrong with it (just in case I had to return it if it didn\'t puff out or something) but now that I know I will keep it looks like I am going to have to cut the pocket open to reach the zipper. Not sure why that design was made but it is something to note.Conclusion:*I love it and I am afraid of making g purchases for large items just in case I have to return it. The hassle is a lot for something so large but this was a great purchase. It will hold my 200+ weight and not sink in but still cradle me. My tiny daughter (whom I bought it for) loves it just as much because it is not "too soft" which is what we were afraid of from a foam mattress. Problems with shipping lead to using it alone until the frame arrives. However, it is awesome just as it is as the bottom of the foam seems to be strong enough to support your weight and spinal alignment. I will update my review when used with the frame. This mattress was a great purchase and we will be ordereding two more (of different sizes) in the future.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States March 15, 2021', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect', 'author': 'Cat Lady', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'This mattress is perfect. I ordered a Queen size.All my life I\'ve slept on spring/coil mattresses and have grown to really hate them as I age because the springs cause more pain than they do anything else.When I saw this mattress and it\'s affordable price (budget friendly) I wanted to give it a try and get away from the 21-year-old spring mattress that I have been sleeping on.This mattress is packaged in a large, heavy box and wrapped in plastic. It unrolls after you pull the plastic off and then unfolds. Once I had all the plastic off of the mattress it started to fluff up and was the full 10" within 3 hours. I was able to sleep on it the same night it arrived. There is a slight "new" smell that has been on every memory foam mattress topper I\'ve bought, so this, of course, will go away in a few days and isn\'t too strong or overwhelming.Actually, this mattress is pretty light compared to the old spring mattress I have and found it to not be a problem putting it on the frame by myself.I do want to note this mattress is firm but not painful firm like a spring mattress that causes so much pain from coils that poke into your joints and body as you sleep. This mattress is firm at first but once you settle in the foam contours to your body and makes it very comfortable to sleep.Generally, I have trouble sleeping on anything firm, like my old mattress, even at 21 years of use, it is so firm that it feels the same as day 1 (painful and like sleeping on a slab of concrete).I have 2 back injuries and laying down on my back or stomach is very painful. Mostly I am a side sleeper but even then on a spring mattress, I wake up several times a night from either my shoulders and hips hurting so badly that I can barely roll over to the other side without feeling like my bones are shattering, but my arm falls asleep. It is hard for me to get comfortable on my old mattress and I wake up in more pain than I went to sleep in.WIth this mattress, I can lay down and quickly settle, even on my back without waking up in severe pain or with my arm falling asleep. In fact, I can sleep a whole night comfortably and wake up without pain. I\'m amazed by that and know now that it is the mattress that caused so much pain all these years to my already painful bones.On all the mattress toppers I\'ve had before, and there have been many, they all slept hot. I\'d wake up even in winter sweating and with this mattress, I don\'t wake up sweating. It actually feels cool and comfortable.I really can\'t say enough good things about this mattress. It is light to move around and even on a platform bed frame, I can\'t feel the metal underneath. It feels like I am sleeping on a cloud. My bones don\'t ache anymore from sleeping and I am not waking up multiple times a night in pain. And I don\'t really like firm mattresses anymore, not after my old nightmare mattress that felt like sleeping on concrete. But this one is much different from being on a spring mattress and is also firm but very comfortable.Pros:Light to move aroundThick enough not to feel the metal bed frame on a platform frameFirm but not something you sink into or are uncomfortable on. Contours to the body and feels like sleeping on a marshmallow.Same thickness as a traditional spring mattress, 10" of softness and no springsGood qualitySleeps cool, not hotHas a zippered cover that is plush and soft2 people can sleep on this mattress and not feel each other move or get upDid I mention it feels like sleeping on a marshmallow?Cons:0If you haven\'t tried this mattress yet and are in the market for a budget-friendly (could even sleep with it on the floor if you don\'t have a frame and be comfortable), firm yet very cozy, good quality mattress, this is the one. I am happy to have found this mattress and would recommend it to everyone looking for an upgrade from spring mattresses. I\'ll never go back to another spring mattress again. Not even my son (almost 3 years old) sleeps on a spring mattress. My son sleeps on a much smaller version of this mattress, of a different brand (Graco crib mattress) but still feels the same firmness (comfortable as well) and he sleeps the night through.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States September 26, 2017', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '4.0 out of 5 stars Great buy', 'author': 'Jose Irizarry', 'rating': 4, 'content': 'Comfortable! Well built! Amazing to sleep, and enjoy bed at all times!!', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States February 8, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Me, my husband and three large dogs!', 'author': 'Molly Bailey', 'rating': 5, 'content': "Me and my husband have been wanting to upgrade from a queen size mattress to a king for a long time but king mattress are expensive! Even without the box spring! This one caught my attention because of the price as well as the fact that this is foam instead of a spring mattress. We have always had spring mattresses that are great at first but overtime they caused more pain than they were worth. So we were drawn to a foam mattress. I looked at countless reviews and thought this was the best priced and had some great reviews.Shipping. It came super quick! I ordered this Sunday and had it by Friday. My husband went ahead and opened it up so we could let it inflate throughout the day and overnight to see how it did. Within just a couple hours it was already inflated to almost its full thickness. We still gave it the rest of the day, overnight and the rest of the next day to make sure it was completely inflated before we slept on it. (I also had to put together the frame we bought as well so it gave it some more time). After I got the frame together, we was super easy to get the mattress on the frame. Its heavy and awkward to move by yourself so I do suggest two people to move it.Once we made the bed and got everything situated, I literally laid in bed for the rest of the day. This mattress is amazing so far! It feels like I'm laying on firm air! The memory foam on top is soft but firm enough to support and conform to your body instead of letting you sink. I had back pain all day while I was building the frame and getting everything ready. Within just an hour of laying on it, watching TV, I was no longer in pain. It was so nice to switch from laying on a board to laying on firm air. It supported my body while I was laying on my back, sides and stomach. Im mainly a side sleeper and that usually makes my sides, hips and back hurt even if it's just for a short amount of time of laying like that. This mattress did not make me feel that way! I was able to get up throughout the rest of the day without feeling like I had been laying around all day. That's with me not even sleeping on it yet!Last night was our first night sleeping on it. Let me tell you, I have not been sleeping well at all for the last few months cause I would be in pain all night from our other mattress. I would wake up feeling like I was hit by a truck. Everything would hurt constantly overnight and I would get up with pain all throughout my body. This morning, I woke up with absolutely no pain. I feel refreshed and I slept all throughout the night! I didn't wake up constantly and I even slept in! That has been impossible for me for months! It's such a huge relief to not wake up in pain!Me and my husband have three large dogs (huskies) that love to lay in bed with us while we sleep. They kick and get in the uncomfortable spots between us and push us out of the bed almost every night. Last night, they slept on the bed with us (of course) and it's like they weren't there. All three of them were laying between us and I couldn't even tell because there is SO MUCH ROOM! There is such a huge difference in a queen to a king mattress that I'm upset that I didn't have one sooner! I can tell that even they slept better because they didn't wake me up at the crack of dawn! They snoozed until I finally woke up! They even looked like they were offended that I was up to be able to let them outside, cause they wanted to keep sleeping! So overall, I belive that this is a winner for all of us! Get this mattress! You won't regret it!", 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States January 10, 2021', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Wonderful for back pain sufferers. This mattress is more amazing than I thought it would be!', 'author': 'Donna Loves Reviews', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'This Gel Infused Memory Foam Mattress is more amazing than we thought it would be! We moved into a new home and really needed to get a new mattress for our children, we also did not want to break the bank. I also really wanted to get a new mattress for our bed because of my back. A friend of ours recommend a mattress similar to this one because it helped her back pain and that is what I searched for on Amazon. I came across this mattress and read all of the reviews. They were very positive with lots of detail. Many reviewers that suffer with back and neck pain had positive results with this mattress and that helped me to make a choice. So, we decided to buy a few of these mattress and also one for us, we are more than happy we did!This has got to be the softest and most comfortable mattress I have ever slept on! It is soft but, firm enough not to make my back hurt. I have not slept this good since before my back injury. My husband also loves this mattress and has not complained once, he sleeps better on this mattress as well. Our kids just love it! They are so happy and thrilled with it! They love the way it feels and have also slept very well on it.Having a mattress that would help me sleep better was very important to me as well as the price. I suffer from 2 failed lower back surgeries and also a cervical surgery and sleeping has always been difficult for me. I am up a few times a night because the pain wakes me or I just can’t get comfortable. I have purchased many different kinds of pillows and foam toppers to help me feel better and get a better nights sleep, they have helped to a certain degree but, nothing has compared to this mattress. Not that I am pain free, nor will I ever be but, I am at least sleeping better and not waking up as frequently. I find that I sleep better on a softer bed than a harder one. I tend to get even more back pain when the bed is too hard. So, if you should need a mattress that is on the hard side this might not work because it is on the softer side.The mattress was delivered rolled up and wrapped in plastic. We followed the instructions and unrolled the mattress which is completely flat, then we took off the plastic shrink wrapping and the mattress then started to expand. (Some reviewers stated that there was a slight odor and yes, there is, but it is nothing that bad and does go away after you let the mattress breath.) We allowed the mattress to expand and air out for 72 hours before we placed it on the bed frame. At this point the mattress was completely full and there was no odor. It is wonderful that there is no box spring needed, you just put it ontop of your framed bed. We put the sheets on and went to sleep!This really is the best mattress I have ever slept on and owned. I could not be happier and so is the rest of my family. The price is just amazing! If you are thinking of purchasing this mattress I would highly recommend it, especially for back/neck issues.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States August 25, 2016', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Best for price!!', 'author': 'Marissa Reynoso', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'The mattress is super comfortable,I got this mattress for a day bed in my office and even my husband thinks it’s just as comfortable as our 800$ mattress in our bedroom!!I unzipped the mattress cover once it was all set up & noticed There was fiberglass,it’s used as a flame retardant which is a positive & shouldn’t cause any issues unless you have to wash the cover so make sure to put on a mattress protector on it just in case!!', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States February 7, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Great buy', 'author': 'Melissa', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'We bought this for our teenager. It fully expanded in a couple hours. Soft but supportive. Exactly what he wanted.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States February 25, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Happy', 'author': 'Alexandra Castro', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'I’ve had this bed for about 4 months and I’m still very happy with my purchase. Overall I’m glad I bought this.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States March 4, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Very excellent place to sleep', 'author': 'T-bone steak', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'Bought this for my office. It sleeps rather cool. “Inflated” completely in maybe five hours? No smell at all. Quite heavy which is nice. I’d consider this bed again if I need another in the future. Will recommend to friends and family. And keep my eye out for other products from them. A+ chaps.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States February 25, 2024', 'is_verified': True}]

The first one was king that was $450 dollars by a cooking brand.. This purchase is a Queen for $250 on sale.My first king mattress is a 5 star. It expanded to full, as advertised size in 24 hours. This one has not fully expanded and it has been 2 days. Not only that but when I pull upwards on the mattress to see where the remainder would lift, it literally CANNOT be stretched upto 12 inches in height. This is false advertisement. The mattress is also 1inch short of the 60inches in width that a Queen is supposed to be. You can try to push in on any part of the mattress and with little effort you can feel the springs and even hear them creak and move. Like other reviewers have said, this contains 1 inch of memory foam maybe two if I’m being generous. I am not a large person either. I wear a size medium shirt, i’m 5-10” 175lbs. This is an item I would pay $125-$150 if I intended to sleep on it daily. I can’t see this mattress lasting more than 12-18 months with out problems arising. I will be contacting the manufacturer and updating my review.Update 11/26. I have been in talks with the manufacturer and am I awaiting their reply. I have sent them pictures of the mattress on 2 separate occasions with nothing changed as far as expansion.11/27 customer service is having me measure it again :/.1/5 stars11/30 no charge in size. I will be contacting Amazon and reporting the seller. If someone has a similar experience I suggest you do the same the quality of by items on by Amazon has been going down likely due to fake reviews12/03Finally contacted Amazon customer service and they advised on how to return. Thank you Amazon. I will not be purchasing from this seller again.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States November 20, 2023', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '4.0 out of 5 stars FR BE CAREFUL LOL *Read edit*', 'author': 'Madison Swanson', 'rating': 4, 'content': 'I’m no better than a blue collar man when it comes to instructions, I paid no mind and just opened up all the plastic and lord almighty it almost killed my cat with how fast it flew out of the wrapping. title: Queen Mattress, 12 Inch Hybrid Mattress in a Box, Gel Memory Foam Mattress, Individually Wrapped Pocket Coils Innerspring Mattress, Support & Pressure Relief, Medium Firm, 60"*80"*12"
reviews: [{'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Very pleasantly surprised!', 'author': 'Doc', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'Took a chance buying a bed in a box. I spent a lot of time looking here and other places, reading reviews.The reality is that store brand mattresses just cost a fortune for anything remotely quality or comfortable, especialy king size. The mattress is heavy! Took two of us to get it in the house and unrolled. I let us expand for several days before sleeping on it. The corners took a little longer but we were using this bed within a couple of days. We have had it now for a couple of months and I feel like it\'s even more comfortable as it\'s broken in. It is more firm than I expected however we had prior been sleeping on a very worn well-known brand mattress that honestly was causing us so much back pain, hip pain and discomfort, I am relieved we gave this a try. We should have been sleeping on a more firm bed I have realized. My hips are no longer hurting. I have been waking up feeling rested for the first time in a long time! I love the memory foam plus individually wrapped coils. With two of us (and often two dogs) in the bed, the mattress is holding up well. We are both over 200# and have two large dogs. We might try adding a 1-2" foam topper but honestly the mattress is really comfy as is. The edges are not as firm as store bought mattresses and you will sink down a bit if sitting on the edge of the bed but it\'s not been a problem. We don\'t feel as if we will roll off. There is also really NO problematic movement in the bed if one person rolls over or shifts, it does not disturb the other person! I don\'t know how well this bed will hold up over time but it has a 10 year warranty. It seems very well made, it is comfortable and I imagine we will get at least a few years out of it. So at this price, it is very well worth it. We are pleasantly surprised!', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States January 24, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Rimensy Full Mattress: Speedy Delivery, Supreme Comfort, and Unmatched Support', 'author': 'Nita thomas', 'rating': 5, 'content': "I recently purchased the Rimensy Full Mattress, and I am extremely pleased with my experience. The speedy delivery was impressive, with the mattress arriving within just 4 days of placing the order. The convenience of a mattress in a box made the process hassle-free.The 10-inch hybrid design, combining gel memory foam and individually wrapped pocket coils innerspring, provides an optimal blend of support and pressure relief. The medium-firm feel strikes a perfect balance, making it ideal for my son's full-size bed. The quality of materials used is evident, and the mattress has proven to be both comfortable and durable.Overall, I highly recommend the Rimensy Full Mattress for anyone seeking a reliable and comfortable sleep solution. The swift delivery, coupled with the mattress's excellent features, has made this purchase a truly satisfying experience.", 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States January 25, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '4.0 out of 5 stars for my 5yr old', 'author': 'Dennis Pimentel', 'rating': 4, 'content': "nice bed for a kid. It's really very soft for an adult as when I sit on it or put my knee on it, I can feel like I'm almost sinking to the bottom of the springs. But when you lay down on it, it's really comfortable and it conforms to your body weight. Too soft for me (and I like plush beds) but for great for a lighter weight individual. My son loves it and that's what matters the most. It inflated very quickly and didn't even need to wait 72 hours since it was fully decompressed within a couple of hours and my 5 year old only weight like 40lbs so I didn't it would affect it much anyways. So far so good, hopefully it holds up as I'm planning on this being my son's bed until he's at least in high school.", 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States January 28, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars be careful unwrapping', 'author': 'Kaykay', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'it will definitely scare you how hard it expands so be cautious and make sure there’s nothing or NOBODY too close . It’s a great bed I ordered two for me and my twins. both king size and we all love the mattress it’s just the right firmness and softness at the same time. Kinda hard to clean but it’s so inexpensive after the mattress gets too dirty I’ll just buy more. I can’t wait to try the California king.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States February 29, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Rimensy King Mattress: Where Comfort Meets Movie-Day Bliss', 'author': 'Amazon Customer', 'rating': 5, 'content': "I upgraded to the Rimensy King Mattress, and let me tell you, it's been a total game-changer for our sleep routine. This 14-inch hybrid marvel, packed with gel foam and individually wrapped pocket coils, brings a whole new level of comfort.**Sleep Quality Upgrade:**Since switching to the Rimensy mattress, my sleep quality has skyrocketed. Falling asleep faster and staying in dreamland longer has become the norm, making every night a rejuvenating experience.**Sunday Cuddle Extravaganza:**Here's a delightful bonus – my wife and I have turned Sundays into our ultimate cuddle and movie day. The comfort of this mattress adds a touch of luxury to our lazy weekends, creating a cozy cocoon where we can relax and unwind together.**Unmatched Comfort:**Hands down, this is one of the most comfortable beds we've ever slept on. The medium-firm feel strikes the perfect balance between support and plushness. It's like sinking into a cloud without sacrificing the necessary support for a restful night's sleep.**Easy Unboxing Experience:**Getting this mattress was a breeze – it comes in a convenient box, and the setup was surprisingly simple. Unbox, unroll, and voilà – you've got yourself a ticket to a better night's sleep.**Conclusion:**In a nutshell, the Rimensy King Mattress is a dream come true for anyone seeking improved sleep quality and unparalleled comfort. From lazy Sundays filled with cuddles to the simple joy of falling asleep faster, this mattress delivers on its promise. It's more than a bed; it's an investment in blissful nights and cozy weekends. Sweet dreams await! 🌙✨", 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States December 6, 2023', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Comfort at an Affordable Price', 'author': 'Kindle Customer', 'rating': 5, 'content': "Giving 5 stars to begin with, though we've only had our King size mattress for a week.The rating is based on the speed of delivery (only 7 days to come to us across the country from California to Connecticut), the price being quite low compared to local walk-in mattress stores, and the comfort being surprisingly good.The package was heavy and large, but that's to be expected when you order a boxed King sized mattress. I mention it only so that you remember what's in that box when you try to wrestle it into the house alone. Once upstairs in into our master bedroom, everything was a cinch. It came out of the box quite easy and we opened the vacuum seal as instructed, and the mattress immediately came to life expanding. (make sure you open the seal in an open space large enough for it to unroll and expand) After it looked like a regular mattress, we put it up on the bed frame and left it for a few hours. The instructions said something like 24 hours required, but it was ready by bed time.When I first sat on it, I doubted. It felt too soft and like there was too much give for a medium firmness mattress. However, my doubts were laid to rest, literally, when I lay down and slept. The mattress was more comfortable than our previous one, which we bought in a show room over a decade ago. Plus, our old mattress was nearly 3x the cost!So far it's been a week. I'm still enjoying how the top few inches are pillowy soft, and it shapes to the contours of my body when I roll - something my old mattress didn't have. It feels just right on my back, which means not too soft and not too hard.I would recommend this mattress, especially at this price. In fact, I already shared a link to the one I purchased to a family member in search of a new one.I'll update if something else happens to change my initial opinion, but for now I'm pleased with my purchase.", 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States May 26, 2023', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '3.0 out of 5 stars Good for the price', 'author': 'TruthInReview', 'rating': 3, 'content': 'We’ve been sleeping on this mattress since mid-October 2023. It’s me and my husband and we’re average sized people, if that matters. When it arrived it was a huge box that was very tall and very heavy but the Amazon man brought it directly to my door so I was thankful for that. But we opened it according to the directions and waited 3 days, or 72 hours, before we slept on it. We wanted to give it the best chance to expand and inflate or whatever, and after all this time, it’s just ok.Biggest cons: the corners never fully fill or expand, if you sit on one accidentally it’s a fun experience because you just sink completely down; the spots where we sleep are molded into the sides of the mattress while the middle is like of elevated, so it’s sunk down area where we actually sleep then a little plateau in the middle. Those are my biggest complaints.Pros: it is comfortable. I like a medium-firm bed and it’s soft yet firm and it’s comfortable. It was inexpensive. It suits our needs for the time being.We put a mattress encasement on it along with a mattress cover and it’s comfortable. Good quality sheets and you can have a good sleeping experience. If you need an inexpensive mattress that can be shipped to your door, give this one a try.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States January 22, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '4.0 out of 5 stars Lovely, but too soft for us', 'author': 'River C.', 'rating': 4, 'content': 'While the top feels soft and plush, the coils have more give than we like. I like to sit up in bed and this mattress creates a "v" when you do so. And while it cradles your body, for us older folks with health issues and weaker core muscles, sinking into a mattress made it difficult to rollover and if we cuddled to fall asleep it was difficult to roll apart if we became to hot or needed to shift positions (as we often do).Of course, we\'re not small people either. We\'re both weigh over 200lbs.So, if you don\'t move a lot in your sleep, are smaller and lighter than we are, sleep alone, and/or sleep exclusively on your back, and like to sink into your mattress a bit (but not get swallowed by it), this mattress is for you. However, if you roll around a lot, have some health or muscle weakness issues, or prefer to not sink into a mattress at all, I would recommend thinking twice before purchasing this mattress.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States August 3, 2023', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars I am so happy', 'author': 'SaFira', 'rating': 5, 'content': "Ok so I was leery about ordering a coil spring mattress that was going to be shipped to me flattened out in a box. When the package arrived I immediately opened the box and followed the opening structures to the team. Was I ever surprised within 3 hours it looked almost completely filled however I waited the full two days to give it it's time. Omg it was amazing to lay on. I have had it a week now and it is so comfortable, it is amazing the firmness is just perfect. I am so pleased I ordered my mother one as well.The only downside is it dose not have straps on the side to help move in it. But I didn't think it was that big of a deal not to give it a perfect rating", 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States March 5, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '4.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable, but not firm!', 'author': 'Amazon Customer', 'rating': 4, 'content': 'I ordered the king size mattress. It arrived on time in a very long and heavy box which required two people to move. Opening and unrolling the mattress was easy. We allowed 48 hours for the mattress to expand. The mattress did not have a particularly strong odor--just a slight new-mattress scent. This mattress is very soft due to the memory foam topper. We added a three-inch memory foam topper as well, but it truly does not need the extra memory foam. I sink in comfortably and described it to my husband as "being in a nest". I\'ve slept on it only two nights so far, but both nights were very comfortable and cozy, and I don\'t think I moved much all night because of how enveloped/swaddled I felt. I think we will be quite happy with this mattress, but it is not a good choice for people who prefer firm support. Since the mattress sinks in deeply when you sit or lie down, it would not be easy for those with mobility challenges or other special requirements to stand up. Overall, a great choice for us, but perhaps not for everyone.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States January 2, 2024', 'is_verified': True}]

title: Mattress, 12 Inch Hybrid Queen Size Foam Mattress in a Box, Individually Wrapped Pocket Coils Innerspring, Pressure-Relieving and Supportive, Non-Fiberglass Mattressess 12 * 60 * 80 Inch
reviews: [{'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Supportive, comfortable and good value!', 'author': 'T Leap', 'rating': 5, 'content': "I've been sleeping on this mattress for a couple of weeks before writing this review. It's firm but not too firm. It is my first hybrid mattress. I like the combination of the memory foam and the coils. I don't wake up with any aches from being a side sleeper. Extra perk, if my husband gets up during the night, I can't feel it. I recommend this mattress...comfortable and good value.", 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States February 17, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars A truthful testimonial', 'author': 'Cindy Z', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'I needed to replace a king mattress in my summer home but didn’t want to spend a lot of money. I had no idea what to expect, knowing it would be in a box, inflate & how would it even feel when slept on. The process was fascinating to watch. You don’t have to wait long for it to inflate. The mattress is very luxurious.The design is not only well made, but classy. Now, for the test drive. It’s beyond comfortable. Probably the best sleep I’ve had. I spent a fortune on my mattress back home. This is like sleeping on a cloud. Shockingly surprised. It’s amazing. Don’t hesitate at all on this one!', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States January 27, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '4.0 out of 5 stars Good Bed', 'author': 'Crystal H.', 'rating': 4, 'content': 'This was the first bed in a box I have purchased from Amazon.Arrived quickly, even before it said it would (a definite plus) packed well. Now when the delivery guy just hoisted it up on his shoulder and set it on my porch, I thought how heavy can it really be? I found out pretty quickly! Now I’m not a weakling but I struggled getting the box up a small step into my house! I admit, after that I dragged it to my bedroom!Set up was easy. Unboxed it. Unrolled the mattress. This is where I must share a warning of caution…..When you are unrolling the plastic from the air suctioned plastic…. Make sure your pants are secured and that the rolling doesn’t catch the bottom of your pants. Needless to say, I did not. My pajama pant legs got caught up in the rolling unbeknownst to me, as I was excitedly pulling the plastic and I got de-pants! After fixing the breezy situation, I had a good laugh.The mattress started filling up even before removing the air suctioned plastic. I quickly removed that. Filled out pretty nicely after about 12 hours and finished filling out by 72 hours.I do admit that my partner and I did have to sleep on it about 14 hours after setting it up, as we had no where else to lay our weary heads. It held up well. It did continue to fill out for the rest of the 72 hours. No problem there.The bed is more on the softer side but firm enough. As someone who has hip and back problems from sleeping on poor quality mattresses in the past, I was relieved to wake up without the morning pains! It feels like a nice hug that engulfs and supports you at the same time.The only cons we have experienced, and I waited a month and a half to write this, is the sides and corners are really not very supportive. Sitting on the edge of the bed is out of the question, unless you have your tushy way back on the bed itself. Otherwise you’re getting yeeted onto the floor.The other con is it is not motion isolating… at all. I can feel every move my partner makes when he rolls over or gets in or out of bed. In fact when he gets in bed, I swear it’s like the force is drawing me closer into him! I love him but I need my space sometimes lolSide note, if you are putting this on a platform bed frame, invest in some stoppers. The mattress will slide…. Constantly. Amazon does sell them and I purchased some that had smiley faces that work very well.Other than those cons I would recommend this mattress. But I will be looking for a different one when the time comes to replace it, one with more support sides and motion isolation.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States April 27, 2023', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Way better than my Serta-Simmons Beautyrest!', 'author': 'Jake From Statefarm', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'I’m picky. I will not sleep on an uncomfortable mattress. I recently bought a Serta-Simmons Beautyrest Silver BRS900 “Plush” King-sized mattress (They are no longer Simmons Beautyrest since they merged or got bought out). It seems since the merger they have completely destroyed the Beautyrest brand. I slept on Beautyrest mattresses for years that were very comfortable for the price. It seems that Serta-Simmons business practice is to make their entry level beds extremely uncomfortable, in order to steer customers towards paying thousands of dollars for one of their “Black Series” mattresses, which IMO are not even that comfortable. I personally tested out half a dozen Serta-Simmons Beautyrest Black series mattresses at mattress firm, and none of them were comfortable. The Silver line is just above their entry level mattress and cost me about $750 from Mattress Firm. That mattress was not remotely plush as it was advertised. It was firm. It was so uncomfortable that I started sleeping on my couch due to the severe hip pain it was causing me. I figured it was a long shot, but bought this mattress because many of the reviews described it as being “bouncy” and “soft”. The Serta-Simmons “Beautyrest” was definitely not bouncy or soft, it was stiff as a board. They should change their name to “Painfulrest”. The purveyors of Molblly should be proud of their product. I was prepared to be disappointed but they proved me wrong. This bed is very comfortable, and I can now sleep peacefully and wake up pain free*. Thank you Molblly, and for anyone considering buying a mattress, I highly recommend staying away from the Serta-Simmons Beautyrest brand, as since the merger between them and Serta (In my opinion Serta was always low-tier in terms of quality and comfort) their quality and comfort for the price has drastically been diminished.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States August 30, 2023', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '3.0 out of 5 stars Quite a bit softer than I expected', 'author': 'JR Siever', 'rating': 3, 'content': 'This is my first hybrid bed (inner spring plus foam), so it was a bit of a gamble. Bought this for our guest room. After unpacking it onto the box spring we had in the guest room, we left it uncovered to inflate to the advertised 12" thickness. We recently bought a RV queen of this same brand (memory foam) and it inflated to the advertised 10" in 24 hours. We left this one alone, using a room heater to make it quite hot in there (because they rise faster in warm environs, per the instructions) for 48 hours. After 24 hours it was at 11", but it didn\'t rise anymore at all at 48 hours (they say 48-72 hours to fully rise). It looked ok, so we put some sheets on it and I tried it out for a nap. Wow. I sank in deep (I am 5\' 11", 240 pounds). It felt "gooshy" but I stayed put. Went to my side and to my surprise found it to be really comfortable (I\'m a side sleeper and usually require a firm mattress). Now, I\'ve only spent one hour on it so far, so this is an early review, but I also rolled off the bed when I rolled to the opposite side. There is no edge support on this mattress, so it\'s also VERY soft on the edges. Recommended', 'author': 'BFH in SoCal', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'This Novilla, 12", full size mattress arrived quickly and was well packaged, but good thing I had a male friend around who could help me get it upstairs to the guest room where I wanted to use it. No worries though, scissors and an Exacto blade made quick work of releasing the mattress which began expanding immediately and was fully expanded the same night. All four corners also expanded completely (in contrast to a few other reviewers who said their\'s did not fill out the corners well.)This mattress was purchased to replace an older, thinner - 10 inch, and worn out "mattress in a box" made by another well known manufacturer. It is being used in a spare bedroom that I rent out to other roommates. I have not slept on it myself, but the new roommate says it\'s great! I did test it a little and did notice that the edges are not very firm so felt like I might fall off the side of the bed, but seems to be adequate, and the rest of the mattress feels very cushy and comfortable.A Plus! The plastic packaging is very thick and makes a wonderful Painter\'s dropcloth! Lots and lots of it! I\'ve saved it all for my next painting project.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States February 14, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Quite comfortable', 'author': 'jiaming zhou', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'My husband and I have been struggling to purchase a mattress for my son to sleep alone for months already. So the material is more safe for me.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States January 27, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '4.0 out of 5 stars More firm than expected', 'author': 'MGL', 'rating': 4, 'content': 'It’s taking me a while to get used to this mattress. title: Queen Mattresses 14 Inch Hybrid Mattress in a Box with Gel Memory Foam, Individually Wrapped Pocket Coils Innerspring, CertiPUR-US Certified, Pressure Relief & Support, Medium Firm
reviews: [{'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars The BEST Mattress Ever!!!!', 'author': 'Stephanie M Freeman', 'rating': 5, 'content': "I have been a little skeptical about buying a mattress off of Amazon for obvious reason, I was concerned about the quality of the products offered. My wife and I have been needing a new mattress for quite some time, yet the cost was always a pain point. Little did I know that there were less expensive options available so I decided to try one of them as a Christmas gift to us. I decided to sleep on the mattress for a week or two before I wrote my review to make sure that we were satisfied with it. First let me say that my wife LOVES this mattress and has loved it sine the first night we slept on it! Not only was it nearly fully inflated after only about 8-9 hours, but it continued to fill over the next 24 hours even after used that first night.Another thing we noticed is that in my research a lot of people complained that other mattresses did not fill on the edges making it unable to be sat on without slipping off. Not with this mattress! Even the corners were filled and firm and we both are able to sit on the edge. We both are 200- 300 pounds respectfully and we have had the best sleep than we have had in years! My wife said after the first night that she slept like a baby and had minimal to no pain in her body, even her knee which she has had surgery on five times was not as painful. I also have not experienced much pain and have minimal difficulty walking after waking up.After researching at least 10 different mattresses on Amazon, I am so glad that I chose this one, you will NOYT go wrong in getting this one. The price- EXCELLENT, the product- IMPECCABLE, the comfort- UNMATCHED! It has a soft yet firm feel that works and best of all... NO SMELL when it came out of the wrapping which I'd read from others was an issue. I am glad I chose this one, if you are on the fence with it- GET IT! I can't wait to get another for my guest room, I will be ordering again!", 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States January 9, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars This thing is amazing.', 'author': 'September Carman', 'rating': 5, 'content': "Okay. So....I'm getting old. I'm a tattoo artist, and I ride a motorcycle. My back ALWAYS HURTS. On top of all that I have anxiety....I'm a mom....and struggle to sleep in general. This is by far the most amazing mattress I've ever owned. My back doesn't hurt in the morning. I sleep SO GOOD. my dog loves it too (he's such a bed hog). It's got great support, but also cushiony enough. It's like.....a supportive cloud.I'm normally a side sleeper.....but lately I've been winding up on my back in my sleep. And sleeping on my back makes my back hurt sooooo bad. Not with this mattress! Doesn't matter how I sleep. I wake up pain free It's amazing. I slept on it the night I set it up.For reference.....I'm a hot sleeper. 230lbs. I bought the 14inch queen and have it on a slat bedframe.....no boxspring.With what I paid for this....if I get around 5 years out of it I will be happy. Deff money well spent. (Hoping it lasts longer but I swear it is worth every penny)Be forewarned....it is HEAVY. like.....as heavy as my old king memory foam mattress (which was a nectar and sucked after a year) and because this mattress is a hybrid and has the springs it will POP open when you cut the wrapping so just be careful and make sure you're out of the way 😉Also.....shout out to the Amazon delivery person who took the time to actually carry the box up the stairs to my porch.....you the real MVP. UPS left my equally heavy bedframe at the bottom of the stairs in the rain.", 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States March 1, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars An excellent hybrid for those unsure about memory foam mattresses', 'author': 'Nate', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'If you\'re anything like me, you spent the better part of the last decade with a memory foam mattress, back when companies were still working out the science of making these things comfortable. And your partner, the love of your life, hated it. Now that she\'s left you, you figure "well I guess I\'ll get a new one so at least it won\'t remind me of her".This mattress kicks butt. It\'s thick ("thicc" in cool kid speak), and manages to be both firm and forgiving. While the majority of my nights are sleepless or spent dreaming about my lost love, I can at least say there\'s no back pain. Combined with a pillow top, you\'re looking at a very solid (metaphorically speaking) mattress that will have you set for a while. Also, it\'s got plenty of room for your dogs if they sleep on the bed with you. Which mine do.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States February 29, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '4.0 out of 5 stars Great mattress on a budget!!!', 'author': 'Mark F. Byers', 'rating': 4, 'content': 'My wife and I badly needed a new mattress, but money’s tight right now . We’re both heavy so I was looking for a hybrid mattress but I was reluctant to get a boxed mattress from Amazon . A coworker told me about this mattress she and her husband got one and they love it so on her advice I got one, and she was right we love it . It’s firm but still soft enough to sleep on my side and be comfortable. I left it air out for three days and the smell was almost completely gone and it had fully expanded in 24 hours. The only complaint I have is that it has more give around the edge than I would like but you can still sit on it. All in all it’s a fantastic mattress at a very affordable price.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States February 17, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Soft, yet firm enough for me.', 'author': 'Davey Gravy', 'rating': 5, 'content': "I am a side sleeper and weigh about 265lbs. I am sleeping well, and once I figured how to shift my body on memory foam, I can't find an issue. Packing was sub par, but even with the box completely taped and bent the mattress still arrived fine. VERY HEAVY! This is not a one man operation to move when open, barely possible when boxed. When you install be sure to line the roll up on the bed platform orientated correctly so that when it POPS! open it will be right side up. There was some smell, but I did not find it bad, completely subsided after a couple days. I did let it sit open for about 15 hours before sleeping on it. 24 hours seemed to be the consensus of online sources, but being a hybrid with springs, I believe expansion is quicker, as there is not as much foam to deal with. If this mattress maintains this level of comfort, I will consider it a great purchase and a fantastic deal at 189$ I paid! I will alter review if things change. title: 5 Inch Twin Mattress for Kids Adults Cooling Gel Memory Foam Plus Pillowtop Mattress for Single Bed, CertiPUR-US® Certified Breathable Bed in a Box for Pressure Relief, Fiberglass-Free
reviews: [{'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Well worth the modest investment', 'author': 'Qeaw odett', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'I’ve never had a memory foam mattress and I really didn’t know how mainstream they are. It is so very comfortable. It is perfect in my eyes. I was on an air mattress I had to pump at least twice every night. So glad I have this memory foam mattress now. I paid with affirm even though it was only $100.It came in a relatively small box. The mattress comes folded lengthwise and rolled tightly. This made me skeptical. I should note that when you initially unroll it, you see the crease from where it was folded but this disappears completely very soon and I slept on the mattress less than two hours after unboxing. It was the best sleep I’ve had in months.The only drawback with the way I did it, and this is not due at all to the mattress, is laying it by itself on the ground you have to exert more effort to get on your feet. title: Queen Mattress, 8 inch Gel Memory Foam Mattress with CertiPUR-US Bed Mattress in a Box for Sleep Cooler & Pressure Relief, Queen Size
reviews: [{'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars A Sleep Oasis of Comfort and Quality', 'author': 'Halien', 'rating': 5, 'content': "I invested in the Molblly Queen Mattress, and it has proven to be an absolute game-changer in the realm of sleep comfort. This 10-inch Gel Memory Foam Mattress with CertiPUR-US certification has exceeded my expectations in every aspect, earning it a well-deserved 5-star review.Cloud-Like Comfort (5/5):The Molblly Queen Mattress provides a level of comfort that can only be described as cloud-like. The 10-inch gel memory foam contours to my body, offering the perfect balance of support and softness. Each night feels like a luxurious embrace, ensuring a restful and rejuvenating sleep experience.Gel Memory Foam Magic (5/5):The inclusion of gel memory foam is a stroke of genius. Firm and Supportive!', 'author': 'DMF', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'This is exactly what I needed. Firm and supportive, great for back pain. Really improved my sleep! Shipped super fast once it was in stock.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States February 4, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Not even 24hrs Yet-UPDATED 10/1/23', 'author': 'Tina Holloman', 'rating': 5, 'content': "October 2023 Update at the bottom of this review!!!So, it hasn't been EVEN 24hrs yet. So you may be wondering why I am even doing this review. Honestly because I am truly excited to see what's next! It was easy to unpack, roll out and come back in the morning as see this. I rolled it out at about 7pm, and now it's 12pm the next day and I am not disappointed, YET. I followed the instructions and it says the amount of time to allow the mattress to expand. Now mind you when I rolled this mattress out I was like THERE IS NO WAY it's going to get where I bought especially for the price! Well I am going to wait another day so 7pm Monday night (its Sunday 12pm now) and finally get me some rest and not on the air mattress I am sleeping on, and then review again. So far so good!It's Tuesday and YES STILL 5 STARS! Bed expanded and so comfortable. I am be honest, I didn't even wait til Tuesday. I got in this sucker 2 hrs before it even hit 24hrs. I was a little worried because when I did I was disappointed that it was too soft, but then when I got in it the next night....IT WAS FIRMER AND I DIDNT SINK IN! It really is a great bed and I have no complaints! It expanded to its full potential of 12inches, no defects and I have not sweated one dag on time (old lady thing going on) but yeah... it was cheaper than I even wanted to spend so it's a win win for me! Good Luck!Update 10/1/2023:: So... I had to buy a EXTRA FIRM Mattress topper because we kept sinking. But that's not the companies fault, I choose the FIRM mattress instead of a EXTRA FIRM. I am still happy with my choice and had to make adjustments because of my lack of product knowledge. My husband tried to tell me but I didn't want a rock bed! But come to find out, that's exactly what I want...lol! So if you have back problems, like a mattress with less probability of sinking, or even two people who want to sleep close together....get the extra firm by this company.", 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States March 12, 2023', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '3.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable but smelly -update-', 'author': 'Aaron', 'rating': 3, 'content': 'I have two different king sized sheets to fully wrap this mattress to keep the smell down. NO , it never goes away. Ive had it for 2 years now. Update. 3 years . Still , the smell of this is SO STRONG. Like , its not even gone down a little bit since the day I bought it. That is with the wrapped sheets. I needed to use plastic wrap or something. I wont be taking this with me when I move and I wont be buying another one. However, giant foam style does have its advantages. I will say that it hasnt lost any form or function after all this time and I know springs would have been permanently worn and sagging by now. I sit in the same spot on this bed all day so it will sag after a while. Rotate it around and its good to go for another week. It will sag a little but I mean ive had fully supported and cushy rest for 3 years straight with no signs of this material weakening. It smells like textile chemicals though but if you solve that, or at least dampen it , it should serve you well. I weight 140lbs. This is also important. You dont want to get the thickness I got and weigh more than 150. At 140 im fully supported but after hours , when its fully settled, im supported but I can feel that I have no more room left for compression. Certain positions of sitting will hurt your back if your not sitting with your back against something. This is one property that spring mattresses beat it on. The support while sitting indian style with no back rest is terrible. Basically its not really stiff enough. In my opinion , whatever the stiffest you can get , get it. It will still be soft and cushy because its foam but you wont sink as much and that will save your back. Its pretty great for sleeping flat though. In that respect it feels better than spring mattresses that were good. My grandmothers bed was the most comfy ever but it wore out too. This foam doesnt really wear out but its never going to be quite as stiff as a spring set could be even on the thickest version. I have a queen it says but its closer to a Full+ . For my size I dont think two people would fit under every circumstance comfortably. Sure two people can fit but rolling in the night and the extra room for all that wont be there. You also cant rely on stock frames. Because it has no springs you need a lot of wooden planks on your frame to keep from sagging down in a spot that isnt supported(you will drop). I had to buy 6x8 wooden boards to lay on the metal frame and it took freakin 7 of em. I really should have gotten 9. No, not a single flat piece of sub floor. Trust me. Planks. Dont spill anything on it because its a giant sponge. I always sit on it with plenty of blankets and sheets underneath. Im grateful for it even though the smell sucks. If im honest, if you dont cover it or wrap it, you wont be able to bear it.Pros - Living alone, you just sleep on a different side each night or even switch sides in the middle of the night for good support and comfort all night. It doesnt wear down like a spring mattress does and with the use of support pillows, you can get all the comfort you really need out of a single person. 10 inch is the minimum thickness in my opinion. Its lighter than most and can be easily moved around the room on its base. The queen I got gives my 5 10 inch body plenty of room all around. I can sprawl out any which way I want.Cons - The smell is always strong unless you wrap it up. I even tried plastic wrap at one point but switched to 2 king sized sheets. If you keep it wrapped it will cut the smell down by 70 percent.Dont spill anything on it but water. Its a giant sponge. To clean a spill, you will need to equally soak it again and then sponge it up somehow. Avoid all spills on foam matts. It does form to your body after a while and it can lead to higher body temps. Choose bed sheets that are light and comforters that let your body breathe more than the thicker fluffier others. Avoid large pillows for your head as the body will sink a little into the foam. Avoid really firm pillows for the same reason. It can be a little tricky to find the right balance of heat of comfort but I enjoy this mattress anyway. Its a bit of a pain, but its been better value for something equal in springs. A queen mattress with springs with the support I want would be much more than this cost me.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States November 11, 2021', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '4.0 out of 5 stars Moblly gel memory mattress', 'author': 'Missy', 'rating': 4, 'content': 'Needed to replace my broken down old mattress on a tight budget. The Moblly 10" gel memory foam mattress is a nice comfortable mattress. It arrived well packaged and protected. The only issue I had was the little "letter opener" to cut off the plastic wrapping the mattress was in was inside all that packaging so had to open by hand. Not that big of a deal. The mattress weighs about 70 lbs. It unfolds and plumps to shape pretty quickly. The mattress for the money is a good investment. I like the quality. The material is soft and comfortable. It\'s a little firmer than I expected, but overall it is comfortable to sleep on. If you\'re on a tight budget and want comfort and quality, the Moblly is a good mattress.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States November 5, 2023', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '4.0 out of 5 stars More like extra firm', 'author': 'Amazon Customer', 'rating': 4, 'content': "Description says medium firm, but I'd place it more as a firm to extra firm. Overall great mattress for the price, no other real complaints.", 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States February 20, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '4.0 out of 5 stars A little hard but otherwise good.', 'author': 'Holly Hoy', 'rating': 4, 'content': 'This was a little rough to sleep on the first couple nights. I was upgrading from a spring mattress with a 4” memory foam topper to this mattress. I lucked out and saved the foam topper. It’s great with it. Still more firm than the spring/foam combo, which is what I needed. But with the topper, it’s perfect. If you’re into super firm mattresses, this is it for you. But if you’re looking for something a little more firm than what you have but not too firm, beware that this medium firm mattress is FIRM. Very firm. Next time I replace a mattress, I’d buy from this company again based on quality and timeliness, but I personally would go with a softer option.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States December 20, 2023', 'is_verified': True}]

After 20 minutes of trying to get the outer plastic unraveled for the mattress (amazon dudes), we slapped the bed in the middle of the room, they took the packaging, and all was good.My bed frame was coming in 2 days after mattress delivery, so the mattress had time to breath, foam could raise a bit and I was not sleeping yet in apartment.Fast forward to having the mattress on the bed with sheets and my first night of sleep on the mattress. I saw Nectar on their web site quoted this ------> 8” Infinity innerspring coils with extra edge support <-------So in the middle of the night I need a bathroom break, swung my legs like I had been doing for years on previous mattress with my butt on the edge of the bed, and the EDGE JUST COMPLETELY COLLAPSES and I almost do a face plant on the floor and wall. reviews: [{'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Solid mattress, no complaints after 1 year', 'author': 'Amazon Customer', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'I waited a year to write this review - I purchased the full size in the 12 inch height and medium firmness. I do sleep in the same spot most nights. There has been no "nest built" in that spot. The mattress is firm, but not concrete firm. I sleep very well and comfortable. Also, I don\'t get hot. For reference, I am 5\'8 and weigh 210lbs.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States February 3, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '4.0 out of 5 stars Big box mattress stores are a scam', 'author': 'michelle brantley', 'rating': 4, 'content': 'Quick review: didn’t smell, expanded fully in 24 hours, sleeps great, no noise.Long review: This is the cheapest queen mattress I could find on Amazon. I knew it was gonna be either really hit or miss but this thing is on the money for the price.I opened it up and let it inflate for about 2 days. It had a nice smell but you could only smell it if you put your nose up to it. No overwhelming pungent factory smell.The first night I slept on it, I woke up really refreshed. Mind you, I came from a mattress that’s about 25 years old and I was convinced I’d never find a mattress more comfortable than it. I sleep on my back, sides, stomach and I toss and turn. I’m 6’2” and 190 lbs and this thing has completely exceeded my expectations for what I paid. I put a cheap slat bed frame under it and a couple memory foam cooling pillows from Ross and i actually felt like I needed to turn the heat on in the middle of the night because the bed & pillows had stayed so cold.My only gripe is if you sit on the edge of the bed getting ready in the morning it does sink in. Otherwise, it’s very comfortable and stays nice and cool as I get hot very easily.9/10. I would recommend this mattress to any one not looking to pay for big name mattresses.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States November 9, 2023', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Just buy it!', 'author': 'Shelby', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'I have to admit I was skeptical because the price was so low.
