title: Mattress, 12 Inch Hybrid Queen Size Foam Mattress in a Box, Individually Wrapped Pocket Coils Innerspring, Pressure-Relieving and Supportive, Non-Fiberglass Mattressess 12 * 60 * 80 Inch
reviews: [{'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Supportive, comfortable and good value!', 'author': 'T Leap', 'rating': 5, 'content': "I've been sleeping on this mattress for a couple of weeks before writing this review. It's firm but not too firm. It is my first hybrid mattress. I like the combination of the memory foam and the coils. I don't wake up with any aches from being a side sleeper. Extra perk, if my husband gets up during the night, I can't feel it. I recommend this mattress...comfortable and good value.", 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States February 17, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars A truthful testimonial', 'author': 'Cindy Z', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'I needed to replace a king mattress in my summer home but didn’t want to spend a lot of money. I had no idea what to expect, knowing it would be in a box, inflate & how would it even feel when slept on. The process was fascinating to watch. You don’t have to wait long for it to inflate. The mattress is very luxurious.The design is not only well made, but classy. Now, for the test drive. It’s beyond comfortable. Probably the best sleep I’ve had. I spent a fortune on my mattress back home. This is like sleeping on a cloud. Shockingly surprised. It’s amazing. Don’t hesitate at all on this one!', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States January 27, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '4.0 out of 5 stars Good Bed', 'author': 'Crystal H.', 'rating': 4, 'content': 'This was the first bed in a box I have purchased from Amazon.Arrived quickly, even before it said it would (a definite plus) packed well. Now when the delivery guy just hoisted it up on his shoulder and set it on my porch, I thought how heavy can it really be? I found out pretty quickly! Now I’m not a weakling but I struggled getting the box up a small step into my house! I admit, after that I dragged it to my bedroom!Set up was easy. Unboxed it. Unrolled the mattress. This is where I must share a warning of caution…..When you are unrolling the plastic from the air suctioned plastic…. Make sure your pants are secured and that the rolling doesn’t catch the bottom of your pants. Needless to say, I did not. My pajama pant legs got caught up in the rolling unbeknownst to me, as I was excitedly pulling the plastic and I got de-pants! After fixing the breezy situation, I had a good laugh.The mattress started filling up even before removing the air suctioned plastic. I quickly removed that. Filled out pretty nicely after about 12 hours and finished filling out by 72 hours.I do admit that my partner and I did have to sleep on it about 14 hours after setting it up, as we had no where else to lay our weary heads. It held up well. It did continue to fill out for the rest of the 72 hours. No problem there.The bed is more on the softer side but firm enough. As someone who has hip and back problems from sleeping on poor quality mattresses in the past, I was relieved to wake up without the morning pains! It feels like a nice hug that engulfs and supports you at the same time.The only cons we have experienced, and I waited a month and a half to write this, is the sides and corners are really not very supportive. Sitting on the edge of the bed is out of the question, unless you have your tushy way back on the bed itself. Otherwise you’re getting yeeted onto the floor.The other con is it is not motion isolating… at all. I can feel every move my partner makes when he rolls over or gets in or out of bed. In fact when he gets in bed, I swear it’s like the force is drawing me closer into him! I love him but I need my space sometimes lolSide note, if you are putting this on a platform bed frame, invest in some stoppers. The mattress will slide…. Constantly. Amazon does sell them and I purchased some that had smiley faces that work very well.Other than those cons I would recommend this mattress. But I will be looking for a different one when the time comes to replace it, one with more support sides and motion isolation.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States April 27, 2023', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Way better than my Serta-Simmons Beautyrest!', 'author': 'Jake From Statefarm', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'I’m picky. I will not sleep on an uncomfortable mattress. I recently bought a Serta-Simmons Beautyrest Silver BRS900 “Plush” King-sized mattress (They are no longer Simmons Beautyrest since they merged or got bought out). It seems since the merger they have completely destroyed the Beautyrest brand. I slept on Beautyrest mattresses for years that were very comfortable for the price. It seems that Serta-Simmons business practice is to make their entry level beds extremely uncomfortable, in order to steer customers towards paying thousands of dollars for one of their “Black Series” mattresses, which IMO are not even that comfortable. I personally tested out half a dozen Serta-Simmons Beautyrest Black series mattresses at mattress firm, and none of them were comfortable. The Silver line is just above their entry level mattress and cost me about $750 from Mattress Firm. That mattress was not remotely plush as it was advertised. It was firm. It was so uncomfortable that I started sleeping on my couch due to the severe hip pain it was causing me. I figured it was a long shot, but bought this mattress because many of the reviews described it as being “bouncy” and “soft”. The Serta-Simmons “Beautyrest” was definitely not bouncy or soft, it was stiff as a board. They should change their name to “Painfulrest”. The purveyors of Molblly should be proud of their product. I was prepared to be disappointed but they proved me wrong. This bed is very comfortable, and I can now sleep peacefully and wake up pain free*. Thank you Molblly, and for anyone considering buying a mattress, I highly recommend staying away from the Serta-Simmons Beautyrest brand, as since the merger between them and Serta (In my opinion Serta was always low-tier in terms of quality and comfort) their quality and comfort for the price has drastically been diminished.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States August 30, 2023', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '3.0 out of 5 stars Quite a bit softer than I expected', 'author': 'JR Siever', 'rating': 3, 'content': 'This is my first hybrid bed (inner spring plus foam), so it was a bit of a gamble. Bought this for our guest room. After unpacking it onto the box spring we had in the guest room, we left it uncovered to inflate to the advertised 12" thickness. We recently bought a RV queen of this same brand (memory foam) and it inflated to the advertised 10" in 24 hours. We left this one alone, using a room heater to make it quite hot in there (because they rise faster in warm environs, per the instructions) for 48 hours. After 24 hours it was at 11", but it didn\'t rise anymore at all at 48 hours (they say 48-72 hours to fully rise). It looked ok, so we put some sheets on it and I tried it out for a nap. Wow. I sank in deep (I am 5\' 11", 240 pounds). It felt "gooshy" but I stayed put. Went to my side and to my surprise found it to be really comfortable (I\'m a side sleeper and usually require a firm mattress). Now, I\'ve only spent one hour on it so far, so this is an early review, but I also rolled off the bed when I rolled to the opposite side. There is no edge support on this mattress, so it\'s also VERY soft on the edges. All in all I will keep it and try sleeping on it in the future just to be sure I\'m not subjecting guests to another crappy mattress (like the one I am replacing).', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States September 8, 2023', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars I love my new bed', 'author': 'Jen C.', 'rating': 5, 'content': "I am a mom of 3 and I never buy myself new things. I had my old bed for literally years!!! Also my friend had it for a few years before I had it. I had so many aches and pains that I had to do something. I am so glad I got this new mattress. My hips feel great and my back is finally not killing me.If you're looking for a new mattress that isnt going to break your bank I strongly recommend this one.✨Caution when opening because it almost took me out. I probably should have figured out which way was the long way before I cut the plastic. reviews: [{'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Very comfy', 'author': 'Bologna', 'rating': 5, 'content': "For those seeking an economically sound mattress option, this product stands out as a commendable choice. Its exceptional comfort, characterized by a soft and relaxing texture, became evident during a 30-minute trial, inducing a sense of imminent restfulness. Nevertheless, the overall mattress quality is impressive, offering a superb balance between comfort and back support, making it an excellent investment for those prioritizing a comfortable sleep experience.", 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States January 21, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': "5.0 out of 5 stars First mattress in a box and couldn't be more impressed", 'author': 'Amazon Customer', 'rating': 5, 'content': "This was my first time ever buying a mattress in a box. I was surprised when it showed up and the mattress was rolled up in a smaller box.I had read other reviews about this mattress and those ratings and reviews led me to buy this. It\'s too "giving" and lacks a firmness that\'s not going to make my back hurt in the morning.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States February 6, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '4.0 out of 5 stars Best inexpensive mattress I have ever slept on.', 'author': 'Dale', 'rating': 4, 'content': "I am a big guy; I normally sleep on a purple 4, and I sleep on my side. I got my wife a new bed frame that was more fitting for the house based on a wooded cabin, while we moved out the old one to the Guest bedroom. I was not going to give up my mattress, too, so we figured, seeing as it will likely only get 2- 3 weeks of use a year, I would get a less expensive mattress on Amazon. I did a little research and found this one. While we waited for the new bed frame to come in, we slept on this in the guest room as the one I normally sleep on is a bear to move. I actually slept well and didn't find myself starting and turning like I Thought I would. I will say it was like sleeping on a very very good hotel Mattress. It is nice to know if the wife is mad at me I have a place to go and still be comfortable to sleep.", 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States January 22, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '4.0 out of 5 stars It’s too firm for comfort', 'author': 'Catlikethief', 'rating': 4, 'content': 'I was a little disappointed with this one. The mattress price was great, delivery was a breeze - everything is what I was aiming for except it’s too firm. All of the sleep quizzes I took said that a medium firm mattress is best for side sleeping, but I think those are only accurate if you disregard body frame and weight. For instance, I’m 5’5” and 135lbs. I feel like I’m not heavy enough to experience the benefits of a firm mattress so I end up just jabbing my pressure points into the surface of the mattress. Heavier people who have sat on it say it’s too soft (they are crazy). After doing more research though I should have gone with a medium plush mattress. It’s all cool though - I bought a plush mattress topper that has remedied the firm issue and now I know better for future reference.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States January 6, 2024', 'is_verified': True}]

title: 14" Twin Mattress - Luxury Hybrid Gel Memory Foam - 365 Night Trial - 7 Premium Pressure-Relieving Layers - Forever Warranty - CertiPUR-US Certified
reviews: [{'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars I feel RESTED!', 'author': 'YimYorn', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'I purchased the DreamCloud Premier after months-long research of all the beds in a box. I don’t know much about beds, so I used a lot of reviews and resources to educate myself in purchasing this mattress.Disclaimer: I am coming from years ago Costco Sealy that was purchased for around $300.1. Unboxing: amazing experience, it came with no damage to the shipping box, as I’ve seen with other boxes that are literally torn. It was neatly compressed and fully airtight. (A bit heavy for one person, you will need two persons to lift it upstairs)2. Expansion, bed expanded well, I didn’t measure it but it looks fully expanded from its edges. I allowed 8 hours to expand because I had no choice or space to wait 24 hours. Edges are sturdy enough for me 170 lbs. Though the pillow top sinks a little more so it looks like less support, but it’s really not.3. Feel: the Euro Top, is a game changer! If your bedsheets are soft you can take advantage of the top layer for the same and snuggle feel. The bed feels firm, but the pillow top adds that “plush” but without the sinking feel. It’s hard to explain but it feels comfortable and supportive.4. I tracked my sleep with my Apple Watch, and it looks like I had more deep and rem sleep, with this mattress compared to my previous one. Though, I can physically feel the rest.5. Cooling: I normally sweat when I sleep. I’m not sure if it was my new bedsheets but I’m sure the mattress did something. The first time I didn’t sweat in my sleep! It didn’t feel hot and I didn’t need to stick out one leg for cooling!Conclusion:If you can get viscose or new soft bedsheets this mattress experience will elevate. Overall, for its price and the upgrade to the Premier is well worth it. It firms but provides that plush feel for a stomach sleeper, my wife is a back sleeper and knocked out almost instantly. I didn’t feel pain or aches on my first sleep! And I’m grateful for a good night\'s rest, I will recommend the DreamCloud Premier version for lightweight and stomach sleepers, but I’m sure this is good for back and side sleepers as well. Now for longevity, we will see, and if I remember I’ll come back and update my experience on here.-----3 Week UPDATE:I am so happy with this purchase and my wife is as well. I am a stomach sleeper and my wife is a back sleeper. I look forward to going to sleep! Time flies in bed because it\'s so easy to fall asleep. My wife and I no joke have had more "vivid dreams" ever since we got this mattress I know it sounds ironic but it\'s pretty funny, not sure if the deep sleep you go into that causes this but I\'m no scientist. It\'s so hard to get out of bed at times because you\'re so cozy. I also picked a Coop cooling memory foam pillow and oh my gee the combo of bedsheets + pillow + mattress is such a life-changing experience. I know the cost is expensive but, you owe it to yourself. You spend a good portion of your life sleeping, so make a good one. I really hope this mattress holds up to what I feel now for the coming years. Oh, and the edge support is great, feels squishy but it\'s strong enough to hold while I my socks or eat on a side table.-----I Dont Know How Long UPDATE:It\'s been quite some time, but I came back to update my review. So far so good, my bed feels great, my sleep has been great, and my dreams are becoming nightmares but it\'s all good, got to fight my demons somehow.Dreamcloud has been broken in and it feels the same but you can tell it\'s not too too firm anymore, like .5 less firm. No issues with the construction or comfort. My little jumps on the bed constantly and no issues so far. Edge support is great for the morning while I put my shoes/clothes on. My wife doesn\'t get woken up in between my nightly strolls to the bathroom. I have noticed if I sleep more than 9+ hours I am getting pain but I don\'t think that is the cause of the bed and more my sleeping angle.I think the one thing that DreamCloud excels in is the pillow top, and I truly feel this is a great distinction from the hundreds of memory foam mattresses out there. I am still happy with the purchase and hope this bed can last a very long time.---Update:Still great mattress and I paired it with Sheex Duvet and Hotel Sheets Direct bedsheets and I feel I am at endgame mattress level.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States May 27, 2023', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable, and sturdy', 'author': 'Kristopher', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'The mattress is quite comfortable. It is a bit of a stiffer mattress, but that is how I prefer my mattresses. I am a heavier person, but do not find myself sinking into the mattress in an uncomfortable way. Overall I am sleeping better on this mattress than I have many other mattresses.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States March 2, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect name Dream Cloud', 'author': 'K Harris', 'rating': 5, 'content': "I can truly say. I love my dream cloud.It is perfect. I sleep so well. It's not too hard or soft.It is 14 inches in height.I am able to use my king-size sheets for the Queen 14 inch. I assume because of the height why i can use my king-size sheets. They fit perfectly.", 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States March 4, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '4.0 out of 5 stars Good bed, but packaging needs some work!', 'author': 'Brian', 'rating': 4, 'content': "This is the second review I am writing for this bed.The first was not allowed by Amazon, citing my review focused on packaging and delivery rather than the actual bed.Ok, I grant them that but packaging and delivery is a very huge aspect of such an expensive purchase. When you order something that costs just a few dollars shy of $1800, one would expect a well packaged product. The first bed we received was in a beat up box, the bed was not sealed in plastic and when I opened the end of the box the bed was filthy. So yeah, I wrote a bad review citing JUST the poor packaging and delivery but also stating that I couldn't review the mattress until a new one arrived and that I would update the review. Amazon told me to write a review of the seller instead.Well, the seller was Amazon, but this was not their fault though so I didn't think writing a review of them would be fair. Packaging was a manufacturer issue, not an Amazon issue.Amazon reps worked to get us a replacement mattress and it was a pretty easy process. They did a great job there. The packaging is the real issue, the boxes are just not sturdy enough to hold such a large item. Again, that is from the manufacturer, not Amazon. If the mattress is in sealed plastic it should be ok. The first one wasn't in sealed plastic and was filthy. Although I was weary about getting a replacement after seeing the condition of the first one, I knew I could return it to Amazon if it came in poor condition. Also I knew I could return it with the 365 day trial so we gave it another go.The new one arrived in a box that was worse than the first but the mattress was completly sealed so I was good with giving it a try.This thing was heavy, so make sure you have someone to help move it. it is rolled up so make saure you unroll it on your bedfarame or box springs.We got it upstairs and onto the box springs. I started to unwrap it and noticed there were some gel packets on the underside (the anti-moisture packets) so I tore a small hole in the plastic and pulled them out. The bed started to expand right away, which was awesome. It wasn't like a spring or anything, just you could see it start to expand.We got it unrolled and found the little tool to cut the plastic off which made it very easy to complete. Took the plastic off and in about 5 minutes this thing was full size and uncompressed. We left it overnight, as per instructions, but didn't sleep on it until 72 hours later. It was full size by the morning though.So far it is a little stiff but was comfortable from the git go. My wife said she woke up feeling pretty good. Our old mattress was giving us both back pains and shoulder pains, but we didn't have that with this mattress.The mattress is a bit stiff right now, but has become more comfortable after a week of sleeping on it.We are giving it a full month or two to see how it goes but for now it has become pretty comfortable.We got the pillow top version.The pro:Looks really niceThe pillow top is very comfortableWe don't have any back pain after a night of sleep.The sides of the mattress seem very sturdy. On our original mattress (beauty rest black), one of the sides is collapsing. We don't see that as an issue with this one, besides if it does there is a lifetime warranty.The lifetime warranty is an excellent benefit, as is the 365 day trial.The cons:The packaging needs some addressing. the box simply is not sturdy enough to handle such a massive object. Amazon was good in replacing the damaged one but I recommend opening the end of the box to inspect the packaging. If the entire mattress is not sealed, have it replaced.I can't say the price is a con because our other mattress was about $700 more expensive so we feel this one was a pretty good deal. I would watch for promotions.Final thoughts: So far this is a very good mattress and we are pretty happy with the purchase. In comparison to our other mattress, this one is far more comfortable and you can't beat the trial period or the lifetime warranty.I will update this if anything changes but so far so good...zzzzzzzzzzzzzz", 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States July 1, 2023', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Supportive, comfortable!', 'author': 'M. Fuentes', 'rating': 5, 'content': "Lives up to promise of support and comfort. The value is crazy! We saved 2K compared to what is out there. Very satisfied. It has helped resolve my morning backache! It's a beautiful thing.", 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States February 26, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '1.0 out of 5 stars Inaccurate description- Impossible to return', 'author': 'Shelby', 'rating': 1, 'content': 'This mattress is advertised as "medium firm". Haha- nothing "firm" about this mattress. You sink 2+ inches into it when you lay on it. Has more in common with a half-inflated air mattress.The main issue comes with attempting to return it! As it comes vacuum-sealed (bed-in-a-box), you are unable to return the mattress once you open it. Amazon customer service offered me a partial refund and keep the mattress. This did not help, as I still had to purchase a different mattress at full price. So after discussing it with customer service, a full refund and keep the mattress was offered. Great....but now I\'m stuck with a mattress I can\'t use and have no place to store. I can\'t even give the mattress away because it is too soft.The refund I was told I would be receiving....never processed through. I reached back out to Amazon customer service. I was told it was due to technical glitches and they would correct the issue. Mmhmm...yeah, we\'ll have to wait and see if they have any further "technical glitches" or can follow through.(I also had to contact them aboutanother item this happened with. Returned item...they stated item received and issued refund. Only few weeks later...item never received and will re-charge me for this item. This happened TWICE WITH THIS ITEM.)My advice to Amazon....fix your glitches and communication.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States January 23, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Dreamcloud mattress', 'author': 'TD', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'This is one of the best purchases i have ever made in a mattress!!! It is a perfectly made and a comfortable mattress!!! Very pleased with this product and the price was great and the delivery with help was awesome TY', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States February 18, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars The name says it all.', 'author': 'N. Hastie', 'rating': 5, 'content': "This review will be presented in multiple segments as time progresses. Firstly, I'd like to commend Amazon for its exceptional mattress delivery service. The delivery driver arrived promptly, and I noticed the delivery truck from my office window. They efficiently unloaded the mattress onto a hand truck and delivered it to my front door. I was prepared with my own hand truck, and the transfer went off without a hitch. It's important to note that this mattress is quite heavy, so I recommend having more than one person available if you need to transport it upstairs. Fortunately, we have a single-story home, making it a breeze to roll the mattress into the bedroom.Now, regarding the unpacking instructions: Begin by keeping the box in an upright position and cut the tape around the top. After making the cut, gently lay the box on its side. Reach inside and extract the mattress by gripping the outer plastic covering (there are two layers of plastic covering on this mattress). The mattress is folded in half, so position it close to the bed frame or box spring. Remove the outer plastic wrapping by pulling it out from underneath the mattress. Unfold the mattress so that it aligns with the frame or box spring.Next, grab and pull the second plastic cover, and carefully puncture a small hole in it. You'll hear a hissing sound, which is the air escaping from the factory shrink wrap. Using the provided cutter, remove all of the second plastic cover from the mattress. It will begin to expand. At this point, utilize the handles on the sides of the mattress to place it on the frame or box spring. The manufacturer's literature states that it may take up to 24 hours for the mattress to fully expand. However, in our experience, it expanded completely in just about 4 hours. Nonetheless, we followed the instructions and allowed it to expand into the guest bedroom for one night. I'm pleased to report that there was absolutely no off-gassing with the Dream Cloud mattress.The first night on it was amazing. More to follow.Day 3: The initial three nights of rest were truly amazing. The mattress offers the right level of firmness where it matters, without being excessively firm all around. I do experience slight neuropathy in my legs, and after the third night, I observed that it had somewhat improved. While I'm not entirely convinced that the mattress is solely responsible for this improvement, I haven't made any significant changes to my routine since sleeping on it. Additionally, my back feels more comfortable, and I'm able to switch between sleeping on my side and back with ease. I would recommend a mattress cover and this one on Amazon fit the bill. https://www.amazon.com/dp/B09QM5PLBD?ref=ppx_yo2ov_dt_b_product_details&th=1", 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States September 17, 2023', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '4.0 out of 5 stars Love this bed so far!', 'author': 'Divine010', 'rating': 4, 'content': "It's only been one month since I've purchased the bed. So I may come back and give it a 5-star rating once I've slept in it for at least 6 months. So far I love the hybrid version of this mattress. I used to think that I was going to have to sleep on foam beds for the rest of my life, as I wasn't a fan of spring beds. So far I am loving how I feel in the morning. When it's not raining, I can wake up with no problem and I am not restless.", 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States March 6, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Loving this mattress so far', 'author': 'Barbara OBarr', 'rating': 5, 'content': "I don't normally write reviews on products, but this mattress is worth writing about. I researched a lot of websites on the best mattresses to buy and finally chose this one. I was a little worried that it wouldn't be what I wanted as far as comfort. I like a plushy bed and this one is PERFECT. I LOVE it!! and so happy I bought it. For the price, it's well worth it. My old mattress cost over $2,000 and isn't nearly as comfortable as this one. I also love the handles on the sides which makes it easier to move. I am thinking of getting another for my guest room.", 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States February 24, 2024', 'is_verified': True}]

title: Rest Only Queen Mattress for Pressure Relief, 12 Inches Cooling Gel Memory Foam Hybrid Mattress, Queen Mattress in a Box with Individual Pocket Spring for Motion Isolation, Medium Firm
reviews: [{'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Twin Mattresse 10"', 'author': 'La morada gomez', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'I purchased the Twin Mattresses 10" for my daughter and it does not leave any gap between the headboard, the mattress cover is nice and well made. And the foam adapts itself to the body shape and it makes your sleep super smooth. I love it we opened and the mattress got expanded within an 30 minutes it was ready to lay down, The price is great , good quality my daughter loves her new mattresses . 😀😀☺️', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States January 27, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars General review.', 'author': 'KEPC', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'I waited a few days after using the mattress to give a real review. It has a very good consistency, the gel top makes a plus for it, repelling body’s heat. It is very compact and solid, however it does not feel hard to sleep. I heard that foam mattresses are hot, so I want to get the gel top to have a more comfortable sleep; the foam adapts itself to the body shape and it makes your sleep super smooth. We purchased the 10” mattress and it does not leave any gap between the headboard, the mattress cover is nice and well made. The price is great, I found the same mattress in a different brand for $89 more for a full size. I got it for my young daughter and she loves her new mattress. The delivery was super accurate as we were notified, we received it early in the morning, we opened and the mattress got expanded within an hour, we did not cover it all day to give plenty time to get completely expanded and it was ready for sleep same night. Good price, good quality, very happy with this purchase!!', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States November 6, 2023', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '4.0 out of 5 stars Awesome quality and value, suspect firmness', 'author': 'The Breakdown', 'rating': 4, 'content': "It's amazing how much some modern hybrid mattress go for (think Caspar) and their exorbitant cost makes one wonder where the value proposition is. Many people looked to places like Ikea recently to find comparable quality at much better price points as we have recently. The amount of 'tech' is fairly basic with those however but here with this RO Rest Only mattress it seems one can get most of the 'tech' feature set like CertiPUR-US Certified foam, gel-infused memory intermediate foam layer, individually-pocketed metal support coils, temperature-controlling foam top, etc. without having to give up a rent payment.Construction of this 10-inch version seems to be top-notch with manufacturing of this coming out of South Korea. Well packaged and shipped out bundled like a california roll, it was surprisingly heavy and some care was needed when opening that it didn't fling us back when the protective plastic sheathing was removed. Noting the unboxing process was helped with RO providing a plastic letter opening gadget to assist in cutting through the wrapper and not slicing the mattress, a nice touch. The biggest ding however is that the firmness level of the mattress is nowhere near a 'medium-firm' mattress compared to the other hybrid mattresses that we have which were also rated as roughly medium-firm. If the buyer has a want for a mattress on the softer side with a faux mattress topper feel then this could very well be one of the best values out on the market but as such, it's hard to get used to the fluffiness of the top layer before experiencing the 'structure' of the bedding. YMMV as comfort levels are subjective but the consensus among us who tried it at least is that it's a great buy for those looking for a more pillow-y hybrid rather than the more cushion-y trad hybrid versions out there.", 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States November 6, 2023', 'is_verified': False}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful bed', 'author': 'JCW', 'rating': 5, 'content': "I was using an blow up mattress, I live in a studio apartment. I brought this full size mattress, it is comfortable and I'm sleeping better than before. I hope it last a long time. ITS full size but I use queen sheets and comforters. I haven't slept this well in a long time. I'm glad I purchased this bed. It was well wrapped and and boxed well also. It unrolled with ease, no bad smell. So far so good. It is a med firm which is fine for me.", 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States October 30, 2023', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Very comfortable', 'author': 'S&J Dennis', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'This mattress was better than we could have expected', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States August 14, 2023', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars It’s comfortable', 'author': 'Angel', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'It’s worth the buy', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States July 31, 2023', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Soft to sit on , firm to lay on', 'author': 'Randy DAmore', 'rating': 5, 'content': "I also own a 10-inch foam mattress, so I think the best way to describe how I feel is to compare the two. This is a hybrid foam with pocket springs. I noticed that when I first sat on the mattress it was more soft and springy than my foam mattress. It has the feel that any kid would enjoy if they were jumping on their bed. My foam mattress doesn't have that type of give. Yet when I slept on it, the mattress had that firm feeling to it. So if you like to have a little bounce back from a mattress, this will give you that type of feel.I have an adjustable bed. If you are curious how these mattresses bend when you are using an adjustable bed, well the general answer is they don't, unless someone is laying on them. Mattresses are not bean bags so you need weight in the middle and in the leg/foot area if the mattresses are going to conform to the adjustable bed. Other than that, if you are lying on it, the adjustable bed and mattress will rise in a manner you would want if you are going to watch TV or read a book, but if no one is in the bed, they stay flat and just rise with the high points holding the mattress up. That actually makes it pretty easy to change sheets, because you don't need to bend over to get to the corners. I have a back that bothers me at times, which is why I bought the adjustable bed.This mattress bends great in the right places when it needs to bend. I think it's because it has individual pocket springs. So when it is bending in the middle you can see there are two rows of pocket springs that stay together in the middle of the bed and the bend is on either side of those rows. So there is no problem buying this if you are planning on using it with an adjustable bed.The only other consideration is how high it sits from the ground when you are getting in and out of your bed. Well, 10 inches is a good size if you want to be sure your fitted sheets stay on the mattress. It's also good if you plan on using a mattress topper, though with a hybrid you might not need one.You don't need a box spring, so if this is going just on a frame, it might sit a bit low, unless you have 8-inch legs on the platform. Sitting low is not necessarily bad, especially if you have a small dog or cat that likes to sleep with you. Some of those super thick mattresses can hurt the smaller dogs when they jump out of the tall beds. If you want a higher mattress without a topper, you can buy risers for your bedframe or order a 12-inch mattress.", 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States November 5, 2023', 'is_verified': False}, {'title': '3.0 out of 5 stars Not firm!', 'author': 'Richard', 'rating': 3, 'content': 'This mattress is well made but it is definitely not firm! Waking up with an aching back and neck. And return shipping is the buyers responsibly. How do they expect me to pack a California king mattress into a box a ship it back 🤔 lesson learned.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States July 20, 2023', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': "4.0 out of 5 stars Really can't be beat for the price", 'author': 'Garrett Ryan', 'rating': 4, 'content': 'Got this for my toddler\'s first "big boy" bed. It\'s very soft, which is what we wanted for him (if you want a more firm mattress, maybe check the other styles). But considering the price of this mattress, it\'s pretty hard to beat. It is cooling, however, with a pair of sheets on the bed, it\'s not that much of a noticeable difference.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States December 29, 2023', 'is_verified': False}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars REST ONLY Full Size Mattress, 12 Inch Cooling Gel Memory Foam Hybrid Mattress', 'author': 'Thomas K.', 'rating': 5, 'content': "This is an excellent matters! I was desperately in need of one as my old one would make my back extremely sore everyday. I'm happy to say this REST ONLY Full size, 12inch Memory Foam mattress is a night and day difference!For the price, this is hands down an excellent choice! For my preference It's just about perfect. Not too firm, not too soft. You could certainly expect to pay much more than the price of this mattress on most other similar brands, but why do that when you're able to get what I would say is an equally impressive mattress in most cases for just a fraction of the cost.The mattress comes vacuum sealed and rolled up in a box. Once you get it you of course have to carefully cut open the plastic the mattress is sealed in and place the mattress wherever you want it, then simply wait for the mattress to inflate back to its normal size.Coming in at 12 inches, you're getting a lot of mattress. This is the thickest mattress that I've ever had. Normally, I would be skeptical of a mattress this size at this price point and probably pass on it, but it is certainly a fantastic mattress. Iif I needed another mattress in the future, knowing what I know about this one, would I buy one? Absolutely.I would most certainly recommend this REST ONLY Full Size 12 inch memory foam Mattress, you just simply cannot go wrong for the price!", 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States January 9, 2024', 'is_verified': False}]

title: King Size Mattress (Upgrade Strengthen) 12 Inch Hybrid Mattress King in a Box, King Mattress Made of Memory Foam and Individual Pocketed Springs, Strong Edge Support, Firm
reviews: [{'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Good value / Good quality - comfortable', 'author': 'Charlie Velez', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'Buying a mattress online is a risk because even with a generous return policy, it would still be a hassle to send back if the customer wasn\'t happy. No boxspring.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States January 6, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': "5.0 out of 5 stars I didn't want it to be soft!!", 'author': 'NancyJo', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'This mattress is exactly what I was looking for!!! OK, so admittedly I wasn\'t prepared for how quickly it sprang out of the box and started" growing - I live in a small condo with a wall of windows, and these mattresses remind me of a certain brand of biscuits that come in a can: once you open them, they expand like crazy!I managed to corral it onto my adjustable base, on which it works perfectly! It is a tad squeaky; I believe having a headboard to help keep it in place will alleviate that.I cannot believe how comfortable such an inexpensive mattress is!! I had a (name brand) that was too stiff to work well with adjustable base; my neighbor gave me a (name brand) to try, but it was far too soft. This EEN mattress wins the Goldilocks award: it is "just right"!! The fact that the price is just right is a huge bonus!I know it is daunting to purchase a mattress online, but for what it\'s worth, I suffer from severe chronic pain in my cervical swing, lumbar spine, and SI joints - what a JOY it is to wake up pain-free!!! I did…we will be returning this mattress which is unfortunate because I do like the firmness of it.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States February 29, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars I gave the mattress 24hrs to expand but is says 72hrs! Here’s a secret!', 'author': 'jasmine', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'I gave this mattress 24hrs to expand I couldn’t wait the 72hrs… Why? Because at 24hrs it still wasn’t expanding because it’s compressed! I know I seen how folks is saying theirs wasn’t fully expanded and how folks felt the springs! Well I tell you what I watch a YouTube video on how to make box mattress expend a little faster . I use a hair dryer on mines and I watched it expand faster when I put heat to it. PLEASE DO NOT I REPEAT DO NOT PUT THE HAIR DRYER TO CLOSE TO THE MATTRESS YOU DONT WANT BURN IT! Just hold the dryer maybe 7inches away from the mattress and allow the heat to loosen up the mattress from it being compress and you will see it expand took me a min but patience is KEY! The heat will allow the mattress to expand use a sweeping motion while doing to it. You can hold it 7inches away from the mattress in one spot just to see how it expands you’ll see it slowly rising once you see that just apply the sweeping motion ! As you can see the pic to the left was still looking flat after 24 hrs! The pic to the right was when I apply the dryer heat to expand the mattress! Overall it’s a good mattress!', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States March 4, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '4.0 out of 5 stars Great value', 'author': 'Kindle Customer', 'rating': 4, 'content': "Great support, super easy set-up, fantastic value for the price. title: Tight Top Series - 10 Inch Innerspring Hybrid Twin Mattress/Bed in a Box, Medium Firm Plush Feel - Multi-Layer Memory Foam and Pocket Spring - CertiPUR-US Certified
reviews: [{'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Very good bed. Great value', 'author': 'Tyler Miller', 'rating': 5, 'content': "So far, I am pleased with every aspect of this bed. This mattress has really helped my sons back and shoulder pain. He just got diagnosed with scoliosis and the doctor said that a mattress with medium firmness would give him the best spine support and pressure relief. His mattress was already 8 years old and hard as a rock, so we decided to get him a new one. I did a lot of research on what type of bed would be best, what thickness to get and many other mattress attributes. My sister had just gotten a mattress from this brand and it had really helped relieve some of her back pain. My son tried it out and really liked the feel of the gel memory foam. The mattress arrived quickly and extremely well packaged. The directions on how to unwrap it are on the outside of the box. The mattress is shrink-wrapped and then rolled tightly to compress it even more. As you can see in the video, it's extremely easy to unwrap. As soon as the shrink wrap is cut on the mattress, it immediately starts to expand. It reached it's full 9 inches in about 36 hours. There was no chemical odor to it at all. The cover that's on the bed is soft and very well made. The zipper is easy to open and very well sewn. My son has been sleeping on the mattress for almost 2 weeks and he's in heaven. He said it's the most comfortable mattress he's ever slept on. He can tell a huge difference when he gets up in the morning. He's got significantly less pain in his neck and shoulders. And his headaches have significantly decreased. It's amazing what a difference a mattress can make. I'm extremely impressed with the quality of this mattress. I really like that the company offers a 100 night trial. It gives you some peace of mind when ordering a mattress sight unseen. You will not be disappointed with this high quality mattress and the price is extremely economical.", 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States November 20, 2020', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '4.0 out of 5 stars Great mattress', 'author': 'Kathleen Chrissis', 'rating': 4, 'content': "I was never the buy a mattress online kind of person. I always went to a store and tried them out before buying. There are a few things I hate buying in this world.... cars, appliances and mattresses..I dislike those sales people for some reason...I feel they are pushy but I digress.I did a lot of research and stumbled upon this mattress. The reviews seemed really good compared to others so I thought why not. If it's horrible I'm not out a ton of money and I can make do with it till I get my money's worth.I've ever owned Sealy mattresses and this one tops those. It's beyond comfortable and I fall asleep so fast now. It's firm but not too firm and it's like sleeping on air it's so comfy.It creaks a bit but I guess that's normal with springs or it's the new bed. Time will tell.Watch out when you unpack it...once you slice open the plastic it literally springs alive .It's really heavy so be careful.It slopes downward at the bottom...or top depending on where you put it....but it could still need to inflate a bit...it's been a week.There was a slight smell when I first opened it but that went away on a few hours...or I got used to it. It wasn't horrible it was just there.All in all not a bad purchase.How it holds up is anyone's guess. If I get even a year I will be happy... hoping for more though.Edit....9/12/2023 started using the mattress on 8/28. Was great for the first week. Then things went downhill. Turns out the creaking is the mattress. It doesn't fit in the bed frame causing it to not evenly distribute weight on the slats. Then there is the uncomfortablness. I wake up sore now.I've flipped it when I changed the sheets but given it's a hybrid there are only so many ways to flip it. The sagging at the bottom has gotten worse and I can't sleep on my side anymore without feeling like I will fall off. I'm not a heavy person but I must be too much weight for the mattress to support.I had such high hopes.", 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States August 31, 2023', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Love it', 'author': 'Lynn I', 'rating': 5, 'content': "Great mattress. title: Twin XL Mattress, 12 Inch Hybrid Innerspring Single Mattress Cool Bed with Breathable Soft Knitted Fabric Cover
reviews: [{'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent!', 'author': 'MrChiSox', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'We purchased this mattress for our 23 year old autistic son recently, as his old, chap mattress had become tired and worn out. His bedroom is quite small and so the Twin was our only option, though we did buy the Twin as the XL version so that he has a bit more length. He\'s just under 6 feet tall so the extra length suits him well, and since he tends to sleep mostly on his side the Twin does work fine.So we tore open the box and carefully opened the plastic using the included cutting tool, no problem there. We placed the mattress atop the bed frame which is a raised 14 inch platform which requires no box spring and then we allowed the new mattress to expand for about 8 hours before we went to sleep. Being that our boy is a night owl he probably didn\'t climb into his newly se-up bed for another 4 or 5 hours. When he woke up I asked him how he slept and he exclaimed "I slept GREAT!" so I knew that he loved it. The mattress then got the rest of the day to continue to expand.I have to admit to being a little freaked out at first. After getting the rolled up mattress out of the box we laid upon his bed frame while still in the plastic and it looked quite a bit wider than the bedframe. Don\'t let that panic you like it did us. As soon as it\'s out of the plastic and is expanding that extra width disappears and the end result is a fully corrected size mattress. We did not notice any sort of aroma emanating from the mattress short of BRAND NEW fragrance. It was just fine. There are NO handles on the sides for carrying but the mattress can be easily set on it\'s side and manipulated, especially easy if you have a helper.In a nutshell, it appears that this is a really nice hybrid mattress at a great price. It seem firm enough to offer support even for a "Husky" person yet it offers an excellent, very soft, comfortable top, almost like a pillow top, and the mattress seems to keep him cool while he\'s sleeping. We are very pleased with this purchase at this early stage and will add to this review as/if necessary.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States June 21, 2022', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Great bed, accident bad back, helps sleep', 'author': 'Wave Vidmar', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'I was skeptical of a bed in a box, but this bed has exceeded expectations. No bed offers me pain-free sleep due to a bad auto accident. This mattress gives me the best rest, better than expensive suites in the top hotels.The mattress will take a solid 3 days to unfurl and settle, but then will be ready for use. I slept on it the first night, and it definitely was not ready, by night 3 was very comfy. The directions caution you from "getting smacked" when you unfurl/unpack/unbox the mattress, but was not a problem. Follow the simple directions and you\'ll be fine.Exceptional mattress and value. Medium to firm feeling with a cloud comfy top layer. The springs give nicely, adjusting to your body with ample support. No nasty smell or outgassing. Along with a coma inducer comforter as a bottom sheet, I get the best sleep in 4 years since being rear-ended by a work truck. Maybe it will help you, too.Update: mattress still working great. I had hip pain after several weeks. I read a change in back support can cause this. I ordered the Linenspa Simple XL motorized bed base and it changed the bed and sleeping experience. I now get the absolute best rest I\'ve gotten since a serious auto accident. Being able to relieve pressure on my lower back through use of the adjustable base did the trick. Less back/hip pain through the day. Worth every penny, and both items were a great value.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States December 14, 2021', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': "4.0 out of 5 stars It's pretty nice!", 'author': 'Julie!!!', 'rating': 4, 'content': "I've had this mattress for almost 2 months now, I am 300 pounds, and I spend a lot of time in bed due to mental illness and finding the most comfort where I can lay down and vibe. The mattress is really nice, overall, especially with a pillow mattress topper. When I got it I let it air out for about 10 hours before hopping on and it had completely risen. Sleeping on it and then leaving it alone the next day also helped it rise! Don't believe the image though, the top doesnt get that fluffy. The fumes it lets out though...they're pretty interesting? Like it doesnt feel like you're breathing in something but it's also not great, it is weirdly sweet smelling. It still releases fumes now and again, especially if I get in and out of bed a lot. I just light a candle and open the window and things fade. I get a good night's sleep though on this mattress and it is comfortable. It gets softer the more you lay on it, so the firmness does go down as things shape to your body, but not enough to be uncomfortable.", 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States December 10, 2023', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars BEST Mattress for the Money!!!', 'author': 'Randy', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'We have been looking for a mattress for over a month. Primarily because the Mattress store prices are ranging from $4K- $10K for a GOOD Quality Mattress. I read the reviews on this mattress and decided to give it a shot knowing it might be a lost cause. What A GREAT SURPRISE this mattress has been. It Feels Great , Sleeps Great AND the cost is GREAT!!! Shoot, I bought TWO! Thanks :-)', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States January 24, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent Mattress at good price', 'author': 'Cathryn L. Fyock', 'rating': 5, 'content': "Bought two of these at the Holiday Sale Price. Great Deal. Delivered on time. Unpacked and let stand for 3 days. No smell. Very comfortable, firm mattress. Very happy with the purchase. I made a bed frame years ago that will accommodate 2 twin mattresses, no box springs needed. Oh...King Sheet Sets fit the 2 Twins. We can't tell when the other is toss-turning... :)", 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States January 11, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Heavenly & SO Comfortable - Like Sleeping on a Pillow', 'author': 'Trina', 'rating': 5, 'content': "I wanted a mattress that wasn't too soft where I felt like I was sinking in. However, I didn't want a mattress that was hard, either. After reading the reviews, I felt comfortable with purchasing. The idea of buying a mattress that I'd never laid on first seemed risky, but the reviews were convincing.It arrives rolled up with the air vacuumed out of it so it's very compact when it arrives (compact yet extremely heavy!) Once you start cutting into the firm plastic that covers the mattress, it starts to expand very quickly. This mattress is heavy, even when rolled up, so it's important to place the rolled-up mattress on your bed frame before you start cutting into the plastic covering. I managed to push this heavy thing onto my bed frame by myself, but it was so hard to do that alone. It will expand all the way by itself and rather quickly, and it'll be too heavy to later move onto the bed if you're doing this by yourself.I want to buy another one for my spare bedroom when finances allow. If you're even considering getting this mattress, do.", 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States February 20, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Very good mattress', 'author': 'Fernando Cancado', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'Great mattress.. not too hard not too soft.. just perfect.. loving it', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States February 20, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars This is going to sound like a paid review.. but..', 'author': 'Zio', 'rating': 5, 'content': "I didn't trust boxed mattresses for years but when I bought my first temperpedic it was about 1800. Flash forward 10 years and it was getting worn out, I got to the store and that same mattress is now 4900 on sale. So I figured I would give this mattress a shot since even if it only lasted a year it would still be cheaper to buy 8-10 of these than a temperpedic.I like this mattress better, and since I have only had it two months I can't speak for it's longevity but I can say I sleep better on this than my old mattress. It feels like a temperpedic medium, it may be a bit firm for people who like soft beds but to those I would recommend just buying a pillow topper for 100 rather than springing for more expensive beds.", 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States January 28, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '4.0 out of 5 stars Too soft, good customer service', 'author': 'joseph j bongiovanni jr', 'rating': 4, 'content': "I took a chance on a mattress without trying it because of their refund policy. I don't like the mattress, and I reached out to Inofia per their customer service page and the info that came with the mattress. using their website contact info worked best, and they provided me with a refund, which was a good outcome. So excellent customer service.", 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States February 29, 2024', 'is_verified': True}]

title: Oliver Smith - Organic Cotton - 10 Inch - Perfect Sleep - Comfort Plush Euro Pillow Top - Cool Memory Foam & Pocket Spring Mattress - Green Foam Certified - (furMattress_Chiland_10_Twin)
reviews: [{'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Strong', 'author': 'Velicia', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'This mattress is great and I will get more. Strong, comfortable, thick, organic, perfect! Love the price too!', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States December 30, 2023', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars So far so good!', 'author': 'Heather', 'rating': 5, 'content': "I read so many reviews of different mattresses before I chose this one for our son's new bed. I am very pleased to report that as soon as we opened the package, the mattress immediately popped right into place, no droopy sides or corners. We still let it sit for three days before we used it. Our son is extremely happy with his new big-boy-bed, been sleeping in it for about a week or so now. Seems comfortable, although I haven't slept on it myself, but I don't have any complaints from simply laying on it. I never bought a mattress like this that comes shrink-wrapped, so I was definitely really nervous about it not expanding properly, but I was so relieved when it opened up right away; I actually didn't even get to see it open because my husband opened it and I had my back turned for a moment, and bam! It was already done! So, I am submitting the review because I am just delighted we didn't have any issues with it taking shape!", 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States April 8, 2023', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '4.0 out of 5 stars Good for the money', 'author': 'David Z', 'rating': 4, 'content': "It's pretty good for $135.00.Can't complain", 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States December 22, 2023', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Great nights sleep', 'author': 'sass', 'rating': 5, 'content': "I swapped my daughter's bunkie board mattress out for this one due to constant backaches and after the first night, no more backaches. She has raved about this mattress so I tried it myself. THE best mattress purchase I have made to date and that's coming from a person who purchased a very expensive memory foam mattress that I hate so much that I'd rather sleep on the floor. By the way this thing is heavy and it's a twin. Very good mattress.", 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States November 2, 2023', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect!', 'author': 'Chrysiepie', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'Quality at a fair price!Comfortable.Happy with this product.Zzzz', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States March 3, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Very nice', 'author': 'JoAnn R.', 'rating': 5, 'content': '10 inch is very nice so comfortable.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States November 24, 2023', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '1.0 out of 5 stars Needs better warning labels for this beast!', 'author': 'Amanda', 'rating': 1, 'content': 'I unboxed this bed today and before even cutting into the first layer of wrapping, it popped open like a balloon bursting! Smashed me against the bed. My arm pinned between the mattress and Frame. Tore skin and left my arm feeling like I was in an accident. Super sore. Thank god my toddler was napping because he could have gotten very hurt!', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States January 13, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '3.0 out of 5 stars Superb...Until...', 'author': 'Shopaholic', 'rating': 3, 'content': "This mattress truly felt like cushiony pillow clouds from the sky when I unrolled it and let it finish popping out of the box into its complete and true state. (The had it all shoved into a box, which was pretty heavy, but once the mattress is out of the box and fully elongates, etc, it's not too hard to move around, for a Twin mattress).I am not certain when things started to change, exactly, but a few months into testing it out, I started noticing that it suddenly wasn't as comfortable as it had been. While sleeping, things seem great until waking up, and that's when I began to notice that I felt worse in places, such as in the lumbar-region of my back and spine, and that my neck felt like it wasn't quite as well-rested as it initially had been.Now I feel that after some time goes by, sleeping in the same spot, pretty much, eventually literally weighs on the pocket coils or coiled pockets that this thing has... This mattress is 10-inches thick, and it is fairly plushy, so although I do weigh more than 100 pounds, that wasn't so much of a problem for me, considering that there is some bounce to the materials as well. It was all working out...so it seemed.I am thinking that maybe I should have gotten a 12-inch thick one... and just a little more plushiness. For anyone who may be wondering why I would order a Twin-size bed instead of a Full or a Queen, (which I would rather like), the room in which it sits is quite small, so there would be no room for anything else but a bed if I were to put a bigger frame in it.I left the plastic on for a long time because I wanted to keep the mattress as clean as possible... That is an option if you prefer sheet-covered, clean, but crackly sleeping. Personally, I prefer to sleep on a nice comfortable couch whenever possible, therefore, I will not be investing in more beds. (Certainly not seriously expensive ones... that cost more than this mattress did).This one has done for now, or is doing ok for now, but there is definitely something going on with feeling pressure points, etc. It's barely a year old, if that, and problems have already started.I am highly disappointed because I had hoped that it would last longer than it seems to be, but oh well.Would buy again for other people; would not buy again for myself.", 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States June 7, 2022', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '4.0 out of 5 stars Eh', 'author': 'Jeremy Eaton', 'rating': 4, 'content': 'It was okay. Springs are noticable 30 days in. Its okay for a guest bed no one will be on consistently. I resoluted to purchasing another mattress.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States February 6, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '4.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable for an extra bed', 'author': 'Rick Heersema', 'rating': 4, 'content': 'I would say this is a medium firmness. Top is rather cushioned but good support.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States January 15, 2024', 'is_verified': True}]

title: King Mattress, 14 Inch Individual Pocket Springs with Gel Memory Foam, Medium Firm Mattresses in a Box, Hybrid King Size Mattress with Pressure Relief
reviews: [{'title': "5.0 out of 5 stars My back's savior", 'author': 'Nekomart', 'rating': 5, 'content': "I'm a 32 year old man, and I haven't had a new mattress in probably 15 years. I never considered the fact that an old, worn out mattress could start to cause me back pain. After about a week, I started to notice that I was having sharp, excruciating lower back pain. I worried that I'd someone sustained a serious, irreversible injury at first, but then I started looking into the reasons why the sudden pain might've occurred. A poor quality mattress never crossed my mind, but realizing how old mine was, I decided to do some research for an affordable yet highly rated memory foam mattress. I think I hit the jackpot with this one! The pain relief was instant the next morning, and I've been able to return to my daily fitness routine without feeling stiff and unmotivated. If you start feeling sudden lower back pain and don't know why, please do yourself a favor and consider a new mattress!", 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States February 25, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Size and Quality', 'author': 'PE', 'rating': 5, 'content': "I like the quality of this mattress. Friend got a 4500$ purple mattress and its nice for sure but mine almost feels the same and for what I paid.If your thinking about a new mattress this is good investment in my opinion.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States February 7, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars A complete steal!', 'author': 'Meghan', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'I was scared of buying it due to 1 star reviews BUT I was pleasantly surprised when the bed came. I’m super happy with the quality especially for the price tag.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States February 2, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': "5.0 out of 5 stars Best Night's Sleep Ever!", 'author': 'Phil Birch', 'rating': 5, 'content': "I love my bed! If you are like me and need a firm mattress, you'll enjoy this one.", 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States February 21, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '1.0 out of 5 stars Nothing like the photo!!', 'author': 'S. My', 'rating': 1, 'content': 'Was the worst sleep I ever had!!! You can see the springs coming through the bottom of the mattress and I ordered a 12" and was given a 10". Had to put it back in the plastic it came in, was told by a representative that UPS would pay for the box for the bed to fit & ship it in since I don\'t have an industrial size vacuum sealer that\'s used when the beds are shipped to the customer and that WASN\'T TRUE AT ALLLLLLL!!!!!!!
