title: Leesa Sapira Hybrid 11" Mattress, Queen Size, Premium Cooling Foam and Individually Wrapped Spring / CertiPUR-US Certified / 100-Night Trial
reviews: [{'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Exceptional mattress', 'author': 'Innovator', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'Yes, it\'s a tad firmer than I was used to, but the back and edge support this hybrid mattress offers are exceptional, eliminating the back pain I had with my previous memory foam-only mattress. The build quality and luxurious materials used are high grade. Overall, the Sapira is a class act.Day 1: The mattress arrives in a tall square-box, about 2x2x4. I attached a photo of what the mattress looks like compressed inside the box. Upon placing the mattress on my boxspring, I cut the plastic off and the bed immediately sprung to life, literally, as the coils decompressed. Yes, there is a noticeable off-gassing smell, but it\'s not offensive. I left my window open at night, and 90% of the smell was gone by the next morning.Day 2: At first, the mattress was a bit firm, but after about 24-36 hours the mattress had fully decompressed and was much more comfortable. It\'s probably a 6.5/7 out of 10 on the firmness scale, the way most online professional mattress websites suggest. The top Avena foam layer sleeps cool, so I don\'t overheat. The bounce the Avena foam + the pocketed coils provide makes moving around, and getting out of bed effortless. The off-gassing smell is just about gone now.Day 3: Decided to get rid of my old mattress and keep the Sapira. I sleep mostly on my back, but sometimes on my side and stomach throughout the night. The only sleep position I thought wasn\'t going to work out was the side position, because of the firmness, but the 3 inches of Avena + memory foam actually provide just enough sinkage, while keeping my spine aligned. The off-gassing smell is completely gone now. I bought a mattress protector, and then my bed sheet goes over that to complete the package.When I bought this mattress last Sunday, there were 20 left in stock with Amazon. As of this morning, only 9 Queen-size beds were left in stock, while some sizes other than Queen were already out of stock. So clearly word is getting out about this mattress. At $1,325, it\'s also a lot less expensive than every other hybrid mattress on the market, most of which will cost at least $2,000 more than this one, and will require you going to a showroom, and taking time off work to be home for delivery.In conclusion, I highly recommend this mattress. Please feel free to ask me any direct questions on here. Also, if you have time, I recommend reading the review on Sleepopolis, as it\'s the most comprehensive professional review that matches my own experience.Update: although I bought a Claritin mattress protector, and although when I called Sapira customer service they recommended having one too, I removed it on Day 4. It added a "plastic" feel to the surface of the bed that became unbearable. Once I removed it, that initial softness I experienced on Day 1 came back again. I only intend to use just my bedsheet from here on out. I recommend you do the same.((On a side note, I suggest ignoring the only other two reviews on here, both two stars. Unlike myself, neither one is a confirmed buyer of this product. The first review is too short to be real for a legitimate mattress evaluation by an actual customer. The fact that this mattress has the firmness rating it does shows the Sapira is designed for superior back support, so the reviewer\'s complaint is illogical. The second review is also partially off topic, as they discuss the manufacturers\'s website, which has nothing to do with how the mattress feels. Yes, they are correct the mattress is a little firm, but every other online review already confirms this. So to slam the product with only two stars for performing how it was designed is unfair.))', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States September 2, 2017', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars good quality and definitely med firm', 'author': 'KC', 'rating': 5, 'content': "I've slept on this mattress now for a week and am very pleased with its level of firmness. I prefer firm (side and stomach sleeper) and this is definitely medium firm and I feel supported when side sleeping. I'm using an adjustable base (Lucid - highly recommend) and have it in up position frequently and it retains its shape . The only downside is that the edges are soft which makes it hard to sit on the edge, but I knew that when I bought it. So far I have no regrets with the Leesa Sapira.", 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States July 31, 2023', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Great mattress!', 'author': 'Donna S', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'I love this mattress. Needed a replacement for my 15-year old Therapedic. Took a chance on this highly rated product and have not been disappointed. It feels as good as my Therapedic. Soft and firm. Relieves my back and hip pain (I’m a side sleeper.) And it was HALF THE PRICE of a new Therapedic. I would recommend this mattress to all former Therapedic owners.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States August 14, 2023', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '4.0 out of 5 stars Feels comfortable but produces me back pain. Reimbursed by Amazon', 'author': 'Juan Diego Barco', 'rating': 4, 'content': 'When I lay in this mattress is soft and feels good. However, I always get up with back pain and I never suffered from back pain in my life.I have been trying to return the mattress for more than 2 months without sucess. As the mattress is unboxed, UPS will not allow pick it up.I have talked with several Amazon representatives but they have only forwared my petition and at the end they have not solved it.Update:After several calls and weeks trying to return the mattress, finally Amazon decided to reimburse me the full amount I payed. At the end they were cooperative,', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States April 10, 2023', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '2.0 out of 5 stars Needed to try - not THE BEST but good', 'author': 'KayDawg', 'rating': 2, 'content': "Heard rave reviews and was inundated with social media ads after looking Leesa up online while mattress shopping, so the Hybrid won out for, well, being a hybrid and because Leesa is a B Corp.Queen mattress on a slatted platform frame without a box spring.It's really soft - softer than I expected it to be for a hybrid, and you can feel the springs on the edges and right through the side of the mattress. But good for stomach/side sleepers and can be good for back sleepers if you don't already have a lumbar spine issue, IMO.My friend had one that I spent just one night on and I don't remember hers being this soft. Will the softness dissipate over time?I'm afraid I overpaid for something that won't last up to the standard 8-10 years since it's already soft and I can feel the springs. We'll know more when we get to the 100 days of trial (it's only been 30)", 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States June 26, 2021', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars I’m a new person.', 'author': 'Chelsea Breza-Berndt', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'First off, I’m not a product reviewer. I generally ignore any and all opportunities to write product reviews. But I felt the Leesa Hybrid was deserving of my time to write a review.We had been searching for a mattress for a couple years, mainly paralyzed by the fear of not liking whatever we decided to buy. Our old pillow top was about 9 years old and at 28 years old I was starting to understand how boomers feel when they wake up in the morning.We tried the Leesa in person at a local store and were sold, but Amazon had by far the best deal we could find.My boyfriend likes firm mattresses, but I’m 5’ 2” and 130 lbs so we needed to find a balance between firm and too firm. The nice part about the Leesa is the memory foam top, so you get a softer feel while still enjoying a medium firm mattress. It’s even perfect for my lighter body weight and the boyfriend thinks the firmness is satisfactory too. We are both happy.The one thing that has taken some getting used to is it sleeping cooler. We’ve had to play with the thermostat in the house a bit since our previous mattress slept so hot.However the most striking thing is the GREAT SLEEP AND TOTAL AND COMPLETE LACK OF BACK PAIN!!!! I would recommend this mattress to anyone!', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States February 26, 2020', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Was nervous ordering online!', 'author': 'R. Miller', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'I was so nervous ordering a mattress online. I had been able to try the mattress at a local store that carries the brand. Their delivery time was out 4 weeks. Amazon offered a discount and delivery was a few days out from the order date.I purchased a platform bed and it was recommended that I get a 9-11 inch high mattress. I like pillow top mattress especially. Not really available in the 9-11 inch range.I love this mattress! So comfortable and just soft enough for my liking. Very supportive yet comfortable. I am so happy that I picked this brand. Lessa is not as advertised as others, but well worth a look when thinking of spending a couple thousand dollars on a new mattress.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States August 10, 2023', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Really excellent', 'author': 'Jenna.Leann', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'We have had this mattress since July of 2018 and still love it. My husband prefers a slightly softer mattress, I prefer firm, and neither of us have any complaints. I am generally a side sleeper, no issues there.We have a king and I really wanted a mattress with good edge support and this one definitely does. It makes the mattress feel larger to us. Right now there’s three of us sharing this bed (us plus our 18 month old) and I love that the mattress is firm enough for us to feel safe having our son sleep with us. We all have our own space and never wake up sore.My husband has had two of his buddies buy this mattress and they were also happy with it (plus their wives). I also love that it’s a hybrid, full memory foam isn’t my thing and this just seems durable. Negative reviews on this mattress genuinely surprised me. Maybe we aren’t picky because neither of us have any back issues, but we sleep so much better than we did before!Mattresses are such a personal preference and I know it’s risky to order online, but this one is a pretty safe choice in my opinion (unless you prefer soft mattresses).', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States October 13, 2019', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '2.0 out of 5 stars Painful Sleeping Experience But Amazon Honored Their Refund Policy', 'author': 'New Homeowner', 'rating': 2, 'content': 'I really hoped this mattress would work for me, given all the positive reviews and ratings it\'s gotten from reputable (?) national media outlets, but it turned out awful for me. Maybe because my body is just too used to the firmness and bounce of inner spring mattresses, this memory foam hybrid caused pain in my back and hips so bad that I never slept through the night during the trial period. Some reviews say this mattress is too firm, but I found it too soft. Lying on my back, I could feel my butt sink down into the foam a good 3 inches; lying on my side, my hips would also sink down that far, pulling my spine out of alignment. Yes, the memory foam "bounced" back to normal once I got up, but that didn\'t help while I was lying down! Also, as someone used to moving around easily on an inner spring, moving around on this mattress also created pain in my back and sides since the memory foam basically "immobilizes" you.To Amazon\'s credit, they issued a full refund when I requested it, efficiently and quickly without making me go through a lot of paperwork or red tape.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States August 16, 2023', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '2.0 out of 5 stars Arrived mishappen.', 'author': 'Kathleen M. Sheehan', 'rating': 2, 'content': 'As shown in the attached photo, the mattress was narrower on the bottom than on the top at one end. This was the case on both sides of the mattress at that end. Thus, the mattress does not come to the edge of the foundation at this end. This defect may have been due to the mattress being compressed for shipping causing a permanent distortion in its shape. This was my first time purchasing a mattress that is shipped this way, so I do not know whether this is a common problem. I plan to replace with a mattress that is not compressed for shipping. Other than this defect, the mattress seems to be as advertised.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States October 29, 2023', 'is_verified': True}]

title: 8” Green Tea Cool Feel Memory Foam Mattress, Bed-in-a-Box with Compact WONDERBOX Packaging, CertiPUR-US(R) Certified, Twin, White
reviews: [{'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars good choice', 'author': 'Ann L.', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'Healthy product with soft touch and firm support. No chemical smell.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States January 31, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Delivered on time, no damage to complain about.', 'author': 'Yedi #1', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'Easy to remove from package, and place onto frame. Sleeps well.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States August 15, 2023', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': "5.0 out of 5 stars This mattress will give you a great night's sleep", 'author': 'Jim Barber', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'This Zinus mattress rocks! (Although maybe that\'s not the best description for a mattress?)It comes packaged in a surprisingly small box (but don\'t let the box size fool you -- it contains a full-sized mattress and so it\'s HEAVY). Just remove the box (I found that it\'s easier to remove the box from the mattress than to remove the mattress from the box) and *carefully* take the plastic liner off -- the mattress automatically starts to expand. In a few minutes, it\'s reached most of its final size -- full enlargement will take a few hours.I didn\'t notice any chemical odor, maybe because of the green tea infusion. As for the layer of "cooling gel", I\'ve never used a foam mattress before, so I have nothing to compare it to. (Unlike some other mattresses, this mattress has a "top" and "bottom" -- don\'t mix them up!) But I can vouch for this mattress -- it\'s quite comfortable and I haven\'t noticed any problems with nighttime overheating whatsoever.The convenience of having a mattress delivered to my door can\'t be beat! Fortunately, my city provides pickup of large items (like mattresses), so getting rid of my old mattress wasn\'t a problem. If you don\'t have such a service, you need to think about how you\'re going to dispose of your old mattress.Of course, the comfort of a mattress is very subjective and will vary from one individual to another. I\'m a 5\'10" 170 lb male and I find the medium-firmness / queen size very comfortable.Convenience and comfort at a reasonable price. I\'m *very* happy with this Zinus memory-foam mattress! Highly recommended!', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States July 21, 2023', 'is_verified': False}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Just like the web pictures!', 'author': 'pdlmh', 'rating': 5, 'content': "This mattress is just like the web pictures show it once you have it unpacked and it gains its un-shrunk size back. It ships in a box that is 14 by 14 by 28 (just over 3 cubic feet) (and it is HEAVY!), and it expands to a twin size mattress of 75 by 39 by 8 (13.5 cubic feet), so an expansion to more than 4 times its shipping size. The lesson here? Once you expand it, you'll NEVER get it back in the box!Once expanded (allow about 24 hours, although it APPEARS done in just about 3 hours or so), it seems just as sturdy as any other spring-based mattress. I am still not sure if I like the memory-foam feature or not. But as a mattress in a spare room, especially with a twin mattress for kids, it appears to be okay. I am also not sure if I can tell any difference based on the COOLING gel principle. And I certainly have no CLUE what the Green Tea effect is on a mattress -- the thing is white, not green in any way!Lacking anything negative to say about this mattress, other than not being able to store it back in its box, I'm giving it 5 stars. When I lay on it, it DOES compress under my weight, but not suffocatingly so, and I am 210 pounds, and it says its weight limit is 250 pounds. So for a child's bed, especially one in our guest bedroom that will be only rarely used, it'll be a great lower-cost solution than a standard mattress of any quality (low-cost mattresses could be less costly, but I wouldn't want MY kid or grandkid to have to endure such a cheap mattress). This has higher quality without a higher price!", 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States June 29, 2023', 'is_verified': False}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Great choice for a spare bed or lighter people', 'author': 'Debra', 'rating': 5, 'content': "This mattress was a pleasant surprise. It came fully compressed in a reasonably small box. It is heavy. Once unpacked the mattress began to regain its full size. It seemed to reach the full size over a few hours but I gave it a full 24 hours. I did not notice any chemical odors.I would say this mattress has a medium firmness. You do sink in a bit but also feel the support. Being an 8-inch mattress I feel this is better for occasional use or for lighter people. I don't know that it would hold its support if used every night by a heavier individual. We did add a 3-inch mattress topper to give the mattress some extra thickness and support.I am not clear on what green tea does, but I don't see how it could hurt. The addition of the gel-based foam should help the mattress dissipate heat better than just the regular foam would do. If you need a mattress for a spare bed or a child this mattress from Zinus is a solid choice.", 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States July 19, 2023', 'is_verified': False}, {'title': '1.0 out of 5 stars Returning', 'author': 'carol', 'rating': 1, 'content': 'It sunk in to the frame. It just felt like foam not any support. We are not heavy people and I can’t imagine what this really is. It feels like my foam top from Walmart. I am replacing a fantastic memory foam mattress with a size up. I went down in price and it shows.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States November 20, 2023', 'is_verified': False}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Cooling queen mattress', 'author': 'Olivia Payne', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'I love this queen mattress that has real effective cooling features built within. It is the perfect level of firmness/softness and actually keeps a hot sleeper like myself cool throughout the night. This item is a great value for the money. I have already recommended this product to other family members looking for a new mattress. I highly recommend and would buy again if I needed an additional mattress!', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States July 26, 2023', 'is_verified': False}, {'title': "5.0 out of 5 stars You can't go too wrong with a Zinus!", 'author': 'Teach08', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'I ordered this full size mattress for MY guest room in my daughter\'s home! I\'ve had my own Zinus king for years, though it is a 12" thick version. I don\'t expect an 8" mattress would work nearly as well for daily use with heavy people like us as far as longevity is concerned, but it is just as comfy as my own for more infrequent use. My husband and I are 220/155 lbs respectively, and we sleep so well on this mattress. Do make sure you give it a day or two to fully "inflate" inside and out before using it. I\'m happy to share this with the other in-laws...we all FINALLY have a good mattress for when we go and stay with the kiddos!', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States July 2, 2023', 'is_verified': False}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Nice mattress', 'author': 'Tzig', 'rating': 5, 'content': "I ordered this mattress in the twin size for my 8yr old granddaughter.It's perfect for her and she thinks that it's comfortable.Very pleased.", 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States July 19, 2023', 'is_verified': False}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars So comfortable!', 'author': 'Angela P.', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'I got this to replace a 9 year-old mattress in my daughter\'s room. She loves it. Nice and thick and true to the 8" size advertised. Not too soft and not too firm. Doesn\'t make her overheated and was easy to get up and into her room and onto the bed with minimal help. Price is great and love that we didn\'t have to arrange for delivery -- but wish we still got the removal of the old mattress that usually comes with delivery of a new one...oh, well. Happy anyway and highly recommend.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States July 7, 2023', 'is_verified': False}]

title: Queen Mattress - 14 Inch Hybrid Mattress Medium Feel - Individually Wrapped Coils for Pressure Relief & Motion Isolation, Assembled in The USA
reviews: [{'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect fit', 'author': 'Marc Oliver', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'Great price. Quality feel. Fit perfectly in the frame and it’s very comfortable.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States March 2, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Thick and Comfy', 'author': 'MLPM', 'rating': 5, 'content': "I like this mattress. It’s comfy and VERY thick. I feel like it has a sunken middle however from where it was folded. It’s very subtle - a princess and the pea situation - so it doesn’t disturb my sleep but I do feel like I roll into it a little. I just feel like the two sides of the mattress are a little more firm than the middle. If you’re a couple, you probably wouldn’t ever notice, but I sleep solo and like a starfish right down the middle so I do notice the little indentation. When I had a thinner mail-order mattress, I did not notice this so in hindsight, I think the thinner mattress might have (counterintuitively) been a slightly better choice for me. Overall this is a great mattress - I look forward to getting into my huge cocoon every night - but it’s not quite perfection.UPDATE: Six months out and the sunken middle has resolved itself. Mattress is now just the right softness for this stomach sleeping, plus-sized woman. I'd buy it again. And it's a great value for the price.", 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States June 20, 2023', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '4.0 out of 5 stars Good decision', 'author': 'Wayne Tibbetts', 'rating': 4, 'content': 'Mattress is going on our Murphy Bed. Arrived on schedule, unwrapped according to instructions, opened up faster than promised and is very comfortable.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States February 15, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Nice mattress', 'author': 'Mary S.', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'We bought this mattress for our guest room. Our narrow stairway prevents us from taking a standard mattress and box spring set up the stairs. The mattress in the box solves this problem. Comfortable and good quality. I liked that the company is in the USA also.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States July 21, 2023', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Pleasantly surprised!!', 'author': 'Dee', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'I was skeptical but after a full 72 hours mattress expanded completely even in the corners to a full 14 inches as described, and the mattress slept great for the first night. There was no odor coming from this mattress which I appreciated and it’s affordable!', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States February 28, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': "5.0 out of 5 stars Big Man's best friend", 'author': 'Brian Tuttle', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'I like the fact that it is "Made in the USA" Great job packing such a big mattress in a box! Love everything about it. My little dog needs a dog step to get up on the bed now. would recommend the purchase', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States February 24, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Lovely', 'author': 'Angelica  Hill', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'The delivery was excellent. The package arrived earlier than expected. It was absolutely heavy but barely if you have the strength. I got some help from my lovely neighbor. I was waiting to tell the delivery personal the code to receive the mattress but it was already in my apartment lobby , not too happy about that , someone could’ve totally swiped my package, nonetheless I got an email stating it was delivered so it’s all good. NOW FOR THE UNRAVELING PART… as soon as I cut the first layer of plastic off you could hear the “hsssss-ing” sound of the air being let out , then cut open to the second layer, it immediately inflated, don’t know why it excited me , but it did , I feel like it only took an hour to fully come to its true form. I started to unravel about 11am and set it up about 10pm. The mattress itself is what is states medium firm , I’m 5’3 , 175 lbs ish :P with recent neck pain but I feel the different in comfort from my old bed to the new , my bed frame is 14 inches high I purchased a 12 inches so there a bit of a climb, so I’m gonna get a shorter frame in the near future, so far so good , no chemical smell as other reviews stated , and probably will update 3 months later.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States June 30, 2023', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Terrific!', 'author': 'golfJacket', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'Has been a great sleep since received!', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States September 9, 2023', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '4.0 out of 5 stars Soft corners and edges', 'author': 'Nigel G', 'rating': 4, 'content': 'Corners and edges sink down , other than that pretty comfortable mattress', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States January 30, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '3.0 out of 5 stars Not responsive enough for us...', 'author': 'Kindle Customer', 'rating': 3, 'content': 'This is a lovely mattress, but unfortunately it didn\'t work for us. It is marketed as medium firm, but to me it was more like medium-plush. For reference, I am 5 ft tall and weigh 115 lb. My husband is 6\'4" and weighs around 210.We chose this mattress because the brand had good reviews and I wanted a cooling mattress (we sleep hot) that was medium firm because we are side/back sleepers. Our previous coil mattress was over 10 years old and was killing my husband\'s back. I was starting to wake with a stiff lower back, as well, so we knew it was time for a new mattress. With everything else we\'re trying to do we weren\'t ready to drop several thousand dollars on a super expensive bed yet. This mattress seem to fit our needs.It contours your body like a memory foam mattress should, but I feel like it is not very responsive. As such, when you switch positions or sleep next to someone I believe it may offset the mattress\'s ability to relieve pressure points. This is a mattress in which I feel you definitely sink into, rather than float above.The first night I slept on this mattress I still woke with a bit of a stiff back, but the second night was awful. I woke up the following morning more sore than I ever have from a mattress. Having read several reviews from people saying it takes a week or so to adjust to a new mattress I toughed it out for a few weeks. Unfortunately, we are still waking sore. Luckily, Amazon is allowing us to return it.My husband and I both have issues with our backs, me also with my hips, and we just may need a more firm mattress. This may be a good mattress for you if you are a side sleeper who likes a more plush mattress or if you sleep alone (my hubby works away from home quite a bit and I found I didn\'t wake quite as sore when he was gone or the kids didn\'t crawl into bed with me- still sore, but not as bad). I don\'t feel like I slept any more hot than usual with this mattress, so If you sleep hot like we do then it may fit your needs in that department, as well.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States May 18, 2020', 'is_verified': True}]

title: Queen Mattress, 10 Inch Memory Foam Mattress with Innerspring Hybrid Mattress in a Box Pressure Relief & Supportive Queen Size Mattress 100-Night Trial 10-Year Support
reviews: [{'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Really nice mattress!', 'author': 'ThistleFlower', 'rating': 5, 'content': "I did my research on mattresses in a box before deciding on this one, and I will admit I was still hesitant about moving forward with the purchase because I've never bought one of these before. I chose this mattress due to the hybrid construction and the 100 night guarantee, and the reviews seemed really solid. I purchased the 10 inch twin size. It arrived on time, was easy to get into the house and a breeze to open. Immediately upon opening the plastic wrap and unrolling it, the mattress starting inflating in size. Within 10 minutes, it was already at 10 inches, so I was pleasantly surprised. It is easy to move, at least in the twin size, so it can be put on a foundation and taken off easily. The top cover is very nice and overall, the construction is solid. It is a medium firm mattress, so if you're looking for a soft mattress, this isn't it. Of course, all mattresses require a breaking in time, so I expect in a few months, this mattress will be a lot softer. I actually bought a 2 inch memory form topper for it for extra cushion and that helped immensely with the comfort level until at least I have it broken in more. Overall, I am very happy with this purchase, especially for the price, easy of set up and quality. It remains to be seen how this mattress will perform over time, but so far, I really like it. There are so many mattresses in a box out there to choose from and it can be overwhelming. If you'd looking for an good, solid mattress on a bit on the firmer side for a good price, this is it. If this mattress can be had at it\'s original price of $130 less than current than yes it is well worth buying, but at its current price I would recommend you buy OTC alternative.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States January 31, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '4.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable and soft', 'author': 'Shauna', 'rating': 4, 'content': "The mattress is fairly priced and honestly it is quite soft. title: Tidur Cooling Gel Memory Foam Mattress, 10 Inch, Twin XL
5 Inch Memory Foam Mattress, Fiberglass Free, Bunk Bed, Trundle Bed, Day Bed Compatible, Narrow Twin, White
reviews: [{'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for My Traveling Musician Lifestyle!', 'author': 'Ryan VanderWolk', 'rating': 5, 'content': "As a traveling musician constantly on the road, I can't express how delighted I am with the ZINUS 5 Inch Memory Foam Mattress. This narrow twin mattress has been an absolute game-changer for my travel trailer, and it unquestionably deserves a 5-star rating.First and foremost, the compact size of this mattress is ideal for my space-constrained travel trailer. It fits perfectly, providing a comfortable and supportive sleeping surface without taking up unnecessary room. It's a true space-saver without compromising on comfort.The memory foam is a dream to sleep on. It conforms to my body, relieving pressure points and ensuring a restful night's sleep even on the bumpiest of roads. I wake up feeling refreshed and ready to hit the stage.The fact that this mattress is fiberglass-free is a significant advantage. It eliminates any worries about fiberglass particles escaping and causing discomfort, especially during long trips. It's a thoughtful design choice that enhances the overall comfort and safety of the mattress.The versatility of this mattress is impressive. It's compatible with bunk beds, trundle beds, and day beds, making it a valuable addition to various sleeping arrangements. It's a mattress that can adapt to different scenarios, which is perfect for a musician's unpredictable lifestyle.The quality and durability of the ZINUS mattress are evident. It has held up exceptionally well through countless journeys and performances, which speaks to its long-lasting value.In summary, the ZINUS 5 Inch Memory Foam Mattress has transformed my travel trailer into a cozy haven for rest and relaxation while on tour. Its compact size, memory foam comfort, fiberglass-free design, and versatility make it a perfect fit for my traveling musician lifestyle. I couldn't be happier with this mattress, and I wholeheartedly give it a 5-star rating. If you're a traveler in need of a comfortable and space-saving mattress, look no further – this one's a winner!", 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States January 15, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars great mattress (depending on how you use it)', 'author': 'ken', 'rating': 5, 'content': "i built a bed frame for this mattress inside a camper van and it is incredibly comfortable.instead of slats beneath the mattress, i used straps (old seatbelts), and it worked great.however, i was visiting a friend and thought i could use this mattress on their floor, but it was not nearly as comfortable.therefore, i would not recommend this mattress for use on a hard/flat surface. it's just not thick enough. it needs some spring or flexibility beneath it, especially if you're a side-sleeper like me.however, for the bed i built, i could not be happier. it's perfect. would purchase again. ymmv", 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States February 10, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '4.0 out of 5 stars A bit of a gap.', 'author': 'C. Riley', 'rating': 4, 'content': 'The first mattress I used for my son’s bunk filled out the space great but was too tall to allow the safety rails to do their job. This one is just the right height and perfectly comfortable but there is a good sized gap on the end where it isn’t quite long enough to reach the head or foot of the bunk. It’s about three inches. I rolled up a blanket to fill in that space, but I am afraid he might get his leg or arm caught if I’m not super vigilant about keeping that blanket in place.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States November 25, 2023', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for Bunkbeds', 'author': 'Tina M', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'We recently got a triple bunk bed as we needed to consolidate space and it was hard to figure out. These mattress fit PERFECTLY in each bunk and each kid loves the soft yet firmness of them and they sleep like rocks on these things. Amazing price, great feel, perfect packing and delivery. Not a single issue.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States January 11, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for trundle bed!', 'author': 'Melissa Stevens', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'We got the 5 inch twin size mattress and the 6 inch zippered mattress protector. Set it up and put the mattress protector on and in less than 24 hours it’s grown a lot in thickness and length. I taste say that it’s already at its full size. It’s perfect!! And super comfortable to lay on. Highly recommend!', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States January 22, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '1.0 out of 5 stars This mattress contains fiberglass!', 'author': "Pamela's Cottage", 'rating': 1, 'content': "I bought this mattress because it was advertised as fiberglass free. I'm highly allergic to fiberglass. I purchased this mattress to use in a campervan conversion. I knew I would need to cut the mattress to fit the van bed, but since this mattress was advertised as fiberglass free, I was not concerned. But just to be extra cautious, I cut the mattress outside in case there were any floating particles. I put all the original mattress covers back on the mattress. I installed it in the van on the newly built bed to air out. I thought all was well until I went out to place sheets on it 2 days later. This involved lifting the mattress and tussling with it a bit to get the sheets on. I immediately started feeling itchiness and burning which became progressively worse. I showered and scrubbed my skin 3 times before going to bed that night, but still woke in the middle of the night with intense burning/itching. I showered for the fourth and final time, but still felt periodic stinging at work the next day.I'm now struggling to figure out how to get rid of not only this mattress, but the newly built bed - I'm sure the fiberglass has now permeated the wood. I don't understand how it can be legal to advertise a mattress as fiberglass free when it so obviously has fiberglass. I know the mattress was never meant to be unzipped or cut, but I only felt comfortable doing it because the mattress was advertised as fiberglass free. Also, even if the mattress wasn't cut, there is no way to ensure it would not get punctured or accidently ripped by a child (or adult) and release fiberglass. I'm a pediatric nurse, and I can only imagine the number of parents who purchase this mattress for their children and have no idea they are sleeping on a mattress that contains fiberglass.", 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States February 9, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '3.0 out of 5 stars Thin Choice', 'author': 'Lindsay Kirkland', 'rating': 3, 'content': 'I thought I order the 8 inch but it’s 5inches. It’s so thin. But perfect for a toddler. Not a good choice for any child over 7 believe me!!!', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States January 25, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars For the price, can’t beat it.', 'author': 'Leo M.', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'Great price! Comfort is good but remember it’s only 5 inch pad so keep that in mind! Would recommend for spare bedroom bed that doesn’t get used often or would recommend as a mattress topper!', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States January 25, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Nice for the price', 'author': 'dm', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'Wish I would have bought the thickest mattress. Didn’t puff up as much as I thought it would but perfect for little children.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States February 29, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Great Value', 'author': 'James Dufour', 'rating': 5, 'content': "Perfect for my daughters, shipped quickly, easy to move into place, and a perfect fit! Just what I was looking for. The colored cover is a nice touch. Don't forget the waterproof cover!", 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States February 12, 2024', 'is_verified': True}]

title: 8 Inch Tight-Top Pocket Spring-Mattress - Motion Isolation Individually Encased Pocket Springs, Comfort Foam-Top, CertiPUR-US Certified Foam, King, White
reviews: [{'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Great Value, Easy Assembly', 'author': 'Mom the artist Brown', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'Came on time and as described.My 15 year old grandson put this together for me in about 20 minutes. The hardest part was balancing parts while securing two pieces. He got assistance from little brothers and it went smoothly.It was light enough for us to turn on it\'s side while we brought it through the bedroom door fully assembled, and set it on the floor without issue. Sturdy after a few months use, I can\'t find fault with it at all!For me, I found that without the need of a boxspring the mattress just sits upon the bars -which is fine and hasn\'t been any trouble except tucked in sheets make fall and or hang down which -to me- looks untidy. My solution was to purchase a simple sheet of masonite, cut it to size, and secure it to the bars with "AlienTape". I put a large piece of bubble shelf liner between the masonite and the mattress (in the center) to keep it from sliding, which has been fine.The height of the frame along with a new mattress is high, but not too high to get into. I am 5\'4" and have arthritis and I can still manage. If you have physical issues getting in a higher bed or if you are a bit shorter you may want a lower height on the legs for safety.The amount of storage under the bed is enormous! As my 12 year old grandson said "We could camp under here!" My original intent was to place large baskets underneath, but I like the look of it without anything under the bed, and it\'s much easier to keep the floor clean!BOTTOM LINE: A great value for a simple design, easily assembled, with PLENTY of storage!', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States March 5, 2023', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Very sturdy, easy to assemble, great bed frame', 'author': 'Nancy P', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'This is a great bed frame. It was so easy to assemble. The directions were easy to read and follow. The parts are given letters but the screw holes were numbered. You put screw hole #1 with screw hole #1 together. It couldn\'t have been any easier. They even give you extra parts just in case you need them. This is extremely sturdy. My step daughter has a similar frame and when you saw this one she said, "Wow yours looks so much sturdier than mine because of the center bars and the metal seems to be a little heavier". The frame is 18" tall and you can put totes (the totes I have are 16" high and I believe that is standard) under the bed for added storage! So many other bed frames talk about the frames being too big for their mattress. This is approximately 1/2" bigger than the mattress, which I believe is good so the side are supported well. The corners seems to be covered by my comforter but if yours doesn\'t then you can use pool noodles or "bumpers" on the corners to protect you in case you were to bump into them. I\'m unsteady at times but have not had any issues bumping into the corners. I would highly recommend this frame to any of my friends and family. Just buy it you won\'t regret it.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States January 11, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to build', 'author': 'works great but you have to pay monthly to track whoever you wanna track . i was tryna track my bfs car and my sons car seat for safety.', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'I love this so much I love how tall it is and makes more space for storage in my room and places for my lil one to crawl under love it!!! It’s super strong def not gon bend or break on ya. It comes with sticky things to keep your mattress from sliding off of it too', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States January 20, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '4.0 out of 5 stars Good mattress at a GREAT price ...', 'author': 'Jeff of MN', 'rating': 4, 'content': 'I\'ve been a spring-mattress guy my whole life. Not sure I\'ll ever go with full memory-foam or sleep-number air. However, as a mostly side-sleeper shopping for a new mattress, I did want to try an added foam-layer to better accommodate my shoulders for possibly less night-time side-to-side flipping. This Best Price 10" Euro-top pocket-spring mattress (with decent reviews) seemed to me a good way to give this a try, especially at under $200 for their full-size.Overall, I\'m happy with my purchase. Can\'t yet talk about how this will hold up over time, but still sleeping comfortably on my new mattress after several weeks of use. The mattress side-support is fairly soft, so hoping I don\'t see too much shape distortion (bowing-out) as time passes. Will also be interesting to see how those comfort-foam layers of the Euro-top withstand the test of time.I still occasionally turn from side-to-side due to some firmness under my shoulders but, for less than $200 for the full-size 10" Euro-top version, I\'m rating this 4-stars as a good mattress buy.Always appreciate feedback ... If you find this review helpful, please feel free to give it a quick \'Yes\'. Thanks.FULL-size Euro-top (10-inch) mattress details:- Shipped in 17" x 20" x 40" box. Weighs 70-pounds so recommend a 2-wheel dolly or 2nd person to help carry, especially if you have steps to climb.- Mattress has standard full-size footprint of 74-75" length x 53-54" width. Fit my previous standard full-size box-spring perfectly.- Coil-count for the full-size is 22 x 31 = 682 total coil-count.- I chose to have shipped from Best Price. Mattress tag shows manufacture date as 201610 (Oct 2016), about 6-months before my order date. Also shows Made in China.Receiving/Unpacking:The thick cardboard shipping box looked like it had been around the block a few times before it was delivered. Sides bowed-out and fairly worn/dirty looking, however still mostly taped-shut and in one-piece. Pleasantly surprised that the mattress inside is very well packaged and remained in perfect shape.The packaging is fairly ingenious IMO. The mattress is actually vacuum-packed and hermetically sealed into a hefty clear-plastic bag. This vacuum-packing compresses the 10" mattress down to just a couple of inches thick. Pretty much like those advertised vacuum storage-bags that reduce your stack of blankets or pillows down to the thickness of a set of sheets.My compressed & sealed full-size mattress was then folded in half length-wise (Euro-top/foam-side outward), rolled up from side to side, then wrapped with another plastic/foam layer. As I mentioned, very well packaged.I carefully cut away the outer plastic/foam layer and unfolded the compressed mattress onto my box-spring. As I then cut down the edge of the vacuum-bag, thought it was kind of neat how quickly the mattress expanded to full thickness as the air rushed into it. Fully removed the vacuum bag and my work was done. They recommend 48-hours for full decompression, but I think I could\'ve slept on mine almost immediately.My mattress had a slight new-odor smell to it when first unpacked. I\'d say similar to the odor of a new pair of sneakers when you first take them out of the shoe-box. Not overwhelming by any means, and that \'new mattress smell\' mostly dissipated away over the first few days after being released from its sealed plastic shipping bag.Mattress & comfort:- The unpacked/decompressed mattress was beautiful. No apparent flaws or discolored areas. No mattress-buttons to feel through the sheets. I always use a washable quilted mattress-cover to help protect the mattress top & sides, and this slid on with no issues. Also no fit issues using my standard full-size sheets.- The single-sided mattress (can\'t flip this one) uses a slightly coarser/rougher low-slip material on the bottom. As someone who props the headboard of my bed up a couple-inches to help avoid the occasional acid-reflux issue, I\'m really a fan of this mattress not sliding down the box-spring nearly as much over time (my previous mattress slid down a bit every night).- With its 12-gauge coils (many mattresses I shopped, use 14-gauge [or thinner] coils), I\'d rate this mattress on the Firm side. I\'m fine sleeping with the high-support of a firm mattress, but feel the extra foam layers of the Euro-top do add a level of comfort. However, due to the extra squish of the add\'l Euro-top foam layers, I did end up replacing my firm pillows with something medium-soft. My previous firm pillows sitting on top of the mattress foam, held my head just a bit too high for my taste.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States May 24, 2017', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Sturdy enough to stand on!', 'author': 'D.M. Britton', 'rating': 5, 'content': "And this frame is sturdy enough for me to stand on to do things for my daughter and I'm at 215 lb right now. No squeaking no ricketiness this is very very sturdy. She loves the black finish. It's I'm pretty easy to put together after I looked on YouTube because the instructions or baffling to say the least. There were no words just pictures. And as some parts identical it was just not a good thing. But I looked on YouTube for the model number and they showed a video on how to do it I put this together in like 10 minutes flat by myself. They need better instructions and to have a link to a video to put everything together. Other than that is a great price the height is just what we needed I can sit on the bed at 215 pounds and my daughter at 125 pounds, so that's a good deal!", 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States October 17, 2023', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Easy', 'author': 'blaire', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'Was an easy put together for me (26 female) took me about 45 min bc my room is small n had to do some maneuvering. It’s super stable and I love the storage space .', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States February 20, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Sturdy!', 'author': 'Ayana', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'Very simple, fast, and stress free! I even recommend it to my family and now everyone has this bed frame! The frame goes perfectly with my canopy.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States February 24, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Exactly as Advertised', 'author': 'Kenleigh Hunter', 'rating': 5, 'content': "We took our time putting this together. The instructions were spot on. The frame is sturdy and with sliders it's very easy to move around.I would highly recommend this bed frame.", 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States March 1, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Great and good price', 'author': 'Amanda Phillips-Cordland', 'rating': 5, 'content': "Well what can I say. It holds my weight I'm over 20p, and my bed done sink in the middle of the bars, it's been 4 mths so far it is light weight to move just depending on your mattress weight..But so far so good for the price..Also mine has great room underneath for stroage!!", 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States March 5, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '4.0 out of 5 stars Ugh 😩', 'author': 'Maxx', 'rating': 4, 'content': 'My bad I ordered a twin mattress. Make sure you order the right size mattress 😂⚠️', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States March 5, 2024', 'is_verified': True}]

reviews: [{'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars A Surprisingly Comfortable Sleep Experience!', 'author': 'Ruchit', 'rating': 5, 'content': "I recently purchased the Lucid 8 Inch Queen Firm Memory Foam Mattress, and I couldn't be happier with my decision. This mattress has completely transformed my sleep experience for the better.First and foremost, the firmness level is just right. It provides the perfect amount of support for my back, ensuring a comfortable and restful night's sleep. I wake up feeling refreshed and without any aches or pains.The 8-inch thickness strikes a great balance between support and plushness. It's not too thin to feel the underlying structure, yet not too thick that it compromises the supportive feel of a firm mattress. The memory foam contours to my body, offering a personalized and cozy sleeping environment.One of the standout features for me is the breathability of the mattress. The memory foam is infused with cooling gel, which helps regulate temperature throughout the night. No more waking up in a sweat – this mattress keeps me cool and comfortable all night long.Setting up the mattress was a breeze. It arrived in a compact box, and once I opened it, it expanded to its full size within a few hours. The quality of materials used is evident, and I appreciate the attention to detail in the construction.As a bonus, the Lucid mattress comes with a soft and breathable cover that is easy to remove and clean. This adds an extra layer of convenience and ensures that my mattress stays fresh over time.In conclusion, if you're in the market for a firm memory foam mattress, the Lucid 8 Inch Queen is an excellent choice. It combines the perfect level of firmness, support, and comfort for a great night's sleep. I highly recommend this mattress to anyone looking to upgrade their sleep experience.", 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States January 31, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Quite firm, but also comfy. A godsend for sciatica.', 'author': 'prime332', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'good value, works great for a second bed for my wife to use when sciatica gets bad/single guests.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States January 25, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '4.0 out of 5 stars Wasn’t firm enough.', 'author': 'Mullins', 'rating': 4, 'content': 'I like Lucid brand and had my last one for ten years, I loved it up until the ten year mark. Maybe my preferences have changed and I can’t handle plush mattresses anymore.Anyway, I do believe that at this price point it’s actually a good mattress. I read some of the reviews and I have to say, it deserves better reviews.It’s actually really good quality, if you have a very low budget. It amazes me that anyone would buy a mattress at this price and have anything to complain about. I feel that there should at least be gratitude for the fact that we can purchase any mattress at this low of a price point. If you want something better then keep saving until it can be afforded, otherwise maybe buy a used mattress off of FB marketplace.Anyway, my experience was -1. The mattress wasn’t nearly as firm as I expected. Again, that was my own thought and expectations. It just gave too much for me. Which I can say some might love that it cradles them! Maybe it gave so much because I’m pregnant and weigh an extra 40 lbs, which puts me at 190 lbs. So maybe just not great for a heavier body.2. I wish I had bought a ten or twelve inch instead. I think that would have helped.3. No smell at all and was very cleanly packed.Bottom line - if you’re a lighter person and you need a low profile mattress and you also like to sink a bit, this one might be perfect for you.We bought it because we were In between moving, getting a new mattress and waiting for our Satviaa to be delivered.It served its purpose for a few weeks but now my nephew has it. He’s about 6 feet tall and 140lbs & he LOVES it! He said it’s so comfortable.To each their own…I’m happy with the purchase and super fast delivery.Thanks Lucid, for providing affordable comfort and a great low cost.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States June 21, 2023', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Lucid never lets me down', 'author': 'Rosanna', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'This isn’t the first Lucid mattress I’ve purchased. Great, comfortable reliable brand.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States March 3, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Read my review! Check your mattress base if the mattress causes you pain!!', 'author': 'IlyWag', 'rating': 5, 'content': "We purchased this mattress for my son because he asked for a new bed for Christmas. The mattress arrived first so he slept on the floor with it. I slept with him the first night and let me tell you, I slept like a baby in heaven. I have severe back problems because of an accident i had and with this mattress I slept straight 8 hours, which never happens since I have to constantly wake up to stretch my back. I slept with my son for 4 nights until the rest of his bed arrived.On the 5th night I was hooked on this mattress, until I woke up 2 hours later with SEVERE back pains. It was so bad that it felt like i was sleeping on top of a rock. It was so hard. I was so confused so I tried to go back to sleep and I couldn't. My son then woke up and he said he was uncomfortable and the bed wasn't cozy like it originally was.So, for those having horrible back pains because of this mattress, it might depend on what box spring you're using for your mattress. I am using this plastic expensive one we got from sleep number. I provided pictures. We moved the mattress back down to the floor and we noticed the difference which is so odd. We are going to purchase a different base to see if that helps. Don't blame the mattress first, I suggest you try it on the floor because it can very well be the type of base you're using.", 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States December 8, 2022', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable!!!', 'author': 'Rhonda Campbell', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'I have metastatic breast cancer in my ribs and spine. I am comfortably able to sleep more soundly and for longer with this mattress than with more expensive widely-marketed brands. Great value!!! Comfort without breaking the bank.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States February 4, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars I’m sleeping so well!', 'author': 'Terri', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'I love this bed! I like a firm bed and this is firm. After traveling to Asia I’ve been looking for a firm thin bed similar to over there. This is as close as I could get. I’ve had the bed for about 4 months now and there is no change to the bed. I’ve been sleeping better for multiple reasons. It’s so comfortable and I can’t feel my husband move or get up early in the am.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States December 26, 2023', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '3.0 out of 5 stars Very very very firm', 'author': 'Kindle-Customer', 'rating': 3, 'content': 'So firm if you are aside sleeper you will wake up in painNot even a foam topper helpsWorst Lucid mattress I’ve ever gotten and I’ve had severalJust buy a different twin xl, trust me', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States February 14, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '4.0 out of 5 stars Only expanded to 7” and the plush feels firm', 'author': 'RGC', 'rating': 4, 'content': 'Hello people I got this mattress to pair with the Lucid L150 adjustable bed frame (which is awesome and well worth the $350, I totally recommend getting one) So I figured the 8” mattress would have a little bit more flexibility when raising the head and foot of the bed so I went with that. It’s been 5 days now and unfortunately the mattress has only expanded to 7” with the corners at about 6.5” so I think with only 1.5 inches of memory foam, it feels more firm than it should. The 10” mattress has 3.5 inches of memory foam which sounds like it would have more of a plushie feel so for another $50 I’d go with that one instead of the 8” option. I gave it 4 stars cause I think it would feel fine for most people assuming theirs expands out all the way. 5 stars to Amazon for their outstanding customer service in regards to the resolution of my dissatisfaction', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States January 12, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Well made', 'author': 'Ms B', 'rating': 5, 'content': "I ordered this mattress because it was firm. I cannot sleep on a soft mattress due to back problems. This mattress is Very Firm. Too firm if you have Fibromyalgia like I do. But I love it. So I ordered a mattress topper to lessen the hardness on my body. Especially my shoulders when side sleeping because I had a bad fall years ago and injured my shoulder and back. But if you are looking for Firm then this is the mattress for you. No regrets and I highly recommend. It inflated fully in less than 2 days. There was Never any Smell at all. I'm happy I went with my gut instinct to try it out.Update: I purchased the mattress topper and it definitely took the edge off of my Fibromyalgia and Back pain.", 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States January 18, 2024', 'is_verified': True}]

Just for reference, I’m 66 yo, 150#.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States February 16, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Best mattress', 'author': 'Amazon Customer', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'Very good and very comfortable', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States February 12, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '4.0 out of 5 stars After a short wait....a good bed and at a great price', 'author': 'Francisco Matos', 'rating': 4, 'content': "I was cautiously optimistic about the product. I saw the reviews and it felt maybe a little too good to be true. I took my chances, and I was pleasantly surprised.
