title: Twin Mattress, 6 Inch Gel Memory Foam Mattress, Gel Infused for Comfort and Pressure Relief, CertiPUR-US Certified, Bed-in-a-Box, Medium Firm, Twin Size
reviews: [{'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars This PrimaSleep Mattress is soft, supportive, and affordable. I do recommend!', 'author': 'Tessa S.', 'rating': 5, 'content': "I have never slept on, or even tested any type of memory foam anything before! So I may be a bit biased, but I am totally satisfied with this purchase. The mattress was shipped to us a whole 4 days early (UPS Air), so thank you Amazon, PrimaSleep, and UPS for making this happen! So, I'm going to list all of the things I love about this mattress:1. It is very soft/cushiony yet wonderfully firm/supportive! It's not too firm or too soft. As another reviewer previously mentioned, it is difficult to explain the balance, you'd only understand fully if you felt it for yourself. It really does relieve pressure in your body. It conforms to your body impressively - this prevents limbs from falling asleep, and keeps you from waking up feeling sore/stiff. My husband and I both have back problems, and this has helped us so much already!2. The mattress shipped quickly, was fairly easy to unpack (though the box was very heavy and UPS had to help us carry it to our door, we had to use a dolly the rest of the way).3. It is recommended that you wait 48-72 hours before sleeping on your mattress to allow it to rise/ventilate. In most cases this is true. In ours, not so much. Our mattress rose to 7 inches within just an hour! It then rose to 8 inches in only 2 hours! The corners took a little longer to rise, but that doesn't affect our sleep at all! I have read that in humid climates memory foam can rise more quickly. Well we live in a sub-tropical climate, and ours decompressed rapidly! It reached 6 inches more minutes after removing it from the box.4. When we first pulled it out of the box, I was expecting to be hit in the face by the smell everyone always talks about (which I know is from off-gassing). I smelled nothing. I put my face into the mattress and sniffed aggressively, I smelled nothing and neither did my husband. After we dressed the bed and climbed in it, I smelled the faintest hint of something, but it quickly dissipated. So if you're worried about smell, I didn't have a problem with that and it shouldn't be a huge problem for anyone who orders this mattress.5. The price. This price is so amazingly low/affordable, I am so grateful to be able to sleep in such a comfortable bed, a memory foam bed, for the first time in my life. Growing up I slept on a twin bed with two box springs (from 4 years old to 18), and in the last few years I have only slept on old springy mattresses. They really made this affordable and I'm so happy because everyone deserves to sleep comfortably and to rest well! If I ever get rich I will buy this product for anyone who needs one!Bottom line: this mattress IS exceptionally comfortable! In the couple of nights I have slept on it, I have not noticed any sinking (the mattress is on top of a box spring), no weird or unpleasant smells, or anything I don't like about it. You get amazing quality for a low price. Anyone who has slept in uncomfortable beds frequently will appreciate this mattress. If you are used to really expensive memory foam mattresses, you might not be happy with this one. Then again, I'd be willing to wager that this PrimaSleep mattress is comparable in quality to the more expensive brands. I definitely recommend this mattress to anyone who needs a comfortable mattress, but doesn't want it to cost them an arm and a leg! When I am enjoying the comfort and stability of this mattress, I also exhale deeply and feel great about how much money I saved by purchasing a PrimaSleep mattress!If you aren't used to sleeping on a bed like this, give yourself time to adjust, it can take a while! Also, take the mattress out of the box as soon as you get it (or ASAP) because the longer it stays inside the box, the higher risk it may not decompress properly! The mattress will have an easier time rising if it is placed on a flat surface. As always, do plenty of research before making a significant purchase such a this! If you happen to read my review, I stand by the quality of this product, this is the mattress I will be sleeping on for years, and I will continue to buy from PrimaSleep in the future. If my review is helpful, please hit the button!", 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States June 7, 2020', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect purchase', 'author': 'anonymous', 'rating': 5, 'content': "I am the kind of customer who reads pages and pages of reviews before making a purchase. I compared every major brand (T&N, Casper, Nectar, Purple, etc) to this one and just couldn't stomach the cost of any of the other brands. I purchased this mattress because of the positive reviews, the boxed delivery for easy moving (I ordered this shortly before moving out-of-state for grad school), and the return policy. I'm so thrilled that I won't have to use that policy! This mattress is exactly what I was looking for in terms of firmness/softness - it's hard to describe that balance without feeling the mattress, but it's firm enough to be supportive without being hard as a rock. It is so comfortable. I had to keep it in the box for almost a month, which is not recommended, but even still it began rising as soon as I cut off the plastic wrap. Zero chemical or other smell, zero delay, and was ready to sleep on within a day. I would never purchase a $700+ mattress from a more well-known brand when this one checked every box for a fraction of the cost. Absolutely order this, if you're on the fence.UPDATE: In a sudden, last-minute COVID-related move, I had to pack everything I own into just my RAV4. After three hours of trying to fit the mattress (vacuum-sealed) into the car with everything else, I had to leave it behind. Not the fault of the mattress - would have been fine if I had an actual moving van or even just another car to help me move. I ordered a different mattress as this one was unavailable when I needed to order, and after two nights on the other mattress, I had horrible hip pain. Horrible. I'm 23 and have never had joint pain like this (or at all) and chose to sleep on the floor for a week instead of sleeping on it anymore. I reordered this mattress as soon as it became available, and it arrived a week before it said it would. Set it up around 10am and it was good to go by about 3pm. SO COMFY. Hip pain is gone, I sleep like a rock every night, and I have no complaints whatsoever. I now know that I'll be dragging this mattress with me to every home I have until it is too old, and as soon as I have any storage space to speak of, I'll buy another one to keep in box so that I have a replacement when that day comes. I hope they never stop making this mattress! It's perfect.", 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States September 13, 2019', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '4.0 out of 5 stars Super Comfy', 'author': 'Nikki Poland', 'rating': 4, 'content': 'While this mattress didn’t expand to the six inches (maybe 4.5), it is still super comfortable. I bought for my son to give him a big boy room for his 5th birthday, and this definitely works for him. I find it very comfortable as well, but I did take off a star for the size not being what was advertised.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States March 1, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Worth the money!!', 'author': 'Jordan', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'I have searched for weeks for a good mattress with good quality and low price as I needed a queen size mattress ASAP and for it to last at least 3/4 months before I move as I wouldn’t be taking the mattress with me!After lengthy search I came across this one and even though some of the reviews were not encouraging, I decided to give it a go and if I didn’t like it or couldn’t be a match I was going to stick it out for the next 3/4 months and that would be that!The one I originally had was 12in in height but in a very bad shape. I decided to give the 8in a go and test out how it would work!I can say it definitely took up 48hours and a little more to get to the 8in size so be patient for it to get to the size it needs.I’ve had it for a month now and I can’t find any complaints about it!It’s good and firm and very comfortable!Also I inspected the box and the plastic wrap it came in and it was clear of any mold or bugs.Shipping was super fast!Although it is not recommended to sit on the very edge of the mattress because after all its foam and it will squish/crush but that’s because it’s the very edge. To me that’s not an issue and who sits on the very edge anyways?', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States May 5, 2020', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Great Price - Comfortable - Medium/Soft', 'author': 'Patricia Chi', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'It was difficult to choose between all the lower-prices mattresses, but seeing so many negative reviews about cheaper-priced spring mattresses I decided to venture out and purchase this queen foam mattress.I was concerned about how comfortable it would be since some reviews say that the mattress is thin, and we don’t sleep on a box spring frame but we use a simple metal frame with bars, so I was concerned about feeling the bars through the mattress.I was positively surprised at how comfortable this mattress actually was! It came delivered in a lightweight rectangular box (the top of the box was opened for some reason, but the contents were great). I thought it would take 24 hours to inflate to a decent height but after heading out for about an hour it was ready to sleep on. I didn’t measure the actual inflated height to see if it matched the description, but whatever it was it was good enough.Initially climbing onto the bed, knees first, I could feel the bar rungs of the metal frame beneath the mattress, but once I’m sitting on the bed or lying on the bed my weight distributes and I’m totally comfortable. After spending a month or so sleeping on an air mattress this was such a huge and comfortable change for me as a pregnant woman. No more waking with a damp sweat because the plastic mattress is non-breathable, even with a sheet over the top. This reduced the pain for the pressure/weight on my side during side-sleeping and I feel so cozy and comfortable every time I lie down.If I were to make any improvements it would probably be to add thin board under my mattress so that I don’t feel the metal rungs when I climb in and out of bed, but it’s such an insignificant problem that I probably won’t ever end up doing that despite my “good intentions.”My husband’s only complaint about this bed as opposed to the air bed is that he’s a bit warm at night. My husband runs hot and this is definitely a bit sink-into-it cushiony. This could ultimately be more a result of the bed-bug, liquid-proof encasement over the mattress, so without it it may have more breathability and be less warm, but I am personally enjoying the mattress.I got it for just under $139, including free shipping through Amazon prime. I was searching for a while on IKEA (where I previously purchased an EXCELLENT spring mattress for under $150, but now out of stock), and I also searched Wayfair and Macy’s mattress deal but this was ultimately the best deal I found on cheap mattresses that included shipping and delivered a product that I was happy with.If you’re on a budget and looking for a cheap mattress then this is the way to go. This is my first non-spring maytress and I love it. There are suggestions for purchasing a topper to soften if, but I’ll be sleeping with a baby in the bed and this is probably the softest I’d feel comfortable co-sleeping a baby in. In fact I’m probably only going to have baby in the bed co-sleeper until the baby is several months old because the softness of this mattress could be risky to have a baby sleeping straight on.Great buy - if you’re debating between several - get this one!', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States January 19, 2019', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '3.0 out of 5 stars Sleeps good, but definitely is not six inches.', 'author': 'M0mmy0f2Girls', 'rating': 3, 'content': 'It’s soft, it sleeps good, however it will not ever expand to six inches. It expands to four inches, that’s it. I’m using it on a platform bed, and if you sit in the bed, you can feel the platform. If you’re laying, weight distributed, then you can’t feel it. Still was worth the money, I like it!Update! Been sleeping on this bed a year, and I haven’t had a single day of back pain. My old innerspring mattress (that I paid a whole lot more for) was killing me slowly. I bought an air mattress to get off the innerspring. Then I found this mattress! I’m 140 pounds, if you’re heavier, you may want to buy the thicker version. Otherwise, this mattress is holding up fantastic! I’d buy it again!', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States March 11, 2022', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Very comfortable mattress for the money.', 'author': 'Ariana Z', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'We bought this mattress to use in our small travel trailer as we needed something we could customize to the weird shape of our sleeping area. This mattress did not disappoint. It was very easy to cut to fit in our space (we used a bread knife). It took a while to expand to the full 9", and surprisingly, the cut side expanded faster and better than the factory edges. What I loved about the mattress was its firmness. It doesn\'t crush down when my husband and I sleep on it, and I don\'t find myself rolling into him because he weighs more than me. Even though it was firm, it still had enough of a plush feel to be comfy and cozy. Finally, it didn\'t feel overly hot as some memory foam mattresses do. I can honestly say I slept better on it than I do on my fancy innerspring mattress.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States August 9, 2023', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars I\'m Happy & Comfy with This Mattress! Short 72"', 'author': 'PA', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'There were so many mixed reviews searching mattresses, wow you guys make it hard! Lol. But, after much back-and-forth and thought and desire to stick to a certain price point because I don\'t even know how long I\'ll have this mattress, I kept with my price point and purchased this hoping hard it would work out.My last mattress-in-a-box was too hard for me and it hurt my hips (I\'m a side sleeper). So, as people kept reviewing that this was both "too soft" AND "too hard" (I think more said too soft) considering my last purchase I wanted something a little bit softer.This is neither! For me it\'s perfect, really. It\'s firm yet a little bit soft, not too hard that it hurts my hips like the last one. I\'m 5\'6 and an average size for that height if that helps. Maybe heavier people might have more of an issue with these types of boxed mattresses as they say it\'s too soft and I don\'t know how much it might "give way". The manufacturers should really put height/weight ranges on their products, seems pretty obvious. But, I guess they\'d rather just sell more than sell to the right person.This mattress is shorter, though! It\'s exactly 6 feet from top to bottom and since no one sleeps with their head on the top edge of a bed, you are losing several of those inches. I\'m often finding my feet hanging off the edge so at 5\'6 myself, I would not suggest this "full" size for anyone that\'s taller. You\'ll probably want a Queen or King. I looked up the typical size for a full and I\'m seeing 75-inches versus this mattress being 72-inches. I am noticing those 3-inches missing. I don\'t really mind if during my tossing around my feet end up going off the mattress a bit, though. I don\'t think it messes with my sleep.It was easy to unroll! I let it go a few extra days to make sure it fully expanded to its true shape. Again, I\'m very happy with my purchase and I\'ve had this several months now!', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States February 25, 2021', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '4.0 out of 5 stars watch the shipping', 'author': 'Daryl Perry', 'rating': 4, 'content': "almost sent this back after because I must didn't notice the shipping cost. Shipping was same cost as the bed. Ended up keeping it and it worked pretty well that's why I kept it plus I'm sure I'll need it again", 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States November 1, 2023', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '3.0 out of 5 stars It doesn’t inflate in 72 hours', 'author': 'aydin', 'rating': 3, 'content': 'The mattress is very comfortable, not too soft or firm. It was easy to take out the box and wrapping. Yet, the mattress did not inflate in 72 hours. It’s not even half way I would say. I tried keeping it in a warm, ventilated room but the corners are still flat as it was when I received it. I will let it sit for 1-2 weeks and update my review to see if it will inflate to the size they claimed it would.Update: found out the mattress has fiber glass and I had taken off the cover to wash it. Now I’m afraid there might be fiberglass all over. So far we’re fine but I wish this was mentioned in the description. I called customer service and they gave me a refund and let me keep it. That was very nice of them. Like I said in the beginning the mattress is actually comfortable just wish there was a warning of fiberglass. I let the mattress sit for a bit more and it’s slowly inflating to a better shape. If you don’t take off the cover you don’t have to worry about fiberglass and wait around 1-2 weeks it will definitely inflate to size.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States September 20, 2023', 'is_verified': True}]

title: Full Mattress 12 Inch Innerspring Multilayer Hybrid Full Size Mattress - Ergonomic Design with Memory Foam and Pocket Spring Mattress Full Size - Box Top Series Medium Firm Feel
reviews: [{'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent!', 'author': 'jeremy milnes', 'rating': 5, 'content': "Easy to set up and VERY comfortable! Nice and supportive, but not stiff! I have less back and shoulder/neck pain since getting it. I also love that I don't feel the mattress move when my husband gets in bed after I'm already in, since it absorbs movement. That was an extra bonus!", 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States February 11, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Very comfy!', 'author': 'Melanie Constance', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'I forgot to take a picture of it before I put the bedding on it, but I bought a kind size (pictures don’t do justice looks much bigger in real life trust me) it got up the 10 inches after 3 hours.I have terrible back problems and shoulder problems and suffer from insomnia, but old mattress before this sucked and made my pain worse. The first night sleeping in this one was amazing and I feel asleep right away when normally I don’t. I’m so happy with this. Worth your money', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States February 27, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '4.0 out of 5 stars Worth it!', 'author': 'Erin Miller', 'rating': 4, 'content': 'I was sketchy based off some of the reviews, I’ve never ordered a “mattress in a box” but this purchase is well worth your money. I will say it is FIRM, I added a pillow top and it made the mattress absolutely perfect for my husband and I. I definitely suggest giving it an hour or two to inflate before you lay/sit on it. We’ve had it about a week and it’s fully inflated and it was true to size, fit over my box springs perfectly! It’s definitely worth the money you spend and I see this bed lasting us a while. Happy with my purchase!', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States December 19, 2023', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Don’t shy away from “mattress in a box”.', 'author': 'Jim G', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'We needed a new mattress for our weekend place. I’ve always been a bit leery of this concept of delivering a mattress in a box. However I also remembered struggling with the original getting it in and out of my truck and into the bedroom of the tiny house. Gave this a try and have been most impressed. The package is fairly heavy but relatively easy to maneuver on a hand truck. Took the mattress out of the box, laid it on the bed, unrolled it and then unsealed it. Watching it expand was pretty amazing. Left it there for a week and tried it out. It’s just like any other mattress, this one is very comfortable on the firm side. Very happy with this purchase and the relative convenience of the delivery method is a bonus.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States March 3, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Very comfy and good quality materials', 'author': 'Joshua J.', 'rating': 5, 'content': "I was skeptical about this product at first because I never purchased a mattress in a box before and I was surprised at how well it turned out! Make sure you follow the instructions when opening the seal to avoid injury and damage to the mattress. It comes in a box rolled up and compressed in a plastic bag. I'm amazed at how they were able to do this and have it expand to its normal size and shape like it came straight from the store! It feels like an all-in-one mattress too with the springs, memory foam, mattress pad and other layers of materials at a great value! Hopefully it holds up for several years!", 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States January 10, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Firm Spring Matress, Better than Foam Only', 'author': "It's me again", 'rating': 5, 'content': "After one day. So far so good.The mattress is mostly springs. The top section of the mattress that is between two hems that is greyblue is not just foam but is still mostly 98% spring. I can't say that there is much foam at all there. So, the product photos on Amazon made it look like there were was much more foam.What I'm looking for is support like a half filled air mattress with a memory foam top without the flat/limp feel when moving on it or sitting on it. In essence I want the mattress to fill in the parts with support of the body where there is less mass and higher points and cushion the heavier mass and lower points of the body. So that's why I chose a hybrid mattress with individual springs.I hope to update this as I sleep on it more. However with it mostly just being springs and less foam than I thought I may have to put at least a 2-in foam topper on it.-- After 3 nights on it I had to definitely put a foam topper on it. It's a very firm mattress. I am on a solid platform. In a way I like it but it's not what I was looking for initially.-----Okay so it's been a bit more time. I really like this mattress yet it might not be the best for me being a restless sleeper. I might need foam only.For me the spring/hybrid mattress is fun to lay on with more of a free feeling to it compared to just foam because the only foam mattresses seem to hold me more in place. However, for me that memory foam hold in place is good because I am less resless.However, the difference I feel is more push on my lower back and butt on this hybrid maybe because I'm not sinking in the same way on just foam and It took a week to get used to that. I switched back to a new foam for a night and slept really good and woke up without any issues right away. This mattress took me longer to get used to than foam.Another thing though between only foam and this hybrid is you can always add a memory foam pad to the spring/hybrid later where adding more foam pad to an only foam mattresses may be a bit too much foam. I tried it.What I do like about this mattress is the cotton covering around it and it does not smell like foam only mattresses.----After a bit more time, I've bounced between a foam mattress and this one and I'm reconsidering and have decided that I like this one much more because of its back support feel. I feel more aligned with this mattress.", 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States April 3, 2020', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Took a chance....delivered today.....SIMPLY AWESOME!!!!!', 'author': 'Joy Reynolds', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'Took a chance, delivered today. Simply AWESOME...beyond COMFY. Love the way delivered, in a box, that is really OK on a porch, while I work....thought the box might be too big....for doorstep type of thing....but worked out well, box is slender.....just like the video shows it will be. I am AMAZED!!!! THIS MATTRESS IS TRULY BOUNCY! LOVE IT!!!!!! and the handles on the side helped me to place it ..... I am pushing 80 years old; AND though the mattress is heavy and sturdy; I could move it to fit perfectly with no effort. Solid and SUPREME.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States January 11, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '3.0 out of 5 stars Full size', 'author': 'Ashley Jackson', 'rating': 3, 'content': 'I got the full size mattress and it is very very firm. Following the instructions, I unrolled the 1st plastic wrap which rolls out the mattress, and immediately heard a hissing sound. I knew the compressed plastic was damaged. Maybe from shipping, because the box was damaged (picture available for customer service). Using their tool to cut the compressed plastic away from the mattress, I see the top has a hole and stain in the center and another small hole near foot (pictures also available). I purchased based on reviews.UPDATE 2/19/24: I cannot say enough about the Amazon customer service representative. She was so helpful and understanding with the refund/return process. Because of her I will change the stars rating to 4.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States February 19, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '4.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable and good quality for the price.', 'author': 'Angela Morris', 'rating': 4, 'content': 'Best quality for the price. title: Queen Mattress, 12 Inch Memory Foam Hybrid Pocket Spring Mattresses in a Box, Medium Firm Breathable Pillow Top Pressure Relief, CertiPUR-US Certified
Queen Mattress, 14Inch Medium Plush Supportive Memory Foam Hybrid Mattress, Pressure Relief 7-Zone Individual Pocket Springs Queen Size Mattress in a Box, CertiPUR-US Certified, 60"*80"
reviews: [{'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars A quality hybrid memory foam mattress', 'author': 'James M.', 'rating': 5, 'content': "For the longest time, I found myself in a committed relationship with my Zinus Green Tea memory foam mattress. It was a decent match, serving me well through countless nights. Yet, as the years passed, the spark began to fade, and I found myself longing for something more—something that could rekindle the joy of jumping into bed at the end of a long day. That's when I discovered the DIGLANT King Mattress, and let me tell you, it was love at first sleep.Why I'm Head Over Heels for My DIGLANT Mattress:The Perfect Balance of Firmness: I've danced on both sides of the mattress firmness spectrum, and finding the middle ground has always been a challenge. The DIGLANT mattress, with its medium plush feel, is like the Goldilocks of beds—not too firm, not too soft, just right. It cradles my body with just enough give to feel luxurious yet offers the support my back needs to wake up feeling refreshed and pain-free.Support Where It Counts: The difference maker for me has been the 7-zone individual pocket springs. This isn't your average spring system; it's tailored to provide targeted support across different areas of your body. The result? A more personalized sleep experience that adapts to my needs, whether I'm curled up in a fetal position or lying flat on my back, staring at the ceiling and pondering life's mysteries.Staying Cool Under the Covers: I used to be that person who'd flip the pillow in search of the cool side throughout the night. But with the DIGLANT mattress, those days are behind me. Its ability to regulate temperature and keep heat at bay has been a game-changer, especially during those warm summer nights when even a whisper of warmth can be the difference between sweet dreams and a night of tossing and turning.Seamless Transition from Box to Bed: The unboxing experience was surprisingly satisfying. Watching the mattress expand and take shape was like witnessing a caterpillar transform into a butterfly—effortless and beautiful. It reached its full size without any weird dips or bumps, a testament to the quality and care put into its design and packaging.Edge Support That Defies Gravity: As someone who often finds themselves perched on the edge of the bed, either reading a book or simply contemplating the day ahead, the edge support on this mattress is a revelation. Gone are the days of slowly sliding off the bed or feeling unsupported. The DIGLANT mattress holds firm, providing a stable and comfortable perch no matter where I find myself.The Verdict:Reflecting on my sleep journey, the transition to the DIGLANT King Mattress feels like moving from a cramped apartment into a spacious, luxurious home. Every night, I look forward to the embrace of my mattress, knowing it will provide the perfect blend of comfort, support, and coolness. The thoughtful design, from the targeted spring support to the temperature regulation and robust edge support, shows a deep understanding of what makes a good night's sleep truly great.", 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States February 7, 2024', 'is_verified': False}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Meets or exceeds expectations', 'author': 'Jeff & Wendy S', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'Shopping for a mattress online is about the hardest thing you can shop for. I\'m a car-but who has spent less time researching a car than a mail-order mattress. Pick any mattress and the reviews will be all over the place... and you can\'t really return them if you don\'t like them (I\'m not sure what they do.)Disclaimer: possibly as someone who has spent more hours than I can count researching mattresses on Amazon I was offered this one at a substantial discount through the Vine reviewer\'s program... but while I *do* factor in cost/value in my reviews, I do NOT let the discount influence my reviews... but it does get me to try products I might not have otherwise tried.That said, I took a chance on a brand I\'d never heard of before and ordered this. It arrived via freight truck surprisingly quickly. My first impression was that I was shocked how heavy it was (130 pounds!). It\'s also very tall! So make sure your bed situation can handle a 14" tall mattrees. This is neither a good or bad thing, but something you should be aware of. It took two of us to lift it onto the platform.It expanded very quickly, but I resisted the urge to evaluate it too quickly. I didn\'t even get on it for 24 hours, and didn\'t sleep on it until the third night. (Although I don\'t think you would do any harm by using it immediately. The instructions do say it could take 7 days (!) to fully expand. The truth is, it\'s going to expand 90% in the first few minutes, 95% in the first few hours, and then take a couple of days to finish taking the tiny bit of bagginess out of the sides.) One thing to note: before you remove even the outer plastic sleeve, make sure you\'ve placed the mattress where you want it. I very carefully cut away the two outer sleeves and found there was a very small hole (nowhere near where I was cutting - it wasn\'t me) in the vacuum wrap so it slowly started expanding immediately... then, once I intentionally cut the vacuum wrap, it expanded much more quickly.)But you don\'t care about all that... you want to know how it works.Very well! So far, I love it!We just moved across the country, leaving behind 3 mattresses that all worked well. We temporarily moved into a furnished rental that has a well-known second-tier brand (starts with a "Z") and a VERY expensive brand name Te---Pe---. THIS is my favorite of the 6 mattresses I\'ve used in the last 2 months (The "Z" brand is a close second - also very good). I\'ve not tested in temperature extremes, but it seems very neutral. Also, some people ask about "chemical" smell... this has pretty much none. There was a little when I first opened it up, but it was a light, pleasant odor, like new furniture, and nothing you\'d walk into the room and notice.The Amazon page says this is a "plush", but I think it was the label on the box that said it was a "medium plush". I think "medium plush" is the more accurate. I love soft beds, but I\'m always afraid that if it\'s *too* soft it could hurt my bad back or could feel constricting. Had I tried this mattress blindly, I would have guessed it was a medium, so my fear of it being "too" soft is not a concern. I think this is a bed that could satisfy anyone who didn\'t need the most extreme ends of the scale. Heck, I might even put a thin (1 - 1.5") memory foam topper on it for added luxury, but it\'s pretty nice as-is, soft and conforming, yet supportive. I\'m not sure if it\'s my "dream" mattress, (I haven\'t found that yet) but it\'s excellent and also better (to me) than the multi-thousand mattresses I tried in the furniture store recently... the purple one was pretty nice, but I don\'t think I\'d ever pay that much.Well done. I look forward to many years of comfortable sleep.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States February 5, 2024', 'is_verified': False}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Bed in a box works wonders', 'author': 'InfDiversity InfCombinations', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'A bed in a box that is comfortable sounds misleading. I admit that I was skeptical because I wondered how does it keep integrity and comfort when it is rolled up before use. Well, I am a firm believer (no pun intended). Once you open the box and unravel the mattress, I gave it 48 hours for it to fully expand before using it. It measures at 14" and laying down on it, I was amazed at how comfortable it was. The 5 layered memory foam feels good on the back and the rest of my body, it conforms really well to my back and for my wife\'s. It doesn\'t sink at all in the middle nor is it uneven in pressure (like the edges compared to the center). The comfort level extends to the cooling factor on it, for I was afraid that it was going to create a lot of heat for me. Well, it is very breathable and allows air flow to work well on my body. When adjusting around, the hundreds of small coils are very quiet and creates less movement as I do shift around at night. My wife hardly felt me moving around which is great for her own comfort. Overall, a great and solid bed especially if you like medium firm pressure.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States February 20, 2024', 'is_verified': False}, {'title': '4.0 out of 5 stars soft and supportive', 'author': 'J. Villeneuve', 'rating': 4, 'content': "It's a very soft memory foam that engulfs you in the mattress. its a very deep mattress that sits higher than my previous bed, the width is very thick. Not a bad thing- just important to note. the bed is slightly larger than my queen frame, not by much just requires a shove to get it to fit. it's really comfortable and has given me a good nights sleep", 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States February 7, 2024', 'is_verified': False}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Super comfortable and luxurious!', 'author': 'Cindy G.', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'I am so glad I took a chance on this mattress! I had never ordered one without testing it out first in a regular mattress showroom. However, this one looked like it was a nice quality, and it was time to replace the sagging queen mattress we have had since forever, as my back was always bothering me.The mattress is very easy to set up - it comes rolled up and vacuum sealed. You will need 2 people to lift this onto your bed. We have a bed with slats on the bottom, so we didn\'t use or need a box spring. The directions are easy to follow to set it up. Like magic, the mattress puffed up into its full size in around 20 seconds! We let it air out a couple of days, since it said so in the directions.The mattress was supportive, yet soft, comfy, and it felt so luxurious. No more back problems! We had not problem using existing sheets, as they fit fine. But make sure your sheets can handle the 14" height. We have another bed in our house that needs a new mattress, and I no longer have to shop around. I highly recommend this!', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States February 21, 2024', 'is_verified': False}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Another mattress in a box happiness…', 'author': 'Amaz-Mel', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'This is not my first mattress in a box purchase and I am none the less pleased yet again. I needed another mattress for my guest bedroom and took a chance on this brand and wow, wow, wow…very happy with the quickness of delivery, to the rolled up mattress in a tall box. It always takes some doing to unpackage it and let it breathe for a couple days in my garage (no funny smells just what I prefer to do).This mattress is 2 inches higher than my other and it really makes a difference in just that 2”. Comfort is aided by softness and firmness all at the same time. Did I mention how nice looking it is too?My first guest was VERY comfortable and had a pleasant nights sleep. I will say that I was very apprehensive about getting a mattress in a box with my first one thinking how could it possibly be good….so I am very happy I took a chance. The others I have all standing up well and holding their quality. I expect nothing less with this one. Happy girl and happy guests!!!', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States February 23, 2024', 'is_verified': False}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Good quality', 'author': 'taylor', 'rating': 5, 'content': "I've been using this mattress for about two months. I'm using a low profile box spring and a bed frame. I previously had a mattress topper which I no longer use because it's not needed and adds too much height. This mattress is tall! I wanted something delivered because I don't have a truck. As delievered, this was easy to maneuver and expanded quickly. Ultimately I have been sleeping incredibly well with this mattress. I will update the review at the one year mark if there are any problems with its quality or longevity but so far I am really happy with it.", 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States March 1, 2024', 'is_verified': False}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Sleeping much better, now.', 'author': 'sal', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'This mattress was replacing an older memory foam mattress. It was actually a few inches larger in each direction than our previous one, which is great because it fills in the frame better and no more lost pillows. Really pleased with this mattress.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States February 17, 2024', 'is_verified': False}, {'title': '4.0 out of 5 stars The best sleep!!', 'author': 'Renee', 'rating': 4, 'content': "The media could not be loaded. reviews: [{'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Best for any need!!!!', 'author': 'Kunj patel', 'rating': 5, 'content': "I was terrified of buying another foam mattress online after receiving a low quality one from Overstock that was billed as 10 inches but barely extended to 8 inches. title: Hybrid Mattress King,12 Inch King Size Mattress in a Box, Medium Firm King Bed Mattress with Individual Pocket Springs & Comfort Foam for Pressure Relief
reviews: [{'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Hesitant/skeptical at first, but surprisingly satisfied!!!', 'author': 'Julio', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'The unwrapping was a breeze. It’s is on the heavier side, so make sure you place on the bed frame while it’s still in the inner vacuum packaging.1. No chemical or weird smells.2. Fabric is soft, thick, and feels high-end.3. After only 1 day, expanded to 10-11”, however instructions do call for at least 72 hours for all around expansion, so be aware of that.4. Slept on it day of delivery and felt great! You DO NOT feel the springs (I was worried about that).This is replacing a $900 Sealy mattress and feels much better than my old mattress. I was hesitant to buy a mattress in a box, and considering the above, I have no regrets.The only feedback I would have is that it would be nice to have handles for transport.It’s an overall great value, solid construction, and a definitely 5 star recommendation.Hope this helps anyone out there deciding whether to get this or not.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States December 14, 2023', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Great deal, comfy bed, disregard any bad reviews', 'author': 'Angry Steve', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'I was VERY skeptical about buying a bed online unseen or untested first just like everyone else, the first thing i did was find the options I wanted or needed scrolling thru a bunch of beds on here, the pillow top is a must and any bed that has cooling elements too is a plus, I got the 12 inch thick full size I never heard of the brand before but after reading all the good reviews, and the very few bad ones , youll never please everyone and they obviously didnt read the directions, this bed came quick in a box I thot for sure was going to be way to small but once i opened it and saw it vacuum sealed I felt alot better, MAKE SURE you have a big enough area when you cut open the plastic wrap it will unfold as fast and with the force of a life raft, dont have any small kids or pets or valuables in the area, I didnt do that and it almost knocked my tv off my dresser, at first the springs were very noticeable as the bad reviews say, but if you read the directions it clearly says it takes up to a few days for it to fully form and youre not supposed to sleep on it for at least 3 nights, the first night i just sat on it - impatient - and could feel the springs, the second night i sat on it again and felt no springs but the side springs were not fully formed yet you could feel them, the 3rd night it was near perfect and I slept on it no issues very comfy, the 4th night was even better and has been since, dont sleep on it for 3 nights like it says, I really like this bed I hope it holds up for a few years and at just under $300 Im happy with it for sure, and as my review name says - Angry Steve - this bed does not make me angry lol, I am 5\'9\' 200lbs and its very comfy, if I like it youll love it and I am picky, I got the 12" thick bed and it has a charcoal layer foam? in it and I have not woken up with the sweats like my old bed a big named brand - starts with an S ends with a Y - so obviously whatever makes the cool part work works, I only wish I bought the queen size but the full is good enough, I would recommend and buy another one of these beds no problem - 12 inch thick - to anyone kids, grown ups, ,elderly handicapped etc..', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States February 23, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Almost Perfect', 'author': 'William Graham', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'This mattress is very good especially for the price. I was looking for a mattress that was firm yet soft. After reading thru the reviews and comparing comments I settled on this one. It expanded to full size within one day and is very comfortable except that I wish the top was softer. I ended up pairing this mattress with the Mellow 1.5 inch five Zone Memory Foam Topper -https://a.co/d/hjn4Wq2 - now its perfect and both at a cost of less than $350. I highly recommend this mattress.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States February 15, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '4.0 out of 5 stars I love it but it took a while for my husband', 'author': 'Erika', 'rating': 4, 'content': 'I love the comfort of the bed, it is more on the plush side of medium firm, but its extremely comfortable for me. It took my husband a little while but now he sleeps on it comfortably, with us 2 plus 3 dogs sleeping on the bed the odor eliminating properties work well too', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States February 28, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Great mattress, has improved my sleep', 'author': 'Heather Rae', 'rating': 5, 'content': "Needed a cheaper mattress to replace my old foam mattress that was completely done in. After weeks of looking I decided on this. The Mattress itself is pretty, it's very comfortable still and it's well made. I couldn't be happier with this decision. I was in a ton of pain as I already deal with fibro and sciatica issues. *Detailed information included about my size and mattress experience at the bottom of review). My mattress really needed to be replaced, but the firmness of this is just right to support my body pretty evenly and most days I wake up without much stiffness (given my medical issues.. 100% would be unachievable by just buying a mattress, and if it were actually achievable I'd probably sell my car to afford such a mattress lol). My previous mattress was a 16 in memory foam mattress and this is definitely not as tall but beyond comfortable. Also finding sheets that fit is quite a bit easier now and less expensive honestly. I think I prefer the hybrid over just foam.I am about 150 lbs and 5'5. I know different weight and height can cause discrepancies with mattress comfort so I really can't give a recommendation for a much larger or smaller person. I sleep in every position, but majority on my side I find. I have found it super comfortable to sleep on my stomach on this mattress which I could not do on my old mattress much bc it hurt after awhile. I really love sleeping, like probably more than is healthy so I spend a lot of time on my mattress and it's a super important purchase for me even if I'm having to budget for lower price options. Seriously, I even lay in bed to play video games. If I'm not up and active, my bed is my go to seating. I feel like this mattress was an excellent purchase. Hopefully this helps bc I realize that I just wrote an essay, but I looked for these things in reviews and could only find extensive details like 1 out of 100. Those really help me think through my decision on a big purchase so hopefully some of this info helps someone else out :)", 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States August 24, 2023', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Oh this bed is nice!!!', 'author': 'Amanda A. BUT -', 'author': 'Jackie Finch', 'rating': 4, 'content': 'Love the mattress and my joints are much happier! And it arrived a full 8 days earlier than the original delivery date. Yay!!BUT - some odd lifeform or other had evidently decided to reside on it, as I woke up the next day with what looked like itchy red bites on my arms and legs. I thought that that was rather strange, as the mattress is packed in two separate layers of plastic and both layers were INTACT upon receipt. I sprinkled a generous amount of food-grade diatomaceous earth on the entire mattress and let it sit for a few hours, then vacuumed it off. No problems after that.AND - I would caution that it would be better to have a second person during the unwrapping. I had no choice but to do it myself. The instruction sheet states that the mattress is eager to leave the confines of the plastic wrap. I like the tongue-in-cheek instructions (!) but "eager" is quite the understatement and I would instead describe it as "desperate" or even "wantonly flings" itself out of the packaging. And that it did! And it ended up being upside down since the mattress was rolled up with the top surface facing the outside of the roll. Thus, my bony old self was engaged with having to flip over a king-sized mattress (yup, you guessed it) by myself.And I have no idea which part of the mattress has "organic cotton" in it, as neither of the two tags sewn to the mattress reference the term, despite the term being printed on the top of the mattress.It\'s a five-star mattress in a four-star process. Quite comfy, though.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States August 8, 2023', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '4.0 out of 5 stars Matress', 'author': 'crystal', 'rating': 4, 'content': 'The mattress is nice for the price, comfortable, and it fit my twin beds perfectly.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States October 22, 2023', 'is_verified': True}]

reviews: [{'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars REAL Review', 'author': 'AP', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'I was looking through reviews for something that could make me want to purchase this and didn’t really find any, but took a chance anyways. title: Twin Mattress 8 Inch Copper Memory Foam Mattress, CertiPUR-US Certified Made in USA, Cooling Gel Bed Mattress in a Box Fiberglass Free, Kids Mattress for Bunk Bed, 38"×75", Medium
reviews: [{'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars So far so good!', 'author': 'Anonymous', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'I needed something quickly to replace an old bed, just for the short term. I also needed something nontoxic. I am someone who is very sensitive to odors[like chemicals], on all accounts. I read reviews carefully before purchasing. I did not notice any odor to speak of, once all packaging was removed(packing materials can smell plasticy or like wherever they were stored.)Have only had it a few days so far, but the relative sleeping on it regularly is enjoying it, saying it’s quite comfortable and cool. I too thought it was comfortable, considering the reasonable cost and speedy shipping.There are no springs- only foam. The cover it has on it is pretty nice looking too. The mattress is lightweight and easy to move. It came vacuum sealed in a rectangular box. The mattress while sealed is maybe an inch thick. Once opened, it took less than a day to fully inflate and shape up, which it did without issue.I may share an update to this review in the future to see how it’s holding up. I’d say it’s a good choice for an inexpensive guest bed.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States January 29, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Save your money!', 'author': 'nikosuave', 'rating': 5, 'content': "Save your money and stay away from the big box mattress companies! This is a quality mattresses for a fraction of the cost you would be charged elsewhere. This is not our 1st bed-in-a-box purchase, but it has been one of the better ones. There was virtually no odor that I could detect and it inflated to the height of the photo with measurement in less than 1 hour. Firmness feels just right and our 6 year old loves her new bed and mattress! It comes with a very soft and nice removable covet which is great for washing! We still intend to put a waterproof mattress protector on however. For health reasons, it's good to stick to Certi-Pur, Greenguard or OEKO-TEX certified mattresses. I spent a couple days researching the various mattresses available and so far we are very happy with our purchase!", 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States September 15, 2023', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars So so comfy', 'author': 'CB', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'This twin size mattress worked out great for our Trundle bed. The quality was fantastic and Amazon was timely and delivered with care! I cannot wait to sleep on this mattress!💛💙', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States November 28, 2023', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '3.0 out of 5 stars Not true to size.', 'author': 'Sharon Jia', 'rating': 3, 'content': "Mattress is decently comfortable however it is not true to size. I got the king and it is four inches shorter than quoted on the website. The bed frames are too big for the mattress and there's gaps between the frame and the wall that I have my bed up against.", 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States December 22, 2023', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '3.0 out of 5 stars Seems great but potentially deceptive about fiberglass', 'author': 'Neptune5', 'rating': 3, 'content': 'Company said in the answers to questions on this page that this is fiberglass free and the cleaning instructions say you can remove the cover to wash it. I checked the tag before unwrapping it and it lists materials for the outer cover (polyester) and the foam. I let it air out outside and unzipped the outer cover to let it breathe better only to realize there\'s an inner cover (the sock) that was not listed on the tag. It is covered in fine shiny fibers that could be fiberglass. I wrote the company asking what it\'s made of and asked on the Amazon page. I\'ve gotten nothing. I\'m tired of dealing with Amazon bc I\'d ordered a different mattress originally and was sent the wrong one 3 times. Now this. I don\'t want fiberglass in my house but I don\'t want to deal with customer service again. I put an additonal zippered cover over the entire thing and told my son not to take it off. He is sleeping better now and it looks to be a nice mattress. We only got to 10 inches even though I ordered a 12". Only other complaint is that it does seem firm. He prefers a plush feel. If there is fiberglass, it is shameful and deceitful saying the cover can be removed. And pretty sure it\'s illegal to not list the material of the sock on the tag. Very shady, not to mention the company not bothering to respond to my email.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States March 23, 2022', 'is_verified': True}]

title: Queen Mattress, 12 Inch Hybrid Queen Size Mattress in a Box, Gel Memory Foam and Individual Pocket Spring for Cooling Sleep & Motion Isolation, Starry Night,Blue
reviews: [{'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Love our mattress', 'author': 'Theresa Plesco', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'Wanted to wait until we had our mattress over a week to make sure we liked it. And we love it!!We both have chronic back issues and our old mattress was killing us, we were both waking in pain every day. I spent a long time reviewing mattresses and customer reviews and decided on this one. We are not disappointed, just enough firmness and softness. No pain at shoulders or hip points, supportive for back. Best sleep in years', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States December 17, 2023', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Very nice mattress', 'author': 'Lachlan Carter', 'rating': 5, 'content': "The mattress was really compact when delivered. Once unpacked, I placed the compressed mattress on the frame, and as soon as I cut the vacuum bag, it decompressed almost instantly. It took less than a day to fully expand, and after a period of about 3-4 days, I fully adjusted to it. The material is good, and it’s surprisingly cool for a hot sleeper like me. We have slept on it some nights now, and it was very comfortable but much softer than I expected. The best sleep we have had in years. If you're looking for a good mattress on a bit on the firmer side for a good price, this is it. I'm pleased with this purchase.", 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States November 7, 2023', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars I was SUPER skeptical- but', 'author': 'Lauren', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'I’m really glad I purchased this mattress. First time buying a mattress in a box and I was fully prepared to think “meh it’s just for now- it was only $300 ish” however after sleeping on it for 3 weeks, I’m smitten.Pros:-great edge control-comfortable-easy to move around when it’s shipped (although it is heavy!!)-no funky smell/ inflated to full size quickly-I feel very supported while I’m sleeping- I’m a side and stomach sleeper-typically- no hip or shoulder pain!-you/your bedmate won’t feel moving/shifting/getting up- great movement isolation-the pattern on the mattress cover is cute!A couple cons- by no means deal breakers imo-definitely firm- if you’re looking for more plush, grab a mattress topper for this.-it does run hot- a cooling mattress topper would help this out quite a bit.Over all, I’m very very pleased with the purchase and I would buy again!', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States December 18, 2023', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '4.0 out of 5 stars So far so good', 'author': 'Clayton Thomas', 'rating': 4, 'content': 'This mattress is really comfortable. Sleeping much better than before.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States February 18, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Love this mattress', 'author': 'Olivia', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'I don’t know how long it’s been since I have been able to sleep through the night without waking up in the middle of the night or waking up with back/shoulder pain (because i’m a side sleeper) but since i got this mattress I have been sleeping so much better!Once I cut the plastic holding the mattress in a roll, it sprung out super fast. I let it rise and checked in on the process thought out and 24 hours into the process it had almost doubled in size! Once the 48 hours were up it was very thick so I recommend deeper sheets! It is heavy so I recommend it being a two person project!Overall this mattress gets a 5/5 from me it took like no time to rise, it’s super comfortable, and it was very easy to set up (with two people)!', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States February 1, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Amazing bed', 'author': 'Danielle Sheets', 'rating': 5, 'content': "I researched for a long time before choosing this one and I am extremely happy with it. I was really reluctant on spending the money on a bed in a box but I'd say this is one of the best purchases that I've ever made. The other was an automatic litter box for my cats. The only bad thing about this bed is that I never want to get up because it is so comfortable!", 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States February 13, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Exceeded my expectations!', 'author': 'Anglea', 'rating': 5, 'content': "This is a super comfortable mattress, I love it. It forms around the body so no pressure points, and I move around less at night so I'm sleeping better.I used to need a pillow to put my leg on so I could sleep on my side so my back wouldn't hurt from the angle of my spine, now I don't. Overall we really like this mattress.This was a fantastic upgrade to an older inner spring mattress.", 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States February 18, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars good quality', 'author': 'bill', 'rating': 5, 'content': "My wife and I both suffer from back pain so I ordered this mattress in hopes that the support would provide relief from waking up in pain every morning. We received the mattress right on time. Came in all packaged in the box and fluffed up in 1 day.The mattress's build quality and durability are impressive. When we opened the box we let the mattress sit flat for just over 48 hours before we put it on our bed. Does not smell like chemicals at all. This mattress is feels comfortable and durable.Perfect for back shleeper,it is very firm and it provide support in all the right places.", 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States October 20, 2023', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '4.0 out of 5 stars Easy, affordable, but end is slouchy.', 'author': 'Emily Gray', 'rating': 4, 'content': 'Read this review a few times and it is unfortunately true. The end of the mattress is way soft. Like the last six inches don’t have the support as the rest. It’s at my feet so it’s not impacting me much. Sitting on that end is awkward so I just avoid it. For the money, it’s a nice, tall, medium mattress and I’d buy it again for my current need. I didn’t want to buy an investment mattress because I’m likely going to be moving in a little over a year. This will last until then just fine.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States February 16, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '4.0 out of 5 stars You get what you pay for', 'author': 'Amazon Customer', 'rating': 4, 'content': "This is a very decent mattress. It's firm and feels like what it is. It's by no means a high end luxury mattress. But it's about right for the price tag. I sleep extremely well on it. It reached its impressive full size within 3 or 4 hours as far as I could tell. It feels like your sleeping on well supported memory foam. Not a deeply plush soft cloud; you'll need to drop another 500 more for one of those. But if you're not looking for complete luxury, you'll be fine with this.", 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States December 28, 2023', 'is_verified': True}]

title: Full Size Mattress, 10 Inch Medium Firm Individual Pocket Coil Innerspring Hybrid Full Mattress, Edge Support, Motion Isolation, Pressure Relief, Mattress Full Size
reviews: [{'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Good quality at a value price', 'author': 'LKF', 'rating': 5, 'content': "The knock against foam mattresses is that they can sleep hot and some folks don't like the way they support you.But they are incredibly convenient--this one got sent to me in a box about the size of a vacuum cleaner (but MUCH heavier) and setting it up is a breeze. The mattress comes compressed so be careful opening the plastic wrapping and avoid cutting the foam or the ticking. If you haven't had one of these, have someone video because the expansion is impressive and in a few minutes you will have a full size brand new mattress. Seller says to allow this to expand for 24 hours or so and I think that is good advice--it gives the mattress a chance to off-gas a bit (it's not bad and doesn't last more than a few minutes but this does have a bit of a chemical odor at first.)There is some kind of gel topping used in making this according to the seller. One side of the mattress has the gel pad but the other does not. The mattress does sleep cooler than a typical foam mattress. Additionally, the edgeof the mattress, while not as firm as a typical coil mattress, does offer more support. You can sit on it but it will compress significantly.The feel of the mattress is bouncy but supportive--you will find this contouring around you as you lay down on it and it will sort of cradle you as you sleep. Some people find it a bit unnerving but I like it.Good product.", 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States February 1, 2024', 'is_verified': False}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable, good price, hybrid (foam+springs)', 'author': 'Harnell', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'First, be careful opening. The mattress is compressed into a roll less than 12” in diameter. When you cut off the plastic wrapping it opens FAST. It took a second to go from compressed roll to a 12” thick mattress. Make sure no one is in the way or they may have a few injuries from a flying mattress. They provide a tool to cut open the plastic without getting the mattress. Nice.The directions say to let it sit for 1 to 3 days to stretch out after being so tightly compressed. They also say to rotate it every 2 weeks for the first 3 months then rotate it every 3 months. It looks like a quality mattress and feels very comfortable. It is reasonably firm and supports my weight comfortably. It looks and feels like a more expensive mattress. I have several Ikea mattresses and this looks and feels like a middle priced Ikea mattress. This is a great choice for a bunk bed.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States February 17, 2024', 'is_verified': False}, {'title': '3.0 out of 5 stars NOT FIRM', 'author': 'RUBEN', 'rating': 3, 'content': 'Definitely not 10 inches', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States February 22, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Awesome mattress', 'author': 'Phillip Goodson', 'rating': 5, 'content': "This is an example of big things coming in little packages. How they pack these things is a mystery, but when the box comes in you think that there's no way a mattress could fit in that size box. The mattress itself is pretty darned awesome and is very comfortable. We got this for the grandson's bed and it's truly an awesome mattress. He loves jumping on it because it has quite a bit of bounce.", 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States February 6, 2024', 'is_verified': False}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent Comfort', 'author': 'AmazingGrace', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'The media could not be loaded. This TXO mattresses is so supportive and comfortable. It arrives in a medium sized box and is all rolled up. It comes with a small tool to cut open the plastic wrapping. Once opened, it begins to expand. It needs 72 hours to fully expand. Once expanded, the instructions recommend rotating/turning it every 3 weeks for the first few months to even the initial wear. The fabric in this mattress is OEKO-TEX which is certified free of harmful chemicals. It also has US Certified Foam which should make it durable for many years. It has a pocket spring system which is supposed to offer great support while resting.Mostly, this is a plush and well-made mattress that sleeps comfortably. It comes with a 10-year warranty. I would recommend this mattress to others.See my video and pictures for details. Thank you for reading my honest and objective review.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States February 25, 2024', 'is_verified': False}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Very nice mattress', 'author': 'Jay Day', 'rating': 5, 'content': "This is a great mattress for my son. It's very affordable and comfortable. The material is high quality and it looks super clean. Comes in a box vacuum sealed and takes a couple hours for it to fully expand. Easy setup!", 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States February 20, 2024', 'is_verified': False}]

title: Leesa Sapira Hybrid 11" Mattress, Queen Size, Premium Cooling Foam and Individually Wrapped Spring / CertiPUR-US Certified / 100-Night Trial
reviews: [{'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Exceptional mattress', 'author': 'Innovator', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'Yes, it\'s a tad firmer than I was used to, but the back and edge support this hybrid mattress offers are exceptional, eliminating the back pain I had with my previous memory foam-only mattress. The build quality and luxurious materials used are high grade. Overall, the Sapira is a class act.Day 1: The mattress arrives in a tall square-box, about 2x2x4. I attached a photo of what the mattress looks like compressed inside the box. Upon placing the mattress on my boxspring, I cut the plastic off and the bed immediately sprung to life, literally, as the coils decompressed. Yes, there is a noticeable off-gassing smell, but it\'s not offensive. I left my window open at night, and 90% of the smell was gone by the next morning.Day 2: At first, the mattress was a bit firm, but after about 24-36 hours the mattress had fully decompressed and was much more comfortable. It\'s probably a 6.5/7 out of 10 on the firmness scale, the way most online professional mattress websites suggest. The top Avena foam layer sleeps cool, so I don\'t overheat. The bounce the Avena foam + the pocketed coils provide makes moving around, and getting out of bed effortless. The off-gassing smell is just about gone now.Day 3: Decided to get rid of my old mattress and keep the Sapira. I sleep mostly on my back, but sometimes on my side and stomach throughout the night. The only sleep position I thought wasn\'t going to work out was the side position, because of the firmness, but the 3 inches of Avena + memory foam actually provide just enough sinkage, while keeping my spine aligned. The off-gassing smell is completely gone now. I bought a mattress protector, and then my bed sheet goes over that to complete the package.When I bought this mattress last Sunday, there were 20 left in stock with Amazon. As of this morning, only 9 Queen-size beds were left in stock, while some sizes other than Queen were already out of stock. So clearly word is getting out about this mattress. At $1,325, it\'s also a lot less expensive than every other hybrid mattress on the market, most of which will cost at least $2,000 more than this one, and will require you going to a showroom, and taking time off work to be home for delivery.In conclusion, I highly recommend this mattress. Please feel free to ask me any direct questions on here. Also, if you have time, I recommend reading the review on Sleepopolis, as it\'s the most comprehensive professional review that matches my own experience.Update: although I bought a Claritin mattress protector, and although when I called Sapira customer service they recommended having one too, I removed it on Day 4. It added a "plastic" feel to the surface of the bed that became unbearable. Once I removed it, that initial softness I experienced on Day 1 came back again. I only intend to use just my bedsheet from here on out. I recommend you do the same.((On a side note, I suggest ignoring the only other two reviews on here, both two stars. Unlike myself, neither one is a confirmed buyer of this product. The first review is too short to be real for a legitimate mattress evaluation by an actual customer. The fact that this mattress has the firmness rating it does shows the Sapira is designed for superior back support, so the reviewer\'s complaint is illogical. The second review is also partially off topic, as they discuss the manufacturers\'s website, which has nothing to do with how the mattress feels. Yes, they are correct the mattress is a little firm, but every other online review already confirms this. So to slam the product with only two stars for performing how it was designed is unfair.))', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States September 2, 2017', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars good quality and definitely med firm', 'author': 'KC', 'rating': 5, 'content': "I've slept on this mattress now for a week and am very pleased with its level of firmness. I prefer firm (side and stomach sleeper) and this is definitely medium firm and I feel supported when side sleeping. I'm using an adjustable base (Lucid - highly recommend) and have it in up position frequently and it retains its shape . The only downside is that the edges are soft which makes it hard to sit on the edge, but I knew that when I bought it. So far I have no regrets with the Leesa Sapira.", 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States July 31, 2023', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Great mattress!', 'author': 'Donna S', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'I love this mattress. Needed a replacement for my 15-year old Therapedic. Took a chance on this highly rated product and have not been disappointed. It feels as good as my Therapedic. Soft and firm. Relieves my back and hip pain (I’m a side sleeper.) And it was HALF THE PRICE of a new Therapedic. I would recommend this mattress to all former Therapedic owners.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States August 14, 2023', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '4.0 out of 5 stars Feels comfortable but produces me back pain. Reimbursed by Amazon', 'author': 'Juan Diego Barco', 'rating': 4, 'content': 'When I lay in this mattress is soft and feels good. However, I always get up with back pain and I never suffered from back pain in my life.I have been trying to return the mattress for more than 2 months without sucess. As the mattress is unboxed, UPS will not allow pick it up.I have talked with several Amazon representatives but they have only forwared my petition and at the end they have not solved it.Update:After several calls and weeks trying to return the mattress, finally Amazon decided to reimburse me the full amount I payed. At the end they were cooperative,', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States April 10, 2023', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '2.0 out of 5 stars Needed to try - not THE BEST but good', 'author': 'KayDawg', 'rating': 2, 'content': "Heard rave reviews and was inundated with social media ads after looking Leesa up online while mattress shopping, so the Hybrid won out for, well, being a hybrid and because Leesa is a B Corp.Queen mattress on a slatted platform frame without a box spring.It's really soft - softer than I expected it to be for a hybrid, and you can feel the springs on the edges and right through the side of the mattress. But good for stomach/side sleepers and can be good for back sleepers if you don't already have a lumbar spine issue, IMO.My friend had one that I spent just one night on and I don't remember hers being this soft. Will the softness dissipate over time?I'm afraid I overpaid for something that won't last up to the standard 8-10 years since it's already soft and I can feel the springs. We'll know more when we get to the 100 days of trial (it's only been 30)", 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States June 26, 2021', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars I’m a new person.', 'author': 'Chelsea Breza-Berndt', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'First off, I’m not a product reviewer. I generally ignore any and all opportunities to write product reviews. But I felt the Leesa Hybrid was deserving of my time to write a review.We had been searching for a mattress for a couple years, mainly paralyzed by the fear of not liking whatever we decided to buy. Our old pillow top was about 9 years old and at 28 years old I was starting to understand how boomers feel when they wake up in the morning.We tried the Leesa in person at a local store and were sold, but Amazon had by far the best deal we could find.My boyfriend likes firm mattresses, but I’m 5’ 2” and 130 lbs so we needed to find a balance between firm and too firm. The nice part about the Leesa is the memory foam top, so you get a softer feel while still enjoying a medium firm mattress. It’s even perfect for my lighter body weight and the boyfriend thinks the firmness is satisfactory too. We are both happy.The one thing that has taken some getting used to is it sleeping cooler. We’ve had to play with the thermostat in the house a bit since our previous mattress slept so hot.However the most striking thing is the GREAT SLEEP AND TOTAL AND COMPLETE LACK OF BACK PAIN!!!! I would recommend this mattress to anyone!', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States February 26, 2020', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Was nervous ordering online!', 'author': 'R. Miller', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'I was so nervous ordering a mattress online. I had been able to try the mattress at a local store that carries the brand. Their delivery time was out 4 weeks. Amazon offered a discount and delivery was a few days out from the order date.I purchased a platform bed and it was recommended that I get a 9-11 inch high mattress. I like pillow top mattress especially. Not really available in the 9-11 inch range.I love this mattress! So comfortable and just soft enough for my liking. Very supportive yet comfortable. I am so happy that I picked this brand. Lessa is not as advertised as others, but well worth a look when thinking of spending a couple thousand dollars on a new mattress.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States August 10, 2023', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Really excellent', 'author': 'Jenna.Leann', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'We have had this mattress since July of 2018 and still love it. My husband prefers a slightly softer mattress, I prefer firm, and neither of us have any complaints. I am generally a side sleeper, no issues there.We have a king and I really wanted a mattress with good edge support and this one definitely does. It makes the mattress feel larger to us. Right now there’s three of us sharing this bed (us plus our 18 month old) and I love that the mattress is firm enough for us to feel safe having our son sleep with us. We all have our own space and never wake up sore.My husband has had two of his buddies buy this mattress and they were also happy with it (plus their wives). I also love that it’s a hybrid, full memory foam isn’t my thing and this just seems durable. Negative reviews on this mattress genuinely surprised me. Maybe we aren’t picky because neither of us have any back issues, but we sleep so much better than we did before!Mattresses are such a personal preference and I know it’s risky to order online, but this one is a pretty safe choice in my opinion (unless you prefer soft mattresses).', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States October 13, 2019', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '2.0 out of 5 stars Painful Sleeping Experience But Amazon Honored Their Refund Policy', 'author': 'New Homeowner', 'rating': 2, 'content': 'I really hoped this mattress would work for me, given all the positive reviews and ratings it\'s gotten from reputable (?) national media outlets, but it turned out awful for me. Maybe because my body is just too used to the firmness and bounce of inner spring mattresses, this memory foam hybrid caused pain in my back and hips so bad that I never slept through the night during the trial period. Some reviews say this mattress is too firm, but I found it too soft. Lying on my back, I could feel my butt sink down into the foam a good 3 inches; lying on my side, my hips would also sink down that far, pulling my spine out of alignment. Yes, the memory foam "bounced" back to normal once I got up, but that didn\'t help while I was lying down! Also, as someone used to moving around easily on an inner spring, moving around on this mattress also created pain in my back and sides since the memory foam basically "immobilizes" you.To Amazon\'s credit, they issued a full refund when I requested it, efficiently and quickly without making me go through a lot of paperwork or red tape.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States August 16, 2023', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '2.0 out of 5 stars Arrived mishappen.', 'author': 'Kathleen M. Sheehan', 'rating': 2, 'content': 'As shown in the attached photo, the mattress was narrower on the bottom than on the top at one end. This was the case on both sides of the mattress at that end. Thus, the mattress does not come to the edge of the foundation at this end. This defect may have been due to the mattress being compressed for shipping causing a permanent distortion in its shape. This was my first time purchasing a mattress that is shipped this way, so I do not know whether this is a common problem. I plan to replace with a mattress that is not compressed for shipping. Other than this defect, the mattress seems to be as advertised.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States October 29, 2023', 'is_verified': True}]
