reviews: [{'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars I love it', 'author': 'peter sun', 'rating': 5, 'content': "Exceptional comfort and support! I recently purchased Novilla's mattress, and I couldn't be happier with my decision. From the moment I laid down, I felt enveloped in luxurious comfort. The mattress contours perfectly to my body, providing just the right amount of support for a restful night's sleep. I wake up feeling refreshed and rejuvenated, thanks to the superior quality materials used in this mattress. Additionally, the breathability of the mattress keeps me cool throughout the night, ensuring uninterrupted sleep. The craftsmanship and attention to detail are evident, and I appreciate the durability and longevity this mattress offers. Overall, I highly recommend Novilla's mattress to anyone in search of unparalleled comfort and quality sleep experience.", 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States February 29, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars quality', 'author': 'shuling', 'rating': 5, 'content': "I wanted to buy a new mattress because I was moving. After searching for a long time, I decided to come back and give it a try next time. I didn’t expect the quality of this mattress to be so good and the delivery speed was very fast. When I first received the mattress, it was very heavy. My husband and I were alone. I can't even lift it up. When I opened it, I saw that the quality is very good and there is no smell. It's very comfortable to lie down on. It goes with the new bed frame I bought. It's perfect. The price is not expensive. Recommended to buy.", 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States February 28, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Recommended!', 'author': 'slow monkey', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'I am delighted with my Novilla Queen Size Mattress! Purchased it to replace my 20 years old mattress. Feel the difference immediately. On the manual says that it needs three days to fully expand. It actually expanded remarkably fast in just 24 hours, showcasing its high-quality build (maybe also because the stocking time is short, so it takes less time than normal to recover). The materials used are good, no chemical smell at all. The pillow top is incredibly soft, providing a luxurious and comfortable surface to sleep on. The mattress is actually medium firm, boasts a 3-zoned ergonomic design catering to all sleeping positions. The cooling gel memory foam and bamboo charcoal foam layers deliver a refreshing and supportive sleep experience. reviews: [{'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Impressive!', 'author': 'Mandy', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'I waited 6 months to write this review because I wanted to be sure that I had enough time to sleep on this mattress and give an honest review.Let me start by saying my husband and I are not small people, we also frequently have dogs and kids in our bed on any given night. We love it!', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States February 18, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '3.0 out of 5 stars Good quality but VERY firm', 'author': 'JessM', 'rating': 3, 'content': 'The mattress is good quality and I loved that it came with a cover that can zip off but the mattress was so firm that we had to return it as my son could not fall asleep on it.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States March 4, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars All you need to know about mattresses ☺️', 'author': 'NIck', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'So you\'re looking for a mattress! My guess you\'re overwhelmed with options and info. It\'s no brainer sleep is important and we want the best for our health/money/comfort. Well I\'m here to give my guidance!So when buying a mattress you always want "the best". Sleep is critical for every function of our lives. So it\'s very natural to humans to believe the more you spend quality reflects as such. Here\'s the deal with mattress, that is simply not the case! A lot of higher end mattress brands you would be shocked to know how much commission is into the price of the mattress for the floor associate.So now you\'re stuck looking at affordable mattresses online that you can neither see nor touch. But you\'re supposed to spend a third of your life on. Well that\'s no good!Well let\'s make it simple. Foam mattresses are the best currently on the market. Period. The spine support they offer. They run significantly cooler, this one especially. Durability. Quite. Ease of use (no box springs). Let me make this very clear the foam mattresses win every way over other mattress types. The only con to one is they might smell for a day or 2 when you first get it but it quickly goes away.Okay great so foam it is. Now firmness what\'s the right one for me. Good question in fact this is the number one priority for a mattress. What happens too often you want to sleep on a cloud or a pillow. Absolutely not. What happens on the super soft mattresses is you\'re swallowed by it and your back isn\'t properly supported/decompressing. THIS IS MEGA SUPER IMPORTANT. What happens is when your back is arched like that the vertebrae of your spine touch and here comes the back pain. The only time a super soft mattress is recommended is for a super light child 60 lbs or less. I\'m 135 lbs 5\'9, scrawny and still too much for even me. Reason being is because the child being so light won\'t sink into the mattress which will give good spine support and gravity can do it\'s job. It\'s all about the spine.This mattress sits a medium firm. Going more towards firm and is absolutely wonderful. My first night I switched from the squishy cloud mattress to this. My back laid flat and gravity allowed it stretch out and decompress. I was literally gasping for air equivalent to a good massage over how much my back was compressed over the years.This mattress is perfect for the average consumer. I will say heavier folks go with a firmer option. This one runs cool. Easy to change sheets on. Priced unbelievable! Can\'t say enough good. Don\'t let the mattress stores scam you thousands on a brand, this is the one for you!', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States June 1, 2023', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars It’s firm!', 'author': 'Need2Know', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'If you like a firm mattress, this one is for you. It’s almost a little bit too firm for us, but that is such a subjective comment. It pretty much means nothing to you. The edges are good and strong, you can sit on the edge and put your socks on without it getting crunched down real badly. We have this on a metal Frame also purchased here on Amazon and it is working out quite well. Have not slept on it during the summer yet, so I cannot attest to if it’s cool to sleep on or not. But so far we are liking it and it was a good value for the money.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States February 1, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars LOVE this mattress❤️', 'author': 'Mary2112', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'I absolutely LOVE this mattress!! My body doesn\'t hurt nearly as much when I wake up in the morning! I\'m 54--so pain is an every day thing for me, unfortunately. This mattress is very well made, and I feel it will stand the test of time. It is a memory foam mattress, so don\'t try to sit on the edge as it will "melt" beneath you! LOL. Hubby sits on it each morning putting his shoes on for work, so the mattress moves a bit. The ONLY thing I would change about it is the fact that it slips around pretty easily so I have to slide it into place every night. (NOT hard to do BTW--just a little annoying!)', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States January 26, 2024', 'is_verified': True}]

title: Sleep Original Foam Hybrid Mattress, Queen, Medium, Light Gray
reviews: [{'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Thank you for curing my back pain!', 'author': 'AL8', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'I have been suffering from extreme back pain ever since I bought my last mattress from Ikea one year ago. I purposely bought an extra firm Ikea mattress (8/10) because I had a super soft foam mattress (2/10) prior to that one, which I believe is where my back pain started. To be honest, I wasn’t a believer of the special engineering of these kinds of mattresses and thought the major reason for my pain were due to past injuries, work and personal related stress.As time went on, the pain got worse. I went to see a chiropractor and an acupuncture specialist and it wasn’t working. So I started to work out and do regularly back stretches. The pain got even worse, especially in the mornings. I’ve looked for numerous ways to cure myself and even wore a back brace for a year.I’ve researched for the past 9 months for a self-cure and one of the last things on my list was to change my newly bought super firm mattress. I read on health.com that people with back pain shouldn’t actually sleep on firmer mattresses, but should sleep on a softer foam/latex mattress at a firmness level of (6.5/10). So after reviewing multiple mattresses for months, I was about to get the Bear Hybrid Mattress as it seemed to me that athletes appreciated the recovery the Bear mattress provided them. I then found a review on tuck.com about the Casper original and how it’s best for light weight sleepers. Digging deeper, I found the Casper original hybrid, a 1/2 foam and 1/2 coils mattress with firmer zone support and longer lasting materials compared to the original. I found the Casper hybrid at an even cheaper price on Amazon then Casper’s official website and shipping would only take 2 days, rather than 2 weeks.2 days later, the Casper hybrid arrives outside my door in a well packed, tall large box. It was heavy but I was able to manage it myself. I wiped it down before opening it on my bed frame. It expanded within seconds and I was very surprised that there was no smell at all. I gave the new mattress a wipe down and let it sit for a few hours before trying it. (I read that we should let a new mattress sit for 24-48 hours but this Casper hybrid was ready to go out of the box.)2 hours later, I woke up realizing that I passed out while trying out the new mattress. I remember laughing with pure happiness before passing out. I felt like I was sleeping on bouncy clouds while gently being placed on top of it. The support for my shoulder and lower back dissolved the pain I had for years almost immediately. I thought to myself, I should have got this sooner.After sleeping on the Casper hybrid for the last couple days, the pain I use to wake up with every morning has disappeared 95%. Along with doing my daily stretches and massages, I wake up every morning 100% a brand new man. Thank you for curing my back pain!-Firmness Level 5.5-5.7/10.-No smell and ready to use out of the box.-Bouncy cloud feeling while gently being placed on top of it.-Great zone support and pressure relief.-Best for light weight and average weight sleepers.-Im a front sleeper, but I sleep on my back and sides very comfortably.-Edge support is not the best but very good considering the construction.-Mobilization transfer is not the best but good.-100 day free trail and 10 year basic warranty.-No home setup and no service to take old mattress away due to Covid.-Amazon is cheaper and has faster shipping options.I hope my honest review could help some of you out there. Recovery is so important, and this kind of investment is worth every penny. I would also recommend to do your daily stretches, massages and nightly hot bath sessions to speed up your recovery, all the best!', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States July 6, 2020', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Like Sleeping on a Marshmellow!', 'author': 'Gale Newbold', 'rating': 5, 'content': "This is the second Casper Original that we have purchased. The first was for our main bedroom which we love, and then we decided it was time to replace the mattress in our guest room, and we wanted our guests to experience this amazing comfortable sleeping experience. Also, my brother-in-law comes to stay to help with renovations in the house from time to time, and we want him to want to be there to do all of that work we need! It's the best. My husband is picky and he loves it. The ratings on Consumer Reports brought us to the decision, and Amazon responded and delivered and set it up with speed and professionalism.", 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States January 16, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Better than I could have imagined!', 'author': 'Stephanie', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'After hearing bad reviews on the Sleep Number and Tempur-Pedic mattresses, I had no idea how to find the perfect mattress. After reading the reviews on this Casper Original Hybrid, I was cautiously optimistic because some people just didn\'t like it but many did. We\'ve now had it for 4 months, and I can say that it really is like sleeping on a cloud. It is soft without being too soft. Still very supportive and I have no back or pain issues. Sink in (not too much) and say "ahhhh" every night. If you want a firm mattress, this is not the one for you. The Dreamcloud would be a better choice for firm (too firm for my taste). By the way, we purchased two twin XLs for a King sized bed and it\'s easier to handle the mattresses. No problem with the edges of the mattresses at the center like you would with traditional mattresses.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States March 30, 2023', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '4.0 out of 5 stars Rather good!', 'author': 'everett r jones', 'rating': 4, 'content': 'I had a tired, worn out Temur-pedic that I replaced with this deciding to give a hybrid "bed in a box" a try! Set up was pretty straight forward -- and a hoot to watch it puff up! It\'s a bit softer than I expected and more so towards the head of the mattress...but I fall right asleep and stay there! My right hip had been waking me up on my old mattress (I\'m a side sleeper) but now I don\'t notice it! I\'d go for 5 stars if it was a bit firmer.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States October 3, 2023', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars So comfortable', 'author': 'NHY', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'I had a memory foam topper prior to getting the Casper hybrid mattress, but I am amazed at the level of comfort it provides. The sensation is the equivalent to floating, completely supported.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States January 1, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '1.0 out of 5 stars Terrible Mattress - Do Not Buy (details', 'author': 'Jim', 'rating': 1, 'content': '1. Tried for 2 full months.2. Fully aired out; uncovered for 72 hours. Then removed covers everyday for 3 weeks.3. Replaced an 18 yr old higher end Serta.Complaints:1. Worst sleep of our lives. Have slept better at a Motel 6 (thought that was the bottom!)2. Terrible for side and stomach sleepers. Wife developed debilitating shoulder pain over the past 1.5 months.3. Just plain uncomfortable.4. Could rarely sleep more than 5 hours; both of us would end up tossing and turning for another 2-3 hours trying to get "rest".5. Weirdo dreams. Like Fever dreams. The first few weeks we attributed it to the smell of glue that was mildly persistent. This was the worst period. After that we got a waterproof cover to muffle the fumes. Dreams were not as bad, but still never really had good ram sleep.Positive:1. Sleeping in one position on my back was good from a body ache perspective. No aches or pains. Improvement over our 18 yr old bed. However, turning to side or stomach did result in pain. I got about 5 good hours of dreamless sleep without pain. Then would lay in a twilight state...thinking about everyday crap.Casper has a great marketing dept. Do NOT fall for the hype.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States January 16, 2021', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Great for my back!', 'author': 'Andrew', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'I sleep on my stomach and was worried this would be too soft (or too firm). For the first time in years, I am waking up without back pain.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States December 14, 2023', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars It’s a great mattress worth it', 'author': 'jessica johnson', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'So I decided to get a Casper since I heard from friends that it is a great mattress. I was skeptical since it was a bit pricey and it was memory foam…well plus size girls and memory foam don’t usually get along but boy was I wrong!! I have the Hybrid so I got the best of both worlds. Not only is it soft like a cloud it gives me enough firmness to where I don’t feel like I’m sinking in. I’m around 280lbs and the bed has not dented in and it kept it’s firmness for I say a month since I had it. Now beware this mattress is THICK and when the plastic is cut it was growing before my eyes and didn’t take long at all to be at full size(giggity) probably about 10min tops. There was no smell at all and the size is what it claims. It is also helping my sciatica pain and I see myself sleeping through the night which is the most important. I’m a happy customer. Thank you!!', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States October 27, 2022', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Best sleep in 10 years', 'author': 'BeABetterPerson', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'Sore backs—that we couldn’t attribute to age, activity or injury—meant it was time for a new mattress. This one seemed to do what we needed it to do and not go overboard on ‘options’ or price. Six months later, no more sore backs and I don’t know that my husband or 95 pound golden retriever are I bed with me.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States March 3, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '4.0 out of 5 stars READ CAREFULLY THE DESCRIPTION OF THE MATTRESS, FIRM TO MEDIUM!', 'author': 'Rhonda', 'rating': 4, 'content': 'I REALLY THOUGHT I ORDERED A CASPER HYBRIDE MEDIUM FIRM, BUT IT WAS ACTUALLY A MEDIUM MATRESS. SO, I HAD TO ORDER A FIRM MATRESS TOPPER TO MAKE IT "SLEEPABLE" FOR MY BODY. IT\'S STILL NOT QUITE FIRM ENOUGH, AND THAT CREATES MY BACK PAIN WHEN I ARISE IN THEMORNING. OTHER THAN THAT, IT\'S NOT TOO BAD. BETTER THAN THE MATRESS I HAD! THANK YOU FOR ALLOWING ME TO SHARE!', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States January 4, 2024', 'is_verified': True}]

title: Twin Mattress 8 Inch Copper Memory Foam Mattress, CertiPUR-US Certified Made in USA, Cooling Gel Bed Mattress in a Box Fiberglass Free, Kids Mattress for Bunk Bed, 38"×75", Medium
reviews: [{'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars So far so good!', 'author': 'Anonymous', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'I needed something quickly to replace an old bed, just for the short term. I also needed something nontoxic. I am someone who is very sensitive to odors[like chemicals], on all accounts. I read reviews carefully before purchasing. I did not notice any odor to speak of, once all packaging was removed(packing materials can smell plasticy or like wherever they were stored.)Have only had it a few days so far, but the relative sleeping on it regularly is enjoying it, saying it’s quite comfortable and cool. I too thought it was comfortable, considering the reasonable cost and speedy shipping.There are no springs- only foam. The cover it has on it is pretty nice looking too. The mattress is lightweight and easy to move. It came vacuum sealed in a rectangular box. The mattress while sealed is maybe an inch thick. Once opened, it took less than a day to fully inflate and shape up, which it did without issue.I may share an update to this review in the future to see how it’s holding up. I’d say it’s a good choice for an inexpensive guest bed.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States January 29, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Save your money!', 'author': 'nikosuave', 'rating': 5, 'content': "Save your money and stay away from the big box mattress companies! This is a quality mattresses for a fraction of the cost you would be charged elsewhere. This is not our 1st bed-in-a-box purchase, but it has been one of the better ones. There was virtually no odor that I could detect and it inflated to the height of the photo with measurement in less than 1 hour. Firmness feels just right and our 6 year old loves her new bed and mattress! It comes with a very soft and nice removable covet which is great for washing! We still intend to put a waterproof mattress protector on however. For health reasons, it's good to stick to Certi-Pur, Greenguard or OEKO-TEX certified mattresses. I spent a couple days researching the various mattresses available and so far we are very happy with our purchase!", 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States September 15, 2023', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars So so comfy', 'author': 'CB', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'This twin size mattress worked out great for our Trundle bed. I wanted a mattress that didn’t need a mattress topper and this was perfect! If you’re looking for a comfortable mattress that is an exact 8 inches this would be it. We are buying another for another room.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States January 3, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Happy with it!', 'author': 'Mitch Bloem', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'I was so nervous to order a mattress, especially with so many mixed reviews out there.Thankfully it inflated nicely, no weird smells, and hopefully the company is truthful with it having “safe materials.” All around it seems good and safe. It’s for my 3 year old little girls room, and the 8 inch full size will work good for her!', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States January 9, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Very comfortable mattress', 'author': 'Anamaris', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'I love it and my toddler is liking his new mattress good choice 8inn is perfect', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States January 6, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '4.0 out of 5 stars Good enough given the price', 'author': 'Kindle Customer', 'rating': 4, 'content': 'Purchased the 6” green tea twin mattress for my toddler’s new “big girl” bed. The mattress expanded quickly (within a few hours). There was no weird smell when it was opened (which sometimes happens with plastic packaging). The mattress is comfortable enough when laying down, however it compresses VERY easily. If you kneel on it to get on the bed (or get off the bed, or put a sleeping toddler down), it compresses a lot. It almost feels like the mattress could be pushed through the slats of the bed. We’ll likely be investing in a better quality one, but it’s a good option for the price and/or if it won’t be used often and/or it’s for a tiny human.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States December 24, 2023', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Good product for the price', 'author': 'Miguel', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'Item as described very comfortable a little shorter than o was expecting it o should have read the dimensions.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States January 19, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars The reviews are true, this is the best mattress!', 'author': 'carole', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'We needed this for a guest and didn\'t want to use a blow up mattress. title: 7 Inch Signature Gel Memory Foam Mattress, Cooling Gel Infusion, Twin White
reviews: [{'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Great Buy!', 'author': 'Bailey', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'I purchased this matress cause I needed a full size to fit my Murphy style pull down bed. And since it was something that would be frequently used I wanted a nice comfortable matress but not the cost of a high end one...especially since all I needed was a Full size. I narrowed my searches and reviews from this 9" and a Zinus 10" I was also interested in. I decided on this one because it had the cooling gel and I remember having had a queen bed with the cooling gel foam and how nice it was..not so much as a sleeping cool for me but a very refreshing sleep I guess. Anyways I couldn\'t beat the price of this matress! It was right in the budget but I was worried it would be either too firm or too plush. A lot of the reviews gave my mixed emotions on it. I took my chances and bought it anyway. It arrived in a large box (think half size of a coffin) the matress was rolled up tight and compacted. I pulled it out and layed it on the floor. Took the main plastic off so I could unfold. Once I was able to unfold it it immediately started to retrieve air. SO COOL!! it\'s like magic watching it go from a freeking pillow case to a thick matress! Over all I\'m incredibly happy with this matress! It\'s not too firm and not too plush (at least in my preference).Some things to note:When I took the matress out and removed all the plastic it had reach about 7-8" in a short amount of time (this is a 9") . I gave it about 15-20 hours before really judging It but also to give it time to really expand as well. They say you should give a memory foam matress 24-48 hours to fully expand. I left and got home 3 hours later, lifted it up and put against the wall knowing I\'d be moving furniture the next day. When I lifted it it felt much denser. And I was a little shocked. Prior, I had laid on it and at first was worried cause it felt really plush to me. Like TOO plush. I told myself I should give it time to expand. And wow the base foam really must of or the whole thing cause it feels way more sturdy and supporting yet very comfortable. All in all. Big recommend. I will say that I will be buying a bunker board for an additional support/air circulation for under this mates aired to raise it just a few more inches. If you have a Murphy bed I recommend the same. If the bed is a foam bed and placed flat on the support board it can cause mold. So have a bunkie board or something that will allow circulation is advisable!', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States April 22, 2017', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars One of the best mattresses I have ever slept on!', 'author': 'Jeet', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'Honestly, I was a bit skeptical buying a bed from amazon. However, I was on a budget because I was moving away from home. I didn\'t want to spend $600+ for a mattress. So, with that in mind, I came to amazon looking for a "Gel-memory foam mattress." It got delivered in a box that was about 5 feet tall and a foot wide. I was even more skeptical because how could they fit such a large mattress in such a small box. Well, after unboxing the mattress, I plopped in on the floor and waited about 3 hours for it to puff up. I bought this over a year ago and I literally have not have one bad night of sleep since. I\'ve had friends come over and ask where I bought the mattress from because it is that comfortable. They are always shocked when I say I got it from amazon and are even more shocked when I tell them the price I got it at. Whenever I ask my friends how much they think I bought it for, they always say something in the ballpark of $500+ when actually the cost is almost 1/3 of that! I\'ve slept on many very expensive mattresses (including my parents tempur-pedic) but I have to tell the truth, this mattress beats all of them. It is literally like sleeping on a cloud, and I have never had any pain waking up. Actually I have a lot of trouble waking up because the mattress is just so comfortable that you don\'t really want to get up. The one drawback is that it is only 7 inches thick. But at this point in my life, I don\'t really need a 10 inch mattress which would be a pain to carry around when I move from place to place. I am not a bed connoisseur by any means and don\'t really know if the gel really does actually keep me cool at night but hey, I\'ve never had a bad night of sleep so I guess that answers my questions. And for the record, I cannot stand sleeping when its hot and I\'m sweaty, so it must mean it does a decent job of keeping me cool at night.If you are in the market for a very affordable, yet comfortable, mattress, look no further. You will not regret it. I\'ve referred many of my friends to this mattress and they also say that it is the best $180 that they have ever spent in their lives. If you have any questions feel free to send them my way and I will do my best in trying to answer them!', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States July 22, 2014', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '4.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable for side sleeper', 'author': 'Amazon Customer', 'rating': 4, 'content': 'Comfortable for side sleepers. Little more squishy than expected. Bought for guest bed. Should work fine for a visitor.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States July 25, 2023', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Great Sleep, support. Shipping. Made well. Good price', 'author': 'elizabeth Mcneilly', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'In the past I’ve slept on Tempur-pedic’s. I couldn’t afford one right now, but I was struggling with a new bed. This has amazing support not too thick and not too soft, but wonderful quality when I opened it out of the box.. even came a day or two early', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States October 20, 2023', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Much better than ANY innerspring mattress !', 'author': 'Andrew H.', 'rating': 5, 'content': "<SPOILER> It's awesome.I didn't like waiting 2 days for it to fully recover it's shape (although I took a nap on it about 6 hours into the wait). I moved it onto the frame after 48 hours - and although it was good, it wasn't done reforming it's shape. Day 3 though, by the time I returned, it not only fit the frame very snuggly, it was threatening to un-make itself. If you wait for it - It's awesome, and soft, and quiet, and comfortable (not sure about it's cooling yet).", 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States September 12, 2023', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': "5.0 out of 5 stars Finally got a good night's sleep in the RV!", 'author': 'Jen U in WI', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'I purchased this mattress for use in my RV. A key reason for choosing the 7 in gel memory foam was for the ‘stay cool’ affect. After sleeping on this for over a week in mid-summer weather, I was pleased to find that it lived up to that claim and I did not notice any hot spots. The mattress is comfortable and compares well to an expensive, name-brand pillow top I have had at home for about 10 years. It is several times more comfortable than the mattress that came with my RV new. After unpacking it following the clear instructions and allowing it to come to shape after shipping, I placed it on top of a plywood platform with only a 1.5 pad between it and the board. It did not take long to be ready for use, although the instructions say to allow 24-48 hours. If you are considering this for your own RV, remember that this is more of a true queen size mattress and will be longer than a "camper" queen. I found that it was not too heavy or awkward to lift with or to take off the platform as needed. Since this is memory foam, the mattress doesn’t sink or flatten down much and stays at its advertised 7 inches. This is true even for a plus-size person and an 80lb dog both sleeping on it. I would also recommend that you make sure you can climb up onto this mattress at that height, and that you have enough head room if you are putting this in an RV with cabinets over the bed.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States July 7, 2016', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Never slept better', 'author': 'Sierra', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'So I’ve had this mattress for about 2 months now and it’s the best decision I’ve made. It’s not crazy cloud comfortable to lay on if you’re not sleeping but let me tell you this bed gives your body so much support I sleep like a rock and wake up feeling well rested every morning. I used to toss and turn and wake up with my blankets on the floor and now I barely move in my sleep. As a reference for anyone who’s looking to purchase this mattress I’m 5ft 175lbs and I sleep on my stomach most of the time but this bed has gotten me to sleep on my back more which is supposed to be better for your spine. It got here exactly when it was supposed to and there really wasn’t any Odor or problems with it forming properly at all. The only bad thing I can say about it is that I’m a hot sleeper and this is supposed to have cooling gel. I don’t feel the cooling gel whatsoever but you have to take into consideration I bought a waterproof mattress cover and have no ac in my home so maybe when it gets colder that will be more helpful through the night. The motion transfer isn’t too bad but it’s a hell of a lot better than my old spring mattress. I would give it a 7. The sides and ends are a bit mushy the first day or two but get more firm and are pretty supportive for a foam mattress. Overall I’m very happy with my purchaseUPDATE: it’s been probably almost a year since I bought this mattress and I still love it! Definitely a must to get the mattress cover because we recently got a puppy and he’s made a couple messes already. It’s kept shape and is as comfortable as ever.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States August 3, 2018', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '3.0 out of 5 stars Good support and long lasting...not so soft or "cooling" though', 'author': 'Jess Wittman', 'rating': 3, 'content': 'I odered this in 2017 and have slept on it for 3 years now. I switched to this from a very firm mattress hoping memory foam would be like sleeping on a cloud...it isnt. This mattress is not soft at all, it is soft to the touch but only the top inch and a half is memory foam. The next layer is a high density foam for support. So sleeping on this is not very soft at all. I do think it is better than the mattress than I had before as I had slept on it for 7 years and it was just done. This one is still in great condition even with the 3 years sleeping on it. It has also survived a very active toddler jumping on it all the time even still it is the same as when I got it. It just is not soft. Also this one was advertised as having "cooling gel" and no. It isn\'t cool at all I actually have to go from one side of the mattress to the other side and back multiple times a night because it is so hot. I am now looking for a mattress topper to see if that will solve all this. They are not as expensive as buYing a new mattress and with this one still being very supportive I think that will help a lot. I guess as far as giving a recommendation for this I would say yes. It is not cool or soft but the mattress is still very supportive and it was a very good price for it to still be in like new condition after being used for this long. I would add to that to save by buying this mattress and also buying a good mattress topper for prefered softness...I\'m not sure what to do about the heat problem I am hoping a topper will help but I am sure there are other things I can try maybe some bamboo sheets or something I will add to this when I find out.I did get a 3 inch memory foam topper a few weeks ago and now my bed is very comfortable the mattress is supportive and the topper is the perfect softness. I still have issues with warmth but since I out the topper on it is a lot better now I am not moving from side to side as much at night. I fully recommend getting a topper if you get this mattress. To me this is a great deal because mattress is so inexpensive and the topper I bought was around $75 dollars it is now like sleeping on a cloud and at half the price of a mattress that would have had the extra few inches of memory foam included...I now recommend buying deep sided sheets if you do this and you will be sleeping like a baby =]', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States September 1, 2020', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '4.0 out of 5 stars Just what i needed for trundle beds.', 'author': 'Mary E.', 'rating': 4, 'content': 'They’re a good fit for trundle beds. The corners didn’t quite fill out, but it doesn’t make difference in sleeping.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States November 24, 2023', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': "2.0 out of 5 stars Doesn't work for me", 'author': 'T. :)', 'rating': 2, 'content': "First off I will address the comfort. I really needed something more supportive as I have back issues. I have slept on this now for about a month & so far it's not really working for me. It's great when I first get in, but within minutes I'm sleeping in a hole. The right side of the bed seems worse with the sinking than the left. Thus, all night I am fighting to get out of the hole, as the mattress tries to conform to my body. I move a lot at night & keep finding myself half in, half out of a hole. Shipping on this was a nightmare. I couldn't track it to know when it would arrive & it was late arriving! Also, Amazon stated that it would be delivered, set up & packaging removed. They did none oof the above! I have health issues & needed someone to lift it, as it is heavy & I'm not supposed to lift. They brought it & helped to slide it in the door & then we had to get it to the bed & set it up. Thanks, Amazon, for changing the delivery to drop off! BUYER BEWARE! I've spent a great deal of money with Amazon & have noticed the decline in service!", 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States December 1, 2023', 'is_verified': True}]

title: Tri-Fold Memory Foam Mattress, 4 inch Single Folding Mattress with Collapsible and Washable Cover, Travel and Guest Mat, 75"×25"×4", Grey
reviews: [{'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Surprisingly comfortable', 'author': 'Barbara', 'rating': 5, 'content': "I bought this folding mattress to use when going to visit family who doesn't have enough beds when we all come to visit. In the past I tried blow up mattresses which were ok but not all that comfortable and would sometimes deflate while in use.This was a HUGE improvement! It unfolded easily, and was a great size - I bought the Twin XL which gave lots of room for me to move around and not feel like I was going to go off the edge. I love the fact that it comes with a case to help carry it around. It feels like it is good quality and will last, too. Most importantly, I slept normally - it was quite comfortable. I was able to catch a good sale so I completely feel that I made a good purchase! I would recommend.", 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States December 29, 2023', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Best value and most comfortable in side-by-side comparison!', 'author': 'Marilee', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'I\'m setting up a Prius Prime as a "micro RV", and need to be able to sleep comfortably. I am past the age when I can comfortably sleep on even a high quality camp pad, and if I can\'t comfortably sleep, the rest of the plan doesn\'t work.I ordered three 75"x 25" 4" trifold mattresses and slept on each for 1 night. None of them were horrible, but this one seemed more comfortable.Then I put all three next to each other, and sat/laid down on each.I could feel the floor through all the others I, but *not* through this one.This one is solid enough that I can\'t feel the hard surface below it, and soft enough that I don\'t get back pain or hot spots (Both of which happen when I try to sleep on a regular camping pad or inflatable mattress).Interestingly, this one is also the *least* expensive!Also, this is the only one that came with a handy carrying case! I had resigned myself to sewing my own, but no need!', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States January 30, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Very Nice. Tucks in Corner of Room for Easy Storage. Worth the Money.', 'author': 'Retired Virginia Prof', 'rating': 5, 'content': "I'm very pleased with the folding mattress. Comfortable. It's easy to store in the corner of the bedroom for visitors. I also got a folding metal frame to go with it. I'm all set for visitors. Worth the money.", 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States January 10, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '4.0 out of 5 stars Pretty darn good', 'author': 'Stephanie Puzey', 'rating': 4, 'content': 'Pretty darn good. Got it on sale during a Black Friday thing. It’s comfy, the cover is soft. I like that the cover is removable, making for easy washing. For kids, a disposable waterproof pad(like the ones used for potty training dogs) could easily be slipped inside. Lots of pics in my review, here are thoughts:Came rolled up and compressed. Immediately began expanding upon opening, a good sign. I removed the foam to help the process go faster, so that the edges and corners weren’t slowed by the cover. The cover was easy to put back on, but is not loose or baggy at all.The foam inside has two layers. A higher density white foam on the bottom and a softer blue foam on the top. All in all, quite comfortable to lay on.The length and width are spot on to the advertised measurements. Part of my 4-star rating came from the thickness. This is advertised as a 4” thick pad, and it only is 3.5”. If you’re wondering if half an inch really would make much more of a difference, talk to any man you know ;-). Not enough to send it back, but really not accurate.The other reason for the 4-star is that it lacks any Velcro straps to hold it closed when folded. These would make it easier to store and carry. It didn’t advertise this, but they’re on all other tri-folds I’ve used and would make handling easier.All in all a very good pad. 4 stars, but the two things I mentioned are minor to most people. I would recommend this pad.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States November 30, 2023', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Great for kids and adults, may cause kids to wrestle', 'author': 'Amazon Customer', 'rating': 5, 'content': "Okay I have three boys who need naps (ages 4 and twins that are 2). However there is not enough room on our couch for all of them and me, and if I leave the room they bug each other and get up and.... Naps just doesn't happen.Bought this and oh man it's a game changer. All three of them love it and it is so freaking comfortable. I almost fell asleep on it one night on accident.Only issue we have had is that the boys seem to have gotten a lot more into wrestling this past week whenever it is out... So something to be aware of lol.Also while I do think I could sleep on this I could see that many adults wouldn't mostly cause it is not very wide and some people like to move in their sleep or spread out.As for making it a chair against the wall... Ehhh. It's kinda too deep for kids that way and too low for me. I'm sure we will do that at times for room but I wouldn't buy it for that specifically.Though it folds up really nicely and we are already planning to take it with us for travel this summer for another bed for our kids.", 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States February 10, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Versatile & comfy', 'author': 'jane jones', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'I bought this as a transition piece, pseudo couch, napping spot, and even spent two weeks using it as a bed after a move while new stuff was en route. Great thing to have. Easy to wash the slip cover, comes with a storage thingy with handles. Glad I got it. Holds up pretty well against feline foes.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States February 20, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars great for visitors', 'author': 'ASR', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'teenage son has visitors often so this is easy, convenient, affordable, and comfortable for them when they sleep over. the folding option makes it easy to put away in closet when not in use.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States February 23, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '4.0 out of 5 stars Relatively comfortable and great price', 'author': 'ZG', 'rating': 4, 'content': "I had a spare bedroom for 5 years, but we only get company two or three times a year and I figured it would work out better for me to have an office and figure out where people would sleep once they got here:-)For a few years I used an inflatable mattress, similar to an aerobed. After 2 years it started losing air every few hours and my guests would end up sleeping on the floor on top of the deflated mattress. These foldable mattresses ended up being my solution to that problem. They fold up quite nicely and I really like that they come with a zip up storage bag to keep them in. I ended up buying two of them as I felt it would be easier to store two twin size mattresses then one huge queen size mattress. I would like to note that the zip up storage bag is a little tricky to figure out how to use, but once you get the mattress in the right way it zips up very nicely.I found these extremely comfortable to sleep on, however I'm able to sleep on the floor with no problem. My guests told me that they were able to sleep on them, but it was hard getting up off of the floor. Maybe I'll look for a fold away cot to put these on top of for their next visit.I found the price on these extremely reasonable, and I feel they are very good value for the quality of what they are. I have recommended them to others via word of mouth so far, and strongly recommend them!", 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States December 27, 2023', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Very good product', 'author': 'Franj', 'rating': 5, 'content': "I weigh 175 pounds and I sleep on this mattress every night. It's only four inches thick but it's very comfortable. It's not like I can feel the tiled floor underneath me. Before buying this mattress, I woke up with aches and pains because I apparently needed more support than my expensive brand-name mattress provided. Fitted queen-size sheets are a little large for it, but they work fine. A full-size or twin-size fitted sheet would be an even better fit. My reason for mentioning sheets is simply to say any fitted sheet that's a queen -size or smaller should work for you, as I've not seen any need to buy special sheets for this mattress.", 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States February 19, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for daily use.', 'author': 'JOY CAUDO', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'I needed some extra padding for a very uncomfortable futon mattress and this was perfect. Because I use a fold out futon style bed for space, I wanted something that would fold up if needed but was still comfortable and this does the job. I’ve been sleeping on it nightly for about two months and I have no complaints. May need to be replaced sooner than a traditional mattress, but at the price it’s not a problem.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States March 1, 2024', 'is_verified': True}]

title: 3260Twin Polyester Mattress, Twin, Firm, White
reviews: [{'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars great buy!', 'author': 'Billy', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'the bed came exactly how described with no defects. it took some time to get assembled but well worth it. it’s rigid and stable and engineered very well, all hardware was correct, pre drilled holes aligned properly, and pieces fit true and square. i’m very impressed with the quality for the price, and the overall product.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States January 20, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Well worth the price.', 'author': 'Ronald E Anderson', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'Very comfortable', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States February 24, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '1.0 out of 5 stars This description is a total lie, I cut it open!', 'author': 'MamaSews', 'rating': 1, 'content': 'So I bought this mattress with the intent of ripping it apart and using the springs to fix my couch cushions. As an upholsterer, I know enough about cushion construction that I was confident in my ability to clip apart the springs and make it work. This mattress is a complete and total lie! The springs are not individually encased, it\'s an old fashioned spring bed! The 2" layer of foam and polyester is about 1/4" of soft foam and maybe a 1/4 of batting, felt and cheap cover fabric combined. That adds up to maybe 1/2" of covering, I\'m being generous here! The materials are all very sub par and junky! I honestly should return this piece of crap with the big hole cut in the side but since I feels that\'s a little dishonest on my part, I\'m going to try to make it work for what I bought it for. I really just wanted everyone to see that they are not telling the truth about what you are getting here! On principle, I would beg people not to order this mattress! It\'s also very uncomfortable to lay on! I highly recommend spending a little more and getting a chime mattress from Ashley furniture. My 3 kids are all sleeping on those and when they go on sale you can get them for well under $200. title: Queen Size Mattress, 10" Inch Gel Memory Foam Queen Bed Mattress in a Box with CertiPUR US Certified Foam for Sleep Supportive, Pressure Relief
reviews: [{'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Life changing', 'author': 'Michael', 'rating': 5, 'content': "This mattress is the best mattress I have ever slept on. It's on the medium side of softness. Giving a little but also providing a great amount of support. Fits standard sheets. There's not much else to say other than it's amazing and give me some of the best sleep I've ever had. Get it, you won't regret it.", 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States January 27, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Just Buy It Already!!! AMAZING!!!', 'author': 'Emily', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'TLDR; Definitely buy this mattress if you want to sleep on a squishy cloud every night.First off I want to say, I read a ton of mixed reviews before clicking buy and was quite nervous! I researched for months!!!I haven\'t bought a new bed of my own before, let alone a bed that comes in a box. I really was so confused by the reviews. Some were raving and many hated this bed. I got tired of researching and going around in circles with every other good and bad review, so finally just decided to click buy on this one: 10" Queen.It arrived in a box just shorter than me. (I\'m 5\'2", extremely difficult for me to carry the box alone into the house, but I managed!) I was a bit skeptical that this sealed mattress in this box would expand to an actual queen size and 10" thickness. I followed the instructions on how to open and get set up. Definitely follow these instructions and don\'t accidentally cut the plastic layer keeping the mattress compressed -until ready for it to expand- or the mattress itself. Cutter tool was included, which was very useful!!Once situated in the room, I cut the last layer of plastic off mattress and it immediately began to expand. I measured it for a few hours and by the end of the night it had expanded fully.I wasn\'t sure what the firmness or lack there of would be due to the reviews. I laid on it and it was extremely squishy, like very squishy -like a cloud. The first few nights my neck hurt from sinking in so much. However, I switched to a less fluffy pillow and now absolutely no back pain. I used to get out of bed and be so sore, no more with this mattress though! (Also purchased a 14" metal platform frame off Amazon too, and that helped more with the comfort. I initially had the mattress on the floor the first week.)Only con is that, the corners aren\'t fully expanded to the usual corner shape; I don\'t think. But to me that is fine, because those 2 corners are against my wall and hidden by pillows.Now that you\'ve read this novel, just add it to your cart and get ready for a comfy, squishy bed that you just sink into like a cloud. :) A good investment at a reasonable price if you are budget shopping for a nice, convenient mattress. Also, great that there\'s no hauling required, ships right to your doorstep.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States November 5, 2021', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '4.0 out of 5 stars Good mattress , comfortable , but one important thing...', 'author': 'John Paul DeMaio', 'rating': 4, 'content': 'Its a good mattress , its comfortable, but very important i had to note for others it is bigger then a full size. I have a full size bed frame as you see , and it did not fit in the frame . It over hung about an inch and a half on each side. This was a NIGHTMARE for me cause i purchased the bed , set it up (heavy as heck) and all was ready to go and then this. I didnt know what to do. What i ended up doing was , instead of scraping the bed and losing all that money , time and work and buying another bed (because you are never in a billion years getting the mattress back in the box to return it) , i built this bed up above the frame and then just put the mattress on top of that. So im about 62 feet off the floor and need a parachute to get off the bed in the morning , but at least there was a solution. So just beware if you have a tight bed frame and you order this mattress you may be in for a rough time trying to figure out how to get it to fit. OR, it may be perfect. I of course "googled" the issue and it seems to be a common problem amongst many mattress and bed company\'s that they vary allot in sizes from what they consider "full queen king etc". Otherwise i love the mattress it\'s thick it\'s cozy it goes back to shape when you get off. I would definitely get the "firm" cause even the firm i sink into so the lighter ones are probably a marshmellow which to me is very uncomfortable. If i would have known how soft the "firm" was going to be i would have gotten "very firm" , the last selection . (I know my picture is stupid and doesnt shown the mattress i just wanted to show off my beautiful bed)', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States September 29, 2023', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Love it love it love it', 'author': 'Kamilla', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'This was such a risky decision but have absolutely no regrets! I was so worried getting mattress off Amazon because what if we don’t like it it would be a headache to return it, but we loved it! According to instructions we had to wait up to 3 days for it to rise but sleeping on the couch was really uncomfortable so we said whatever and only waited 24hrs. Mattress never went up to promised 14” but do I care? No. I was measuring it couple times within 2 weeks and it’s steady 12” which is totally fine with me. It’s not plushy or very soft like the ones in the hotels where you body sinks in mattress. It’s firm, supports all the positions you sleep in. My husband sleeps only on his back and I only sleep on my side and we both feel amazing waking up. No pain no discomfort. Be aware that if you get ikea bed frame like me mattress came out to be a bit wider than expected and my husband had to push it into the frame. (Side note for ladies it’s very heavy and you will need help changing bed sheets)', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States August 24, 2023', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Best mattress I’ve ever had', 'author': 'Mysty wilson', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'Hopefully this review will help you with your purchase.1. It is very firm which is great for my and my fiance because of our backs.2. Take it out of the box as soon as you get it and keep it in a warm room. The heat will help it rise to the correct height.3. I slept on it the night it arrived and it’s been fine. The waiting period is typically because of the smell (which I didn’t smell) from the gases.4. Humidity will cause it to take longer to riseI’ve read a lot of negative but honestly I just think most probably did not follow the directions properly. It says do not leave in box because it’s suctioned for shipping and the longer you leave it in the box the harder it is on the mattress. I placed a heater in the bedroom and let it sit for about 8 hours before I slept on it.I would absolutely buy this mattress again and put 100% recommend. I love that when my fiance moves around in the bed, I don’t feel him. I love love love the firmness. My neck back and hips have not ached since night one.FYI the bed frame in the pic was purchased from amazon as well. It was super easy to put together and works perfectly with the mattress. This picture was about two hours after I unpacked the mattress.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States November 30, 2023', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '1.0 out of 5 stars Awful smell - do NOT buy - possibly MOLD', 'author': 'Faith', 'rating': 1, 'content': 'We unboxed this mattress knowing the off-gassing smell would take a while to dissipate. That actually was not an issue for us. However, about a month after we purchased it, an awful baby-powder like smell started filling our room. It took me a while to place it. I replaced our hypoallergenic bamboo mattress protector because I thought the Smell was coming from that. It was not. Every couple weeks our sheets and blankets would come down with the same smell and I’d have to wash them in vinegar to get the smell out. But the smell always came back. About 2 months ago it became obvious that the smell was coming directly from this mattress. Any time I removed the mattress protector and sheets to wash, the smell would permeate our room. The final straw for me was a week ago when I linked significant breathing problems to sleeping on the mattress.I was suspicious from the beginning that this smell was mold. I have diagnosed CIRS and mold illness and this year our family had to get rid of our house and all our belongings due to off the charts findings of toxic mold that were making all 4 of us very sick. We had to start over. This mattress was referred to us by a friend and we liked the price of it so we ordered after we found moved into our new-build apartment. The fact that this mattress seems to now be making us sick is very disturbing.When I looked up the branding, it appears these mattresses are made in Asia. I have no problem with that, except for the likelihood that the warehouses are not temperature/humidity controlled.I am requesting a full refund, please, as we are having to start over (again) with a brand new mattress (different brand) and purchase all new bedding (again.)Please help.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States November 30, 2023', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Did not expect the quality from this!', 'author': 'Ron (Cincinnati)', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'Everything about this mattress impressed me, have had it for 6 months now and it still feels new, no sag, no lumps... just overall a great mattress at a great price.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States March 4, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': "3.0 out of 5 stars It's shaped like a bed 🤷\u200d♂️", 'author': 'Jason Mills', 'rating': 3, 'content': 'This mattress is a great option if you need a guest bed that looks like a bed; it feels just about equivalent to throwing some sheets down on a carpeted floor. I\'m so grateful I didn\'t purchase this with the intention of using this as my every day bed, but only as a guest bed.I spent a lot of time combing through reviews and thought this would be perfect, I didn\'t need the most comfortable bed just something for guests to have something that wasn\'t a couch. I set it up the day I received it and it was very easy to do, even put it on a box spring and let it "inflate" for 2-3 days before using it; it looks to be about 9"-10" thick. It\'s very clean and looks good, the whole bed feels uniform and doesn\'t dip. I\'m male, almost 6ft, and weigh ~200lbs and didn\'t sink into it even a little, truly feels like the floor. I do regret not spending a little more and getting a nicer one, but at this point I think I\'ll be ordering some sort of mattress pad/topper to attempt remedying this. It\'s a cheap bed so you have to understand you\'re getting what you pay for.If you\'re a college student looking for a cheap dorm bed, do a cost/benefit analysis to guage how important a good nights rest is. This does stay cool, but your back will ache. Those memory foam beds are hot, but you won\'t mess up your spine. A real mattress is probably worth it if you can afford it.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States October 26, 2023', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '4.0 out of 5 stars Decent', 'author': 'Kimberly', 'rating': 4, 'content': "Got this for our spare room. It's more firm than I prefer and I like a firm mattress.", 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States March 3, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Love it!', 'author': 'Amazon Customer', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'mattress is great for the price.Went from sleeping on some blankets on the hard tile floor to THIS?!?!?!I sleep like a king now!', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States March 1, 2024', 'is_verified': True}]

I\'m taking off one star because I wouldn\'t expect it to lose that amount of firmness in 6 months.It came on time, but it\'s heavy, like real heavy. We\'re fairly young in our early 40\'s and my husband works a manual labor job and it takes two of us to open the under bed storage. Better hope you don\'t store toilet paper under the bed like I did. I agree that handles on the packaging would be nice, because it\'s a pain to move without them. I know I had to move it alone while my husband was at work. I\'m still trying to figure out why there is a glitter decoration on the underside though. You really don\'t notice it until you have to lift it up. It did fluff up to the correct size and it\'s nice to sleep on for an RV mattress. It\'s an upgrade from the factory one and we have slept on it every night for a month now. You definitely don\'t feel like you slept on the platform more than the mattress like our old one. It\'s pretty thick and with the storage about waist high on me. I\'m 5\'10" so take the thickness into consideration. title: Twin Mattress, 10 Inch Support Cloud Hybrid Mattress, Gel Infused Memory Foam, Pocket Spring for Support and Pressure Relief, CertiPUR-US Certified, Bed-in-a-Box, Soft, Twin Size
reviews: [{'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Great mattress for heavier person with sleep problems', 'author': 'S Myers', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'I’ve had this mattress in a full for over a year and it’s just as comfortable as the day I bought it. The only reason I’m getting a new one is because I’m moving and upsizing my bed to a king. I gained a lot of weight after my pregnancy and this bed is super comfortable every time I lay down. I don’t notice it and that’s not something I’ve ever felt even when I weighed less. The springs keep it nice and firm/supportive and the top makes it soft and comfortable. Worth every penny and much better than other mattresses that are double the price. No sagging or collapsing corners. No mashed down memory foam areas. Pretty perfect!', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States September 12, 2023', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable!', 'author': 'Bsc0626', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'This mattress is simply AMAZING! Very comfortable bery soft, best value! Just like in the picture!', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States November 24, 2023', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '4.0 out of 5 stars Good Value and Comfortable to Me — Review After Several Weeks', 'author': 'J Scott', 'rating': 4, 'content': 'This was my first experience with a mattress-in-a-box.I followed all of the instructions, and it is comfortable to me.You should carefully read the description and other reviews. The softness is perfect for me, but others may think it is too soft. It does not have firmer edge coils, but I was not expecting that.I am glad I purchased it, especially at the price point.Reasons for four stars, instead of five:There is a depression halfway down the length, where it had been folded in half for packing. Again, I had followed all instructions for unpacking and have had it for several weeks. I have rotated the mattress lengthwise and have otherwise tried to "fluff" it, but I do not see that indentation ever going away. For the most part, it does not bother me, but I can see how it would bother some.I purchased the ten-inch model, and I would be generous to say it is nine inches. It is closer to eight and three-quarters inches at its most expansive.The diagrams in the description make it look like the layers above the coils are thicker than they really are.So, a few quirks; but comfortable to me, who likes a soft mattress, and it is hard to beat the price.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States December 4, 2023', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Very comfortable!', 'author': 'C', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'We allowed the full 72 hours for the mattress to expand. We have ordered two since they are so comfortable and everyone sleeps well on it!', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States February 3, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent purchase', 'author': 'Amazon Customer', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'I purchased this mattress for a twin size trundle bed. It was the perfect fit and very comfortable for a twin guest bed mattress..', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States January 8, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Great mattress for me', 'author': 'Isa', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'Got it a day earlier than expected which was great. Was easy to unwrap, it started to inflate before I could get it completely out of wrapper. It took it only few seconds to form into complete mattress. Although I waited the full 42 hours before using to let it inflate completely it only inflated to 9 and a quarter inches, not the 10 inches as advertised, was little disappointed cause it had inflated to that within the first hour of unwrapping it. Could have laid on it sooner than 42 hours. But after laying on it the first night I ended up sleeping all night and all day. Was firm but soft at same time, the sleep was amazing, I honestly was not expecting that from a 200 dollar mattress. Was pleasantly surprised, feel like I got a great mattress for my money. Would definitely buy again, was money well spent. Have slept on it for a week now, and have no complaints.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States March 16, 2022', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars The mattress is sturdy and comfortable.', 'author': 'Dora Harvley', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'Great when the great grands stay over.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States November 29, 2023', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '3.0 out of 5 stars Very soft bed, not firm!', 'author': 'Christy', 'rating': 3, 'content': "This mattress came in folded the weirdest way I've ever seen. But that being said this was supposed to have been 11 in and it says 10 in with 11 in parentheses on the box yet it only filled up to about eight and a half nine so I'm glad I didn't buy any mattress smaller than that I feel you would have really felt the coils. You can feel the coils on the sides I feel like they should have taken the extra effort to put something around them so that you couldn't feel the coils. The mattress is a little springier than I would like and it says that it's firm but it is very bouncy it says that it has no motion transfer but I bought a Vibe, now that one's extremely firm probably too hard for most people but there is no motion transfer I've had it almost a year now and love it! This mattress has a lot of bounce to it is very very soft I did put my daughter's mattress topper on top of it only because I had no place for it and it actually which to my surprise from the bed up so I was happy about that. The bed is only in a guest bedroom so luckily I do not have to sleep on it but my daughter said that she liked the bed the mattress was very soft. so just beware when you purchase this go with the comments that say that it's very springy and bouncy very soft because it is it is not hard at all it is not firm at all! So that's why I'm only giving it three stars just because for my preference I prefer a firmer bed.", 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States May 2, 2021', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '4.0 out of 5 stars So far so good!', 'author': 'lulu beans', 'rating': 4, 'content': 'We’ve had this mattress for a few weeks. It was the replacement for my 10 year old daughter’s 6” Zinus she had since she upgraded to a big girl bed. It had worn thin and needed to be tossed.This thing is so thick and comfy. My daughter says she hasn’t slept better, and is IN LOVE with her new bed.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States August 7, 2023', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Super comfortable!', 'author': 'Deborah', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'This mattress has met all my expectations and everything that it was described to be! I love it', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States December 11, 2023', 'is_verified': True}]

title: Queen Mattress - 14 Inch Hybrid Mattress Medium Feel - Individually Wrapped Coils for Pressure Relief & Motion Isolation, Assembled in The USA
reviews: [{'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect fit', 'author': 'Marc Oliver', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'Great price. Quality feel. Fit perfectly in the frame and it’s very comfortable.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States March 2, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Thick and Comfy', 'author': 'MLPM', 'rating': 5, 'content': "I like this mattress. It’s comfy and VERY thick. I feel like it has a sunken middle however from where it was folded. It’s very subtle - a princess and the pea situation - so it doesn’t disturb my sleep but I do feel like I roll into it a little. I just feel like the two sides of the mattress are a little more firm than the middle. If you’re a couple, you probably wouldn’t ever notice, but I sleep solo and like a starfish right down the middle so I do notice the little indentation. When I had a thinner mail-order mattress, I did not notice this so in hindsight, I think the thinner mattress might have (counterintuitively) been a slightly better choice for me. Overall this is a great mattress - I look forward to getting into my huge cocoon every night - but it’s not quite perfection.UPDATE: Six months out and the sunken middle has resolved itself. Mattress is now just the right softness for this stomach sleeping, plus-sized woman. I'd buy it again. And it's a great value for the price.", 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States June 20, 2023', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '4.0 out of 5 stars Good decision', 'author': 'Wayne Tibbetts', 'rating': 4, 'content': 'Mattress is going on our Murphy Bed. Arrived on schedule, unwrapped according to instructions, opened up faster than promised and is very comfortable.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States February 15, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Nice mattress', 'author': 'Mary S.', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'We bought this mattress for our guest room. Our narrow stairway prevents us from taking a standard mattress and box spring set up the stairs. The mattress in the box solves this problem. It is very heavy so it will likely take 2 people to move it where you want it once delivered. It decompresses well and puffs up to the indicated height which I understand is the highest point. Comfortable and good quality. I liked that the company is in the USA also.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States July 21, 2023', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Pleasantly surprised!!', 'author': 'Dee', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'I was skeptical but after a full 72 hours mattress expanded completely even in the corners to a full 14 inches as described, and the mattress slept great for the first night. There was no odor coming from this mattress which I appreciated and it’s affordable!', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States February 28, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': "5.0 out of 5 stars Big Man's best friend", 'author': 'Brian Tuttle', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'I like the fact that it is "Made in the USA" Great job packing such a big mattress in a box! Love everything about it. My little dog needs a dog step to get up on the bed now. would recommend the purchase', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States February 24, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Lovely', 'author': 'Angelica  Hill', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'The delivery was excellent. The package arrived earlier than expected. It was absolutely heavy but barely if you have the strength. I got some help from my lovely neighbor. I was waiting to tell the delivery personal the code to receive the mattress but it was already in my apartment lobby , not too happy about that , someone could’ve totally swiped my package, nonetheless I got an email stating it was delivered so it’s all good. NOW FOR THE UNRAVELING PART… as soon as I cut the first layer of plastic off you could hear the “hsssss-ing” sound of the air being let out , then cut open to the second layer, it immediately inflated, don’t know why it excited me , but it did , I feel like it only took an hour to fully come to its true form. I started to unravel about 11am and set it up about 10pm. The mattress itself is what is states medium firm , I’m 5’3 , 175 lbs ish :P with recent neck pain but I feel the different in comfort from my old bed to the new , my bed frame is 14 inches high I purchased a 12 inches so there a bit of a climb, so I’m gonna get a shorter frame in the near future, so far so good , no chemical smell as other reviews stated , and probably will update 3 months later.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States June 30, 2023', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Terrific!', 'author': 'golfJacket', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'Has been a great sleep since received!', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States September 9, 2023', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '4.0 out of 5 stars Soft corners and edges', 'author': 'Nigel G', 'rating': 4, 'content': 'Corners and edges sink down , other than that pretty comfortable mattress', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States January 30, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '3.0 out of 5 stars Not responsive enough for us...', 'author': 'Kindle Customer', 'rating': 3, 'content': 'This is a lovely mattress, but unfortunately it didn\'t work for us. It is marketed as medium firm, but to me it was more like medium-plush. For reference, I am 5 ft tall and weigh 115 lb. My husband is 6\'4" and weighs around 210.We chose this mattress because the brand had good reviews and I wanted a cooling mattress (we sleep hot) that was medium firm because we are side/back sleepers. Our previous coil mattress was over 10 years old and was killing my husband\'s back. I was starting to wake with a stiff lower back, as well, so we knew it was time for a new mattress. With everything else we\'re trying to do we weren\'t ready to drop several thousand dollars on a super expensive bed yet. This mattress seem to fit our needs.It contours your body like a memory foam mattress should, but I feel like it is not very responsive. As such, when you switch positions or sleep next to someone I believe it may offset the mattress\'s ability to relieve pressure points. This is a mattress in which I feel you definitely sink into, rather than float above.The first night I slept on this mattress I still woke with a bit of a stiff back, but the second night was awful. I woke up the following morning more sore than I ever have from a mattress. Having read several reviews from people saying it takes a week or so to adjust to a new mattress I toughed it out for a few weeks. Unfortunately, we are still waking sore. Luckily, Amazon is allowing us to return it.My husband and I both have issues with our backs, me also with my hips, and we just may need a more firm mattress. This may be a good mattress for you if you are a side sleeper who likes a more plush mattress or if you sleep alone (my hubby works away from home quite a bit and I found I didn\'t wake quite as sore when he was gone or the kids didn\'t crawl into bed with me- still sore, but not as bad). I don\'t feel like I slept any more hot than usual with this mattress, so If you sleep hot like we do then it may fit your needs in that department, as well.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States May 18, 2020', 'is_verified': True}]

title: Full Mattress 12 Inch Foam Mattress in a Box, Bamboo Charcoal Foam Mixed High Density Base Support Foam for a Peaceful Sleep,Pressure Relief, Medium Plush Full Size Mattress with Tight Top
reviews: [{'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Great bed', 'author': 'zulema dewitz', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'Very comfortable. Great value.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States March 2, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Found the comfortable bed mattress', 'author': 'JW', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'I had this mattress for more than 2 months. It came in a big box and wrapped in a plastic wrap. Once I open the wrap, the mattress opened up as a normal size. It fits on my Ikea bed frame nicely. I let it sit for 24 hours before first use. It is very comfortable to sleep on it. It supports my back and does not have any problem when sleeping on it.
