I was really reluctant on spending the money on a bed in a box but I'd say this is one of the best purchases that I've ever made. The other was an automatic litter box for my cats. The only bad thing about this bed is that I never want to get up because it is so comfortable!", 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States February 13, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Exceeded my expectations!', 'author': 'Anglea', 'rating': 5, 'content': "This is a super comfortable mattress, I love it. It forms around the body so no pressure points, and I move around less at night so I'm sleeping better.I used to need a pillow to put my leg on so I could sleep on my side so my back wouldn't hurt from the angle of my spine, now I don't. Overall we really like this mattress.This was a fantastic upgrade to an older inner spring mattress.", 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States February 18, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars good quality', 'author': 'bill', 'rating': 5, 'content': "My wife and I both suffer from back pain so I ordered this mattress in hopes that the support would provide relief from waking up in pain every morning. We received the mattress right on time. Came in all packaged in the box and fluffed up in 1 day.The mattress's build quality and durability are impressive. When we opened the box we let the mattress sit flat for just over 48 hours before we put it on our bed. Does not smell like chemicals at all. This mattress is feels comfortable and durable.Perfect for back shleeper,it is very firm and it provide support in all the right places.", 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States October 20, 2023', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '4.0 out of 5 stars Easy, affordable, but end is slouchy.', 'author': 'Emily Gray', 'rating': 4, 'content': 'Read this review a few times and it is unfortunately true. The end of the mattress is way soft. Like the last six inches don’t have the support as the rest. It’s at my feet so it’s not impacting me much. Sitting on that end is awkward so I just avoid it. For the money, it’s a nice, tall, medium mattress and I’d buy it again for my current need. I didn’t want to buy an investment mattress because I’m likely going to be moving in a little over a year. This will last until then just fine.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States February 16, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '4.0 out of 5 stars You get what you pay for', 'author': 'Amazon Customer', 'rating': 4, 'content': "This is a very decent mattress. It's firm and feels like what it is. It's by no means a high end luxury mattress. But it's about right for the price tag. I sleep extremely well on it. It reached its impressive full size within 3 or 4 hours as far as I could tell. It feels like your sleeping on well supported memory foam. Not a deeply plush soft cloud; you'll need to drop another 500 more for one of those. But if you're not looking for complete luxury, you'll be fine with this.", 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States December 28, 2023', 'is_verified': True}]

title: Full Mattress, 10 Inch Hybrid Pillow Top Full Size Mattress in a Box with Gel Memory Foam & Individually Wrapped Pocket Coils Innerspring for a Cool & Peaceful Sleep
reviews: [{'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Comfort & Quality - Priced Right', 'author': 'Kevin Davis', 'rating': 5, 'content': "Been sleeping on this mattress comfortably now for nearly a month -- all i can say is wow! In the past i have purchased a couple of high-end mattresses ($2,000+) from the chain stores, chasing that elusive good night's sleep. I have always been disappointed. This time i prioritized economy and am so pleasantly surprised with the quality of sleep i have been getting. Plus, I'm not paying hundreds a month over a year to pay it off. Buy this mattress!", 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States February 21, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Great Comfort & Quality', 'author': 'Amazon Customer', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'Great mattress and super comfortable. It feels like a medium-firm mattress. I weigh around 120lbs and I haven’t experience sinkage in the mattress. It has a nice pillow top feel with some bounce due to the springs which is what I wanted. The mattress is heavy so two people are definitely needed to take into a room but I managed to unwrap it myself and let it air out. It took like 2-3 days for it to fully air out of the chemical smells (slight smell not too strong) and it fully inflated in less than 24 hours. It’s also affordable compared to other mattress options that cost thousands of dollars.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States February 25, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '4.0 out of 5 stars Good Value Back Pain Gone', 'author': 'AliciaV', 'rating': 4, 'content': 'The media could not be loaded. So dh and I had a mattress from big online retailer “way” fare and we had it for 7 years. It started to get formed to our bodies and husband felt like he was sunk in on his end and both our backs hurt.So after looking around, we decided on this one for the value and overall positive reviews.Our back pain is gone and bed is comfy.The only thing I wish they would fix is the firmness around the edges. Around the edges it collapses and just doesnt fully form which Im not a huge fan of.But we are both sleeping better and back pain is gone so we will keep it.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States February 19, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Good Mattress Overall', 'author': 'Ed', 'rating': 5, 'content': "I don't think I would like a $2,000 mattress any more than this one. First, as others have noted. it is HEAVY. Unless you are pretty burly, two people will be needed to get it onto a bed. Any tiny bit of odor was gone in a day or two. I actually think the protector I used was responsible for most of the odor I noted. While everyone has a different opinion about firmness, I would rate this as medium firm or perhaps closer to medium than to firm. I would not rate this as a true pillow top, but that is fine with me as it should be a bit cooler in the summer. In any case, having a fluffy top on top of a rock has never made much sense to me. The best part of this mattress in my opinion is the firmness towards the edge. I inched over towards the edge while laying down, and I found that the edge was neither harder than the rest (which I often find and hate) nor did it create a tendency to have me slide off onto the floor. This makes the whole bed usable. I was afraid that the manufacturers hype would not actually be true, but here I think it is. Not sure how they did it, but it seems to work very well. I also tried sitting on the edge, which worked OK, but I didn't buy a mattress to sit on in any case. After only a week of use I can't comment on how it will hold up over time, but it certainly looks to be well made. I much prefer this design with springs as well as foam as it makes it much easier to move around. An all foam mattress does not spring back fast enough to help me roll over, making it more work to move about. My only possible negative comment is that the springs are pretty much at the bottom of the mattress such that I expect that this mattress would not work well if it were only supported by slats rather than a box spring or other flat surface. If I was using slats I would put a sheet of plywood under the mattress and on top of the slats. So, in conclusion, I will not write some over-the-top comments about this being the best mattress ever made, rather I conclude that it is apparently well made, very comfortable for me, and has just the right amount of support all the way to the edge.", 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States November 23, 2023', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Fantastic quality for the price!', 'author': 'K. Zenor', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'We’ve only had this mattress for a short time and it’s in a guest bedroom but from the time we opened the package and it decompressed we were super impressed with the quality. It’s really comfortable and our guests have said they slept well on it. Time will tell how it holds up but for now I’m extremely happy with this purchase!', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States February 26, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars It feels like sleeping on a cloud, absolutely worth it!', 'author': 'Xutao', 'rating': 5, 'content': "First and foremost, the comfort level is beyond my expectations. The gel memory foam fits my body perfectly, providing just the right amount of cushioning. It's like sleeping on a cloud, but without sinking too deep into it. I wake up every morning feeling rejuvenated with no aches on my back that I used to experience on my old, stiffer mattress.The cooling gel technology is a game-changer, especially for me who tends to sleep hot. Whenever I move, the cool air refreshes my body. Overall, I no longer have to toss around at night before sleep due to overheating, which has greatly improved the quality of my sleep.The build quality of this mattress is also excellent. The fabrics feel expensive and durable, and the edge support makes it so I can sit or sleep near without feeling like I would be falling off. It feels smooth to move around on the surface while having just the right level of softness for my comfort.While the price tag is a bit high, I think it is absolutely worth it. For anyone looking to improve their night, I think this is a fantastic investment. Five stars all the way.", 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States November 5, 2023', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '3.0 out of 5 stars I read & researched... this is my conclusion.', 'author': 'Michael Granlund', 'rating': 3, 'content': "The bed looks 100% as pictured. But you are getting a bed in a box. I let the bed sit out with nothing for 3 days like it said. But the truth is if you do have two people on it... it will sort of sink in the middle. Nothing insane but it does. I am not sure if I need to break it in more, but I got it 6 days ago. Aside from that I would've gotten the full memory foam one. Because I did put a 3 inch memory foam topper on this one. It's comfortable by yourself but I just wanted more support all around. They do have a a policy where I can return it... but I am lazy haha. It is decent for the price point. I guess I should also add I'm 22 in college (female) so that's my opinion as a whole", 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States December 20, 2023', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Best sleep ever!!', 'author': 'Lizzi Bee', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'I bought this mattress a few months ago on my brother’s recommendation( he bought one too).This mattress is so incredibly comfortable!!!You can sleep in any position and feel supported. It’s like sleeping in a cloud ☁️.The initial package is very heavy and would recommend two people carry it!I highly recommend this mattress!!! Great price too and you get a guarantee from Amazon and the manufacturer.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States February 3, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars READ REVIEW DONT BUY 2 stars', 'author': 'Riley', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'My original review which was \'submitted for review\' but never posted. They most likely filter out bad reviews so I\'m upping the stars to see if it will post now. 2/5 starsSofter than I was hoping from a medium/firmWe got a king size 12 inch mattress. We let it fluffup for 2 days on the floor then on the 3rd day our frame arrived so we let it fluff up on that.It\'s extremely squishy especially directly in the middle.We may try going back to having the mattress on the floor, however with the current amount of squish it is hurting my back. My hips have an anterior pelvic tilt which is amplified by how much my hips sink down into the bed. I am also only 140lbs and my husband who is around 250lbs does not complain of any pain when sleeping on it.I was really hoping this mattress would be "the one" as so many reviews said it was good and was pain relieving. I\'m currently using a folding futon/couch from Maxyoyo that originally was just for lounging but it\'s a lot firmer so I\'ve been using it as my bed 🤣', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States February 22, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars 100% would recommend!', 'author': 'Grace Garcia', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'We bought this knowing it was a “cheaper” mattress and were skeptical despite the good reviews. The delivery service was amazing and they took our old spring king mattress w/o issue. In and out of our house in 15 minutes. We let it “rise” for the whole 72hrs and it did need that entire time, but it did fully expand.It is SO comfortable. We already had a 2 inch foam topper so we put that on top… but honestly it probably doesn’t need it. This is by far the most comfortable mattress we’ve ever had (and we’ve bought the big expensive store mattresses before).Would 100% recommend this mattress. If/when our other mattresses go out, we will be buying this again!', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States February 22, 2024', 'is_verified': True}]

reviews: [{'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Very good and comfortable', 'author': 'joseph owensby', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'My second one they are comfortable and good quality works very well for money..', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States February 15, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars I can’t believe how inexpensive this mattress it!', 'author': 'Xperiance', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'This mattress is super comfortable. It’s a bit soft for me personally but I’m sure a mattress pad would fix that overall happy with my purchase', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States February 6, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars My daughter loves her new bed', 'author': 'Jared', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'My daughter absolutely loves this bed and says that it super comfy and recommends it to anyone looking for a new bed. My daughter\'s 4\'11" and like 90 lbs and when she opened it it basically launched her across the room lol.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States February 2, 2024', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '3.0 out of 5 stars If Getting Paid to wait was a thing.', 'author': 'Dee Dee', 'rating': 3, 'content': "After Carefully reading the Reviews I decided, take the leap of faith and get it. The upside to this Order was that Delivery was fast! It came a day before expected deliver date. We had no problem unrolling and waited for the mattress to fluff up as it should but the corners were so deformed while it was trying to go back into it shape. I decided to wrap this mattress into a new mattress plastic bag and requested a pick up for a Return/Refund.I just can't understand why 3 corners just didn't budge and looked droopy.I'm now on a search for another mattress that doesn't come in a box hopefully since all mattresses nowadays are delivered in a box.", 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States October 14, 2023', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '4.0 out of 5 stars No side support', 'author': 'SM', 'rating': 4, 'content': "Mattress is for a guest room. title: Queen Mattress DIGLANT 14 Inch Memory Foam Hybrid Mattress in a Box, Motion Isolation Individually Pocket Spring, Supportive & Back Pain Relief, Queen Size Plush Mattress, Black, 60”x80”
reviews: [{'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Very comfortable', 'author': 'Daniel', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'Arrive quickly, package well, good quality. The mattress is very thick and support my partner (big guy) very well. Sleep on it very comfortable and supportive. Recommend!', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States December 4, 2023', 'is_verified': True}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Engulfing mix of coils and soft foams to provide a soft, yet supportive surface and a knitted cover.', 'author': 'Chris Hales', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'This Full Memory Foam Hybrid Mattress by DH DIGLANT, is a very nice combination of coils and the more modern memory foam style mattress. With its comfy, plush feel, in a box arrival, and motion isolation, this is a worthy consideration. Here are some of the things I’ve learned while owning it and things to consider before buying.I. Quality – This mattress looks and feels like a higher quality mattress with a thick knitted fabric outside, supportive coils on the bottom and a super comfy multi-layer foam top for cushion. I’d put this one in the lower side of the upper tier of the quality scale for mattresses and guess it’ll survive many night of great sleep.II. Performance – This section is very subjective, as so many of us require different levels of softness and support to achieve a high rating. I found this mattress to be very comfortable and inviting. It’s on the softer side fulfilling its billing as plush versus a firmer option. I think this one would be ideal for someone who is looking for a very soft and comfy surface, like ou’d envision sleeping on a cloud. They did a really good job of combining multiple layers of different types of foams to provide a softness barrier between you and the supportive coils. It comes conveniently in a box that is semi-easy to move and get into the needed location, but a bit heavy as you can imagine at 92.6 pounds for the full size. Make sure you have it in the final destination room before cutting open the bag its sealed in. It’s also worth noting that the knitted cover over the mattress, seems very well done and should provide great protection over the years.Overall – This a very nice mattress that effectively combines quality, comfort, and firmness. It does a great job of keep my back from getting sore, while still providing a super comfortable place to sleep. I’ll be sure to update this review, if I ever start to have problems with it.You can trust that this review is simply my honest opinion that is attempting to provide you with helpful insight that I wish I had before I picked this product. Hopefully it was helpful in your decision.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States March 5, 2024', 'is_verified': False}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable and well made', 'author': 'Adam M.', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'My wife and I have different preferences. I like softer, she likes firmer. So we went to a twin xl set up about a year ago, and I already needed to replace my bed that had a dip in the middle. Enter this bed.When I opened it, It measured the full 14 inches, and the off gassing was minimal.A major complaint with bed-in-a-box is the side collapsing, but now in the mornings, instead of sitting on her half to put on my shoes, I\'m on this one as the sides are very sturdy and able to be sat on.It says plush, but I find it to be a bit firm. A 6.5 or 7 on a 10-point scale. As a hybrid it sleeps much more as a innerspring than a foam mattress, the opposite of what I had experienced before. The upper layers are still comfortable, and I go about 6\'1", 225 and I don\'t sink in. A lighter person is going to be on the bed, not in the bed.The cover looks good, but I put a sheet on it immediately so that doesn\'t matter. One of the handles stitching did tear a bit when maneuvering the mattress into place, but at this price point even having handles is a feature, so no penalty there.Overall, a good choice.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States February 28, 2024', 'is_verified': False}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent Twin XL Mattress!', 'author': 'Zero Cool', 'rating': 5, 'content': "So what's the difference between a twin mattress and a twin XL mattress? Well, for anyone who doesn't know, a twin mattress is about 39 inches wide, by 75 inches long. And a twin XL mattress is about 39 inches wide by 80 inches long. So the only difference really, is that a twin XL mattress is 5 inches longer than a regular twin mattress.Anyway, I don't have any complaints about this mattress so far. it's actually even a lot more comfortable than I expected it to be. It's also more on the plush side than on the firm side. So I would say that it is more for people who are of average weight or perhaps below average weight. I just say that because I am below average weight, and as a result almost every mattress that I try is like concrete. This mattress, however, seems to be just right for me.Just make sure that if you get this mattress, or have gotten it, to make sure to unbox it properly. And by that I just mean to make sure and let it sit and expand for 72 hours like they say to do. I know it sounds redonkulous and for most of that time you can't even tell that it's still expanding, but I'm pretty sure that it's worth the wait.", 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States February 20, 2024', 'is_verified': False}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable and well made', 'author': 'Tissues and Rainbows', 'rating': 5, 'content': "I ordered the #DIGLANT full size memory foam hybrid mattress for a vacation home and I couldn't be any happier with it. Like other mattresses in a box, after it's opened it needs to sit out for at least 24 hours to return to its original shape. Once set up, I tried the mattress, and it is very comfortable and gave me a very good night's sleep. There was a slight odor when I first opened but it went away by the time I slept in it. It's also a very good-looking mattress and it's unfortunate that it gets covered with bed sheets. This mattress is definitely a good value for the quality and comfort it provides.", 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States March 5, 2024', 'is_verified': False}, {'title': '4.0 out of 5 stars a great, thick mattress', 'author': 'Frey', 'rating': 4, 'content': 'this mattress is incredibly high quality! i was impressed at how compact it was in the box, but it is HEAVY. once you break the seal on the vacuum bag, it expands quickly, and is ready to use very shorty thereafter. I didn\'t notice any chemical smell that sometimes accompanies mattresses like these. it is every bit of the advertised 14" deep, so plan accordingly with your sheets!', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States February 14, 2024', 'is_verified': False}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars comfortable', 'author': 'Tricia Hubbell', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'Have had this for a couple weeks now. Very comfy indeed. I am currently using in a guest room. I love the look and feel. The bed when you take it out of box it does take a bit to fully expand. But so worth it. I suffer with back issues and this is very comforting.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States March 6, 2024', 'is_verified': False}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars No counting sheep on this mattress', 'author': 'Mike Wiles', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'I got this for my granddaughter who was in need of a new mattress. She absolutely loves it. Her mamma says she never sleeps in but on the mattress the first night she slept until 8:30 and she is usually up by 7:00. She woke up saying how wonderful and comfortable it was. She also said she loved that is was much thicker than her old mattress. This was a big win for her and she is sleeping very comfortably on her new mattress.It was easy to open and expand. It will be a great product for a long time.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States February 18, 2024', 'is_verified': False}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars SOFT AND COMFORTABLE!', 'author': 'ANDI', 'rating': 5, 'content': "The twinXL BIAB is a comfortable and convenient choice for a good night's sleep. Setting it up is a breeze – just cut the vacuum-sealed wrapping and it self-inflates. While there's a slight smell initially, airing it out for a few days solves that issue. With motion isolation and individually pocketed springs, it offers excellent support and relief from back pain. Overall, it's a practical and supportive mattress option.", 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States February 21, 2024', 'is_verified': False}, {'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars Full size mattress', 'author': 'Tonie Kelly', 'rating': 5, 'content': 'Love this mattress. Ordered for my grandsons platform bed as that mattress was getting a bit thin. For some reason he decided to leave that one on. This mattress is 14” thick. It is amazingly soft and feels luxurious. It is plush and the colors are really pretty. The mattress looks very high end. I am impressed and would truly recommend this product.', 'timestamp': 'Reviewed in the United States February 16, 2024', 'is_verified': False}]

title: Queen Mattress, 14Inch Medium Plush Supportive Memory Foam Hybrid Mattress, Pressure Relief 7-Zone Individual Pocket Springs Queen Size Mattress in a Box, CertiPUR-US Certified, 60"*80"
reviews: [{'title': '5.0 out of 5 stars A quality hybrid memory foam mattress', 'author': 'James M.', 'rating': 5, 'content': "For the longest time, I found myself in a committed relationship with my Zinus Green Tea memory foam mattress. It was a decent match, serving me well through countless nights. Yet, as the years passed, the spark began to fade, and I found myself longing for something more—something that could rekindle the joy of jumping into bed at the end of a long day. That's when I discovered the DIGLANT King Mattress, and let me tell you, it was love at first sleep.Why I'm Head Over Heels for My DIGLANT Mattress:The Perfect Balance of Firmness: I've danced on both sides of the mattress firmness spectrum, and finding the middle ground has always been a challenge. The DIGLANT mattress, with its medium plush feel, is like the Goldilocks of beds—not too firm, not too soft, just right. It cradles my body with just enough give to feel luxurious yet offers the support my back needs to wake up feeling refreshed and pain-free.Support Where It Counts: The difference maker for me has been the 7-zone individual pocket springs. This isn't your average spring system; it's tailored to provide targeted support across different areas of your body. The result? A more personalized sleep experience that adapts to my needs, whether I'm curled up in a fetal position or lying flat on my back, staring at the ceiling and pondering life's mysteries.Staying Cool Under the Covers: I used to be that person who'd flip the pillow in search of the cool side throughout the night. But with the DIGLANT mattress, those days are behind me. Its ability to regulate temperature and keep heat at bay has been a game-changer, especially during those warm summer nights when even a whisper of warmth can be the difference between sweet dreams and a night of tossing and turning.Seamless Transition from Box to Bed: The unboxing experience was surprisingly satisfying.
